title: So So
review: My wife and I Stayed here for 9 nights, this hotel has the potential to be a 4*+ yet it looses it self down .The location is 10/10, the staff are 9/10, the facilities and general cleanliness 9/10. The free breakfast was really good 9/10 and the 2 hour free happy hour is 2nd to none. Unfortunately we had a problem with the toilet being blocked for 3 days running,the management moved us to the room next door but we were left with the impression that the engineers didn’t believe us. The antrium  is so big with the Air-con so cold we were having to wear woollens to eat breakfast, when your in the sitting area of your suite you’ll constantly hear the noise from the Antrium .The food and service in the restaurant at night are really poor ( can’t believe it’s the same staff that cook breakfast 🤡.) and finally the Suites could be 9/10 if it wasn’t for the poor housekeeping and the fact that no basic facilities are provided such as mugs or cutlery .…

title: Best Hotel Experience Ever
review: Thank you for staying with us Phillip and I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. I’m very happy that you enjoyed our delicious breakfast, location, evening reception and friendly team members. I’m very sorry you had some maintenance issues with your Suites and that we were not able to address them more quickly. I will follow up with my Engineering team as we need to be better. We look forward to seeing you again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites Orlando I-Drive Convention Center

title: Date night
review: I am sorry this has taken me so long to write, I stayed at this hotel from Nov 30, 2018 to December 6, 2018 and from the second I stepped into the lobby until the second I left it was absolutely magic.  I have work at a hotel and have been in the business for over 25 years, This team was magic, every member of the staff happy and smiling and completely engaged in the guest experience. The room was exceptionally clean every day and so spacious, having the balcony with the view of the ICON made my evenings extra special, thanks so much for that view.  All of the staff I interacted with were happy and helpful. The pools both inside and outside were awesome and being on International drive meant being within walking distance to everything. This is an amazing location and this team definitely makes you feel like home, I checked in on my birthday and they actually made me a birthday cake and had put it in my fridge, I also arrived with a cold and they had put orange juice in my fridge, so incredibly thoughtful and I appreciated it so much.  I hope to return and stay again sometime soon, thank you so much to the entire team at this hotel for making my birthday vacation get away more magic that I ever expected.…

title: Very Good
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your amazing experience!  I'm so thrilled you had such a wonderful birthday vacation and that our team consistently went above and beyond across the board!  We can't wait to welcome you back on your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: ok trip
review: Hotel and staff very helpful during my stay. I enjoyed the scenery of the hotel and quiet while in our suite. I will definitely be returning to this location in the near future. I will also recommend this particular location to my friends.

title: Hilton Reservation 800 Number
review: Very displeased and disapointed with the service I just received on the phone while trying to book with Embassy Suites by Hilton Orlando International Drive Convention Center. Talked with three people for over an hour and hilton. I got disconnect with the second person so had to call back (over course they didn't attempt to call me back). I attempted to use a rate that was going utilizing the price match guarantee. Problem is the service rep and manager (Deirdre #40543) were working hard trying not to honor a cheaper rate from Priceline.com. First they said it was do to conflicting cancellation policies/dates, then it was because they could not find the other deals (multiple were had rates). I informed them I would be happy to screenshot the deal but they refuse to receive…

title: great staff!
review: Thank you for reaching out Nickauletta and I'm very sorry you had such a negative experience with our central reservations team.  We are going to reach out and follow up with them as this type of service is the exact opposite of what we want provided for our guests.  I would be happy to help you directly and would love the chance to speak with you at your convenience.  Please feel free to call or email me at 407-581-4301 or Gregory.rice@hilton.com.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites Orlando I-Drive Convention Center

title: Embassy Suites Stay
review: My check in was very smooth and easy. The staff was very friendly and helpful at all times. I was not very impressed with the food. I found the sauce for the ribs to be a bit salty and the breakfast; especially the pancakes, not very appealing. I also would recommend that if you want coffee to select a table near it since trying to walk with the paper cup with the hot coffee is not easy. I would like to give a special thank you to the concierge who helped me to plan my first trip to Disney and I was able to do everything I wanted in 2 parks thanks to him!! Also the hotel offers a free return shuttle to Disney. I think my main issue is that the room should be a little more sound proof. You can hear persons in the lobby and the restaurants and bars outside. The hotel is near quite…

title: Not as good as expected
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Esther and I'm so happy you had such a lovely stay.  I'm glad that our team took such great care of you especially our concierge helping you expertly navigate your first experience with Disney.  I'm sorry you had some issues with your food experience and will be sure to discuss this with our Director of Food and Beverage and Executive Chef to get them corrected for future guests.  We look forward to hosting you again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites Orlando I-Drive Convention Center

title: Don't stay here if you planning to celebrate anything special
review: Good place to stay for five to  six guests.  The place was clean and conveniently located to plenty of local attractions and restaurants to please your taste buds. This place is a good value for the amenities.  Will stay  here again.

title: Orlando, FL
review: First Disney with todfler. My 2.5 year old loved the hotel, especially the elevators. Breakfast was awesome. Omlete made to order. Was switching hotels and ability to check in early really was a godsend when traveling with young child

title: Beautiful room and accommodations
review: Thank you so much for staying with us for your first Disney experience with your toddler!  I'm so happy you enjoyed so many aspects and that we were able to get you in to your suite early.  We look forward to hosting you again soon!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites Orlando I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great experience
review: This hotel was so pretty and the accommodations were impeccable. We enjoyed our stay and look forward to coming back soon. The evening reception was very nice and we enjoyed the down time this afforded us

title: A hidden gem in the heart of International Drive
review: I'm so happy you had such a great experience and found our hotel to be impeccable!  We can't wait to welcome you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites Orlando I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great Stay
review: Everything you want to do is within walking distance! Great service and staff. I will definitely book here again! Only had a slight issue with water temp in bathtub. It took a few minutes to get hot and then when it did get hot, it took awhile for it to cool down.

title: Very Nice
review: I stayed here during a trip to Universal. I was meeting a friend who lives in the area. The room is very clean and spacious. There was an evening reception with snacks and drinks. Breakfast is decent. The omelet station is especially nice! The hotel is within walking distance to I-drive attractions. I would stay here again with my family. Very good stay for the value!

title: Very low shower pressure
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Caitie and I appreciate you taking time to share your experience!  I'm so happy that you enjoyed the location, evening reception and breakfast and we can't wait to see you again soon!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites Orlando I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great stay
review: Very frustrating shower experience due to the extremely low shower pressure.  When they remodeled the bathroom they used flow limiting shower head with very low water pressure.  They said they could not fix the shower pressure since it is due to the kind of shower head they installed.  It ruined the whole trip.

title: Awesome employees!!
review: Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback.  I'm so sorry to hear you had issues with low water pressure.  That's not a normal issue that we have so I will follow up with my team to make sure I fully understand the challenge so we can get it corrected.    Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Clean, friendly but NOT work friendly
review: The hotel, staff and room were 5 star! Excellent complimentary breakfast and the kids loved the pool! I wish we were there for longer but it was a quick overnight for an early volleyball tournament. Great hotel!

title: STAY AWAY!!!!!
review: Mattress was squeaky so I couldn't sleep at all. Every time I moved the mattress would squeak and wake me up. The valet was lost when we arrived and when we went to pick up the car they gave me the wrong car and then when I corrected the problem they didn't believe that I had paid for valet. What an unpeasant experiance!

title: Beware
review: I'm so sorry you had such a poor experience with us Mark.  Our mattresses were all just replaced with brand new ones during our recent renovation and we don't typically have this issue so my Engineering team is going to follow up and see what the cause could be.  I've also followed up with my valet team as it is unacceptable for them to give you the wrong car and question whether or not you paid for services.  Please let me know if there is any way we can make this right for you and if I can be of assistance in any manner.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites Orlando I-Drive Convention Center

title: Awesome!
review: During my short one night stay 15 cars were broken into, including mine.  Had to argue with hotel staff to assist in helping vacuum up glass and debris from the cars.  No security whatsoever at this location, but they charge you for self-parking.   Never again!

title: Great stay good location breakfast just was very good but will stay here again staff was fantastic pool was small but ni
review: Thank you for your feedback and I'm very sorry about the incident that occurred.  We take security very seriously and partner closely with our Orange County Sheriff's department who have assured us that they will be increasing patrols in our parking lot and in the area.  This was an isolated incident and the first time we've had this issue and will do everything we can to ensure it does not happen again.    Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Awesome Hotel! Great location! Great for families!
review: Everything about our stay was great! Room is clean and comfortable, staff is super attentive. Breakfast is delicious. Hotel is close to a number of attractions. There is even a car rental place right at the hotel, which makes it even more convenient. Great experience!

title: Not my favorite embassy
review: Of course beds are decent and area is clean and secure. This embassy is missing a little Something. Not quite up to the standard that I expect from the brand. Breakfast is nice mgr reception pretty blah.

title: Thanks for all
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Karen and I'm so happy you found our hotel to be clean and secure and breakfast so enjoyable.  I'm very sorry our managers reception fell below your expectation and would love to know more of your thoughts so we can continue to make it a wonderful experience for all of our guests.  Please feel free to reach out at your convenience to gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Anniversary weekend
review: Your team members are amazing. We have a great time there, the breakfast is so good, have turkey bacon (I can’t eat pork). The concierge services is good and we earned 500 hilton honors points. Thank again for all.

title: Can't eat breakfast if you want to be at Disney before it opens...
review: Thank you so much for staying with us again Jeannette!  I'm so happy you enjoyed your stay.  I wanted to let you know we do have turkey bacon during breakfast and we keep it at our omelet station so they can make it fresh for you.  We can't wait to welcome you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Family trip
review: My husband and I felt so special during our stay, the staff went above and beyond. The location is great, right in the middle of lots of food and activities. The room we had was spacious and comfortable.

title: Embassy Suites by Hilton
review: Room was clean and had all the amenities needed. Staff kept in touch to ensure your stay was going well. Bed was very comfortable. Overall experience was great. There was nothing negative about the stay. I would recommend it.

title: Much improved
review: What a great review thank you so much sharing Tamone!  I'm so happy our team took such great care of you and that you had a wonderful stay!  Come back and see us soon!  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Good hotel but expect to pay extra for everything!
review: We used to stay here but the hotel had some problems years ago with musty rooms etc.  Not anymore.  All rooms were updated and comfortable.  The hotel lobby and breakfast area recieved very modern updates and is really quite pleasing to sit at.  We will stay again next year for our convention.

title: Extended Stay - theme park holiday for group
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Ross and for sharing your great experience!  I appreciate you recognizing all of our efforts to make your stay more enjoyable and we can't wait to welcome you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great location, nice staff
review: The hotel was great looking in a great location on international drive with 4 glass elevators(1 was down for my entire stay causing a lot of waiting). Lobby is beautiful with friendly staff. Breakfast is the usual spread  expected for a complimentary breakfast (no waffles though). The omelet station is not vegetarian friendly since the meat is placed on the cooktop then eggs added. Note there isn’t much breakfast options for vegetarians and the few items available is placed between the meat dishes( I got bits of bacon mixed in my potatoes because a spoon from it was used by someone to dish out potatoes).   The room was clean and spacious.   The added costs: -Self Parking was $15 per night and at nights parking was difficult to get a spot.  -Packages were $5 each after the first…

title: Easy Access to everything
review: Love staying at this property. It is close to everything, easy to get in and out of and the entire staff is always very nice. Drinks at the reception were cold and there are a lot of places nearby to spend a delightful and fun evening.

title: Accomdafe and better understand people who travel with company certificate!
review: Thank you so much for staying with us again Toby and for sharing your great experience!  I'm glad everything was perfect and we look forward to hosting you again and again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Excellent lodging
review: Learn to be better accomidating. Especially when the reservation is made 5 moths in,adavance. Please do not leave the person on hold on the phone for 40 minutes before they board there plane not funny!!

title: Very Disappointed
review: I'm very sorry to hear you had such a negative experience Erika and apologize that our team were not more accommodating.  40 minutes on hold is certainly unacceptable and I can appreciate your frustration.  I'd love to know more about the specific details of your stay so I can ensure we follow up and coach our team to make sure this doesn't happen again.  Please feel free to reach out to me at your convenience at Gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Excellent Stay!
review: One of the best hotels I've stayed in. Professional, courteous staff. Clean and large suites.  Breakfast and happy hour a great benefit. Location is nice with food a short walk.  Easy to get around this area.

title: Horrible sleep noisy
review: You can hear sound from the center of the hotel because the  dining area door has a gap about 2" on the bottom.  And the sliding glass door does not have any weather striping so you can hear a wind sound from the interstate I 4. You can also hear sound when water goes down the drain in the living are from the upper levels I was in room 523 . Checked in September 6 thru the 9th.

title: Hurricane Dorian evacuation relief
review: Thank you for staying with us Scott and I appreciate you bringing this issue of noise to our attention.  I already have my Chief Engineer investigating as the sliding glass door in this suite is brand new and should not have any wind coming in.  We will make sure we get this fixed immediately.  If there is anything else we could have done to make your stay more enjoyable please don't hesitate to reach out to let us know.    Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Floridians taking a break
review: Everything about this hotel and the staff was exceptional during our Hurricane Dorian stay. Every time you walked by a staff member they would greet you and ask if you needed anything and if you knew where you were headed. The breakfast buffet was delicious, had an abundance of food and was kept clean throughout. The manager opened a conference room and scheduled two days of kids activities, when there was a threat visitors may be stuck inside due to the storm. They clearly communicated their plan and policies through individually delivered letters, written professionally and courteously.  The staff worked with us when our reservation changed several times over several days. My kids and I could not have chosen a better location!

title: Stayed here for a family reunion in August! Great accommodations.
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful experience.  I'm very happy you found our team members to be so friendly and helpful and that you were able to enjoy so many of our amenities.  We hope to see you again soon under better circumstances!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Girls weekend
review: Nice rooms, great location, and friendly staff. Convenient to all the I-drive attractions. Very reasobable room rates, free breakfast, and daily cocktails. You should definitely stay here the next time you are in Orlando!

title: Nice stay away from the "Mouse"
review: Generally typical Embassy Suites experience...  Big, comfortable room- Free breakfast and nightly cocktail reception- Open atrium- etc.  Painfully slow (and bouncy) elevators.  Stayed for a recent conference and had a pleasant business experience.  Staff was a mixed bag of super friendly and helpful, to disinterested and aloof.  Also had a "Vacations by Hilton" salesperson trying to weasel his way into our group conversation while in the lobby.  Way too many texts from the hotel asking about my experience.  Jut one would have sufficed!  A (much needed) upgrade of the WiFi system was taking place during my stay, with some drilling into walls going on from time-to-time.    All-in-all would recommend this hotel if you want to stay in a good/value location away from "The Mouse."

title: Wonderful Staff & Stay during stressful hurricane evacuation
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your great experience!  I'm so glad you enjoyed our big comfortable suites, complimentary cooked to order breakfast and evening managers reception and that you found most of our team to be super friendly and helpful.  I also appreciate you recognizing our efforts to improve our Wi-Fi experience for future stays.  We can't wait to welcome you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: NOT RECOMMENDED IF YOU WANT SLEEP
review: With the recent hurricane our family was forced to evacuate our barrier island.  The Embassy Suites International Drive / Convention Center hotel welcomed evacuees with flexibility regarding domesticated pets and check-in and check-out times.  The staff were gracious and welcoming to extended families of all ages.  The hotel had made special arrangements to keep their guests comfortable and entertained during the  expected long hours of the storm.  The hotel opened ballrooms for family oriented movies and popcorn.  The staff kept their guests informed about plans for potential power outages, and special arrangements to feed guests during the storm. The staff of Embassy Suites were cheerfully helping evacuees while having left their own families and homes during the storm.  Thank…

title: Mostly excellent - just a few issues
review: What an amazing response Mindy thank you so much for sharing!  I'm so happy our team took such great care of you and your family during this past week and it means a lot to us that you recognize all of the effort the team puts into their craft.  We look forward to your next stay with blue skies and sunshine!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great Staff
review: The hotel and its staff are brilliant, managers reception and breakfast Ok. However if your unfortunate enough to get a room that has the I4 at the rear, you can forget trying to sleep unless you have ear defenders on. I informed the management whose advice was they would provide us with ear plugs or move me to the front of the hotel,, ,,however they explained that we would then suffer the noise from the bars opposite. So we slept in the living area of the room only to have children running up and down outside. Not the children's fault as they were on holiday having a good time ,We Didn't. Management  reimbursed me with what I had paid but it couldn't replace the sleep we lost. The management also are fully aware of the situation but DO NOT bring it to the notice of customers.…

title: Lovely Hotel
review: Staying here at present with my wife for 5 nights location of hotel is very good for restaurants and theme parks. Food at breakfast very good with good variety, evening drinks good also with snacks. Previously we believe lifts very slow we never found any problems and Wi Fi very good, my only issue would be ladies looking after evening snacks are very slow and bad mannered seriously abrupt to a young child

title: Decent value
review: What great feedback Gerry I truly appreciate you sharing. I’m so happy you and your wife are enjoying so many aspects of your stay with us. I’m going to speak with my food and beverage team regarding your observations as we need to be friendly with everyone as well as expeditious.   Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Trip to Orlando
review: Modernized hotel that looks overall very nice. Room was generally very nice as well. Front desk service was a bit slow and the outside noise (being off of I4) kept me up and woke me up a few times. Reception was nice although the snacks are kind of junk but breakfast was good.

title: One too many
review: Thank you for staying with us Justin and I appreciate your feedback.  I'm glad you enjoyed our modern look and fantastic breakfast.  I'm sorry you had some challenges with noise from the interstate.  We are in the process of replacing all of the windows and sliding glass doors in our guest rooms which will alleviate much of that issue moving forward.  We look forward to your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Orlando

title: Wonderful Stay
review: I’ve been to Orlando 10+ times over the past 13 years and I have to honestly say this has been my BEST experience Out of all the hotels I’ve stayed in. Front desk is extremely helpful and hospitable. Someone is always there to greet you and ask about your visit any hours of the day. The cleaning and house keeping staff does a great job in maintaining the property at a 5 star status. Rosa(cleaning staff/supervisor I think) was always making sure our room was to our satisfaction made sure no one was ever disturbed.  Jose (front desk AM) is superb, he was checking in on all the clients at least every other day to assure our stay is beyond satisfactory. Carlos(Chef) personally came out to make sure our meal was exactly how we wanted  down in the Restaurant.

title: Best Hotel I have stayed at
review: The best hotel i have stayed at, the complementary breakfast is the best compared to any hotel. The rooms are the cleanest and the staff is amazing and to the T! Will be staying for Embassy for years to come!

title: Improve check in/dated bathroom
review: This is so wonderful to hear thank you so much for staying with us Juan and for sharing your truly wonderful experience.  We can't wait to see you again!  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great service and excellent staff.
review: It took me 30 minutes to get checked in due to the staff lack of organization! Bathroom had super drainage issues and was dated.  The manager special evening reception staff was really nice and Michelle was nice as well when I checked out

title: Good location
review: Thank you for sharing your feedback Dr. Wiggins and I'm very sorry you experience such a long wait for check in as well as issues with drainage in your bathroom.  I will be following up with my teams to determine what caused these issues and to ensure they do not happen again.  Please feel free to reach out to me directly if there is anything else I can assist with at Gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301.  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Family holiday
review: Great service and excellent staff. We were treated like royalty from the minute we got there. We enjoyed the breakfast and happy hour as well. The location was great eith the trolley which only cost $7 for 3 days!!!

title: Nice
review: Exceeding my expectations. Rooms looked like they were newly renovated.a lot of space . I loved the eveninng receptions and it’s location on international drive . Will be recommending to friends .....

title: Great
review: I'm so happy to hear how much you enjoyed your time with us and that we exceeded your expectations!  We look forward to hosting your next visit as well as your friends!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Average Stay
review: I have a great time at this location. The location was the best and the services made the stay a plus. I always will look to stay at the embassy in any  city I go to. This was a birthday get away for my friend and see loved it.

title: In the Heart of the action!
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful experience!  I'm so thrilled you enjoyed your stay for your friends birthday and we very much look forward to your next visit with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great Location!
review: I was here for 1 night only. My room was ok...clean & plenty of room. I stopped by for breakfast this morning. It was not very good at all.  I had eggs & bacon which tasted funny....so I didn’t eat them. I went and got a kiwi drink out of a fountain & it tasted funny. I decided to get OJ and it was watered down. It’s very unusual to have so many breakfast items not tasting good.

title: very beautiful hotel, pleasant staff, great location on the drive
review: very beautiful hotel,  clean rooms   pleasant staff, great location on the drive lots of restaurants to choose from in walking distance ideal location for family. great hot breakfast, cant beat the omelet station

title: Awesome stay
review: I'm thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed our great property, location, friendly team and breakfast!  I love our omelet station as well!  we can't wait to welcome you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Above Average
review: Always love ❤️ to stay at this property. Great area. Lots to do within walking distance. Excellent staff. José and Alexis will handle any situation that arises. Definitely recommend the Orlando Convention Center Embassy Suites.

title: I'll be back
review: What a lovely review thank you so much for staying with us again and for sharing your great experience!  I'm so happy Jose and Alexis always take great care of you and we can't wait to welcome you back again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Vacation
review: Above average for the location of the property. My wife and I wanted somewhere to retreat to for the weekend and it was the best place in the area we were traveling near. The breakfast was the best part, we woke up early for the breakfast every morning. The rooms weren't the most clean and the beds weren't the most comfortable but overall it was good. $15 a day parking fee is a bit much I think though when you paid $140+ a night for the room.

title: Great hotel
review: With a convenient location. We were close to everything we wanted to do. You can't bet the value of the embassy. It's one of my go to choices. This location seemed remodeled. Very up to date, clean, and comfortable.

title: Improved... but next time Airbnb.
review: It's so great to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us and I truly appreciate you taking the time to share!  I agree with have a perfect location and I so happy you found our renovated property clean and comfortable.  Until next time!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Awesome
review: Pros Have stayed several times at this hotel and have witnessed the improvement and the remodeling performed at the property. The front desk as well as the evening reception areas are well furnished with a modern touch.  The room well appointed and clean. Beds in good shape, comfortable mattresses. Sofa bed mattress could be improved.  Delightful breakfast and good evening reception.  Hotel employees at the breakfast area and the employees who work with maintenance and cleaning have an A+; they are excellent and provide an awesome service. Gym area is adequate with several modern machines to chose from.  The hotel is in an excellent location.  Cons During my 7 nights stay only three from four elevators were in working condition. Waited a long time for the elevator since the…

title: Just okay
review: Thank you for staying with us and for taking time to share your feedback. I'm very happy to hear you loved our breakfast, evening reception and location.  I'm very sorry to hear that our front office team was not warm and welcoming as that is something we pride ourselves on.  I will also be sharing this information with our valet team as we can do a much better job keeping traffic flow moving even during peak periods.  I'd love the opportunity to speak with you about the specifics of your stay at your convenience and can be reached anytime at Gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301. I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Alright
review: The property was clean. Staff was exceptional.No issues during our stay... the complimentary breakfast was amazing as was the complimentary happy hour. Check in and check out was completely hassle free.

title: Review g
review: My family had a great stay .Everyone was helpful and kind. The hotel was clean and comfortable. We had a pleasant stay .We look forward to staying at another Embassy suites the next time we travel. Thanks

title: My mistake, but Robert made my day!
review: How great to hear from you Tarran and thank you so much for staying with us!  I'm glad you had a pleasant stay and we can't wait to host you again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Mini-vacation
review: I had booked the incorrect Embassy Suites, there are two within a few miles of each other on International Drive in Orlando. Robert at the front desk was just super about helping me cancel the other reservation (without penalty) and got me into a great room on the Premium Floor. Spacious, lovely room and managers welcome with free drinks and snacks. Then a delicious breakfast in their very spacious breakfast area. Quite a selection of wonderful food, juice, coffee, etc. The staff was on the spot and offered excellent service at every opportunity. Always book a Hilton!

title: Impressive
review: I'm so thrilled that Robert took such great care of you and was able to help you get a reservation at the correct hotel.  He is a wonderful member of our team that always provides great service.  We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you are in Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Dirty
review: Excellent hotel! Awesome breakfast and evening reception. Nice room plenty of space. Awesome amenities and great location. Walking distance to awesome restaurants and attractions. I will be visiting again!

title: Good location, services and accommodation
review: The location is very good, close to the Icon Park and a variety of restaurants. The rooms are spacious, clean and functional. The breakfast is average but there is an option of Starbucks coffe to buy near the reception.

title: Great stay
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Lu and I appreciate you sharing your positive experience.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great service, friendly staff. Avoid a room that faces the interstate, the noise is loud.
review: Great place to lay your head away from home. Room was spacious with the option to utilize internet. The suite provided options to have a work area and a sleep area. Breakfast options were really good and fresh. Evening reception had great snacks, kinda wished it had a little more substance similar to breakfast.

title: I won’t be back
review: It's so wonderful to hear what a lovely stay you had with us.  I'm so glad you enjoyed our spacious suites, breakfast and evening reception!  We can't wait to welcome you back.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Spacious
review: Property was clean, bed was neat and orderly and it wasn't packed like other hotels around the area. The downside to the trip was the amount of highway noise that made its way into the room, preventing a full nights rest.

title: Absolutely awesome
review: This hotel absolutely exceeded our expectation! The suite was huge and crazy nice! The staff was super helpful. We were amazed the price was so low. It could’ve been double the cost and we would’ve paid with no complaints

title: Home away from home
review: These are the kinds or reviews that we love to get!  Thank you so much for sharing and I appreciate you choosing to stay with us.  I'm so happy our team was super helpful and you enjoyed our large renovated suites.  We can't wait to see you on your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Long wait for room!
review: From the excellent front desk service at check in to their “Can do” attitude when resolving a quick issue for me, I was already sold. Hotel is clean, tastefully decorated. The two room suites are great and works great if traveling with children. Top that off with a full breakfast, made to order omelette and the free drinks at the daily evening reception and you have a well done hotel stay. They also have an indoor/outdoor pool for those rainy Orlando summers. Keep it up. One of my top picks for 2019!

title: No wifi? Bad business
review: What an amazing review thank you so much for sharing!  I'm so glad our excellent front office team took such great care of you and that you enjoyed so many of our awesome features and amenities.  Thank you for choosing us as a top pick for 2019 and we can't wait until your next stay!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: The Best!
review: My family of 6 stayed here after our cruise for one night to fly out in the morning. We got to the hotel early so I knew our room probably wouldn’t be ready right away. When we checked in they said we could get in our room around 1pm. They would text me when it was ready. We sat in the lobby and watched many people come in after us and get a room. So finally at 2 pm I asked if it was ready yet. We waited for another half hour to get confirmation that it was ready. So who knows how long it was ready and we could’ve been in our room. Then it took a good 4 minutes for the elevator to come down. We had to leave at 4:30 am the shuttle was great the driver couldn’t have been nicer & the room was very clean & nice! If I had been texted like I was promised and didn’t have to wait long…

title: Great place to stay. Everyone was very helpful and the location is perfect.
review: Had a great time! All of the employees were very friendly and helpful . You can walk to many places including restaurants, bars, shopping and entertainment. Close to Disney parks but away from the traffic. About 5 minutes from Universal Studios .Very clean place to stay. I would definitely stay here again .

title: EmbassySuites International Drive, Orlando
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and I'm so happy you had such an amazing experience!  I'm also really happy to hear that our team took such great care of you.  We can't wait to welcome you back during your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Nice attentive staff at an Embassy Suites that needs fine tuning and improved food quality
review: This is a great hotel. Clean and friendly staff. Great complimentary breakfast. Close to the convention center and good restaurants. Very family friendly, but also quiet. The air conditioning is wonderful. The beds are very comfortable. Good nights sleep.

title: Excellent Customer Service/Comfortable Stay
review: I'm so happy to hear what a wonderful experience you had with us Maria and truly appreciate you taking the time to share. We can't wait to welcome you back for your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-drive Convention Center

title: Clean& friendly!
review: Typical older Embassy Suites.  Staff at check in, during stay, in restaurant and hotel engineer were all top notch.  Very professional and attentive.  Several problems though with quality of stay.  Problems were: 1. AC would not cool room.  Hotel engineer called and fixed the AC.  This is the third Hilton property I've stayed at recently with faulty room AC and / or thermostat was set to not go below 68 degrees.  I guess that's Hilton's new policy 2.  Ordered dinner entree salad with sliced steak at hotel's restaurant called Bar Meets Grill.  Steak was all fat and gristle.  Really bad and chef put hot fatty steak on salad greens so salad was wilty and warm.  Really nasty.  Also hotel allows free Happy Hour guests to come into restaurant and sit at tables and drink their beers…

title: Great for a group!
review: Great destination for a large group!  There is plenty to do in the vicinity and lots of restaurants within walking distance.  It would be a good venue for a family reunion or for us a photography group meetup.

title: Great trip to Orlando thanks to Jan
review: I couldn't agree with you more that we are a fantastic location for groups big and small!  We also host numerous family reunions and they love it!  I'm very happy you had such a great experience during your scavenger meeting and we look forward to welcoming you back again and again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Oasis
review: Early February 2019 I started planning my trip to Disney World in Orlando Fl with my mother and granddaughter.  We wanted to celebrate both their birthdays, Ava was turning 7 and my mother was turning 82.   I booked my hotel at the Embassy Suite by Hilton Orlando International Dr. Center for 4/20/19 – 4/26/19.  Since then I have been communicating with Jan Dimova at the concierge desk in the Embassy Suite by Hilton Orlando International Dr Convention Ctr.   I must tell you it has been a pleasure working with Jan, I hadn’t been to Disney in over 25 years.  Jan was able to coordinate our vacation for us which made it a vacation we will never forget.  My granddaughter Ava will cherish the time she spent with her grandmother and great grandmother ad Disney for the rest of her life. …

title: Thank You
review: Wow what an amazing story!  Jan is truly wonderful and I'm so happy that she took such great care of you and your family during your time with us.  Providing a great experience and helping guests make memories is what we are all about.  We look forward to seeing you again in August!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Wonderfull Stay !!
review: Man, I tell you guys what Embassy is worth every penny you spend. My experience has been top notch from check in. I am now a loyal patron. I love the elevators, breakfast with customized omelets and buffet style. The rooms are spacious clean and there is travel guides. The front desk is smiles and manners in Orlando. Love it!! Rachel, Cassie Johana Mr Greg and Jose were very warm and accommodating. They even give you a I Trolley pass with unlimited rides. I am hooked definitely  have won my business. Please book your stay the location is awesome as the people.

title: Excellent hotel!
review: I had a wonderful stay at this hotel. Excellent staff and service. Very clean! Great location. Absolutely loved the complimentary breakfast, especially the omelette station and  happy hour.  Would stay here again!

title: Love the Embassy
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful experience!  I'm so happy our team took such great care of you and that you loved our cooked to order breakfast and evening reception.  We can't wait for your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Embassy Excellence
review: I love the Embassy Suites out of all the Hilton Hotels. Hilton Honors program by far is the best rewards program for hotels. I think they should bring more of the amenities of the Embassy to other hotels.

title: Very nice stay
review: I'm thrilled you had such a great experience and that you are a huge fan of our brand!  It's always my first choice whenever I travel.  We can't wait to welcome you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Very enjoyable stay.
review: Clean, roomy suites are offered at this hotel. Many extras like free breakfast and complimentary welcome cocktail party. Perfect location. Within walking distance to Pointe Orlando & ICON Park. Very comfortable accomodations.

title: Great time at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Orlando
review: I decided on this hotel only based on the location and availability for SAP Sapphire 2019. Later realized that everything was perfect. I will definitely come back every year. Thank you and keep up the good work

title: Good for business travel
review: I'm thrilled to hear you had such a good experience during the SAP convention and we can't wait to welcome you back again next year!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: A/C
review: Was here for a conference. For that purpose its OK. Not much to do in this hotel besides sleeping but there are a lot of bars, cafes, restaurants around so that shouldn't be a problem. Also good for shopping as the Outlet bus drives past often. Rooms are spacious and decently equipped.

title: Love this hotel!
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your great experience.  I'm so happy to hear you enjoyed our great location and clean spacious suites.  We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: This is the Friendliest place on earth!
review: Every thing was great except the A/C could not be controlled. I froze over night. Other than that it was good clean, and Embassy breakfast is always on point. Again room was just too cold for me, didn't sleep well.

title: Nicest Embassy I’ve been too
review: This embassy is one of the cleanest I’ve been too. It seems to have been updated like some others I’ve been too. It’s right in the middle of all the attractions and a good value. Breakfast buffet and nightly socials are always a bonus!

title: Fabulous Stay
review: I'm so glad to hear you found our property to be so clean and one of the nicest you have been to!  We have been recently renovated and I agree with you that our location is fantastic!  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Getting ready
review: FABULOUS!!!!.......My check in was not the smoothest. There was an issue with my authorization form my employer. Robert @ the front desk showed GREAT patience and understanding. His assistance was very good. I didn't expect that @ first. My suite was nice, clean and spacious. Restaurant and room service was GREAT & FAST. The COMPLIMENTARY BREAKFAST IS THE BEST IN THE BUSINESS!!!👍🏾 (The evening snack could us some work) EVERYONE was NICE & PLEASANT. I have ALWAYS been pleased with my stay @ ANY EMBASSY SUITES!!! OH!!! The burger@ Bar Meets Grill Restaurant ( On- site ) was D....LISH......US!!! Your boy "The RIBOLOGIST" IS OUT ✌🏾

title: Stanchions
review: I'm so thrilled to hear how fantastic your stay was and really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  I agree our breakfast is the best around and am so happy my team took such great care of you.  We look forward to your next stay with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Lack of overall cleanliness and general upkeep.
review: Trying to check in and freshen up before a graduation. The front desk made it quick and easy. The room was clean and neat. The breakfast was very good and helped us to get our day started well. Lots to do close by.

title: Awesome Hotel Stay
review: My wife and I throughly enjoyed our stay at this Embassy Suites. We were welcomed by Jose Balcacer, the front office manager who shared all the extras included in our stay. The restaurant was great with great food.  The complimentary breakfast was outstanding.  This is our 3rd visit and enjoyed every second of our stay.

title: Nice hotel
review: Thank you so much for the outstanding review and for staying with us again!  I'm so happy Jose took great care of you and that you and your wife enjoyed everything!  We look forward to providing many more great experiences for you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: International Dr
review: Stayed 2 nights and was very happy with everything. The room was huge and clean. The breakfast was great and the evening reception was nice. It was a bit to cold for the outdoor pool but the indoor pool and hot tub were great.

title: Love it here!
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your lovely experience.  I'm glad you enjoyed our spacious and clean suites and that our breakfast and evening reception hit the spot.  We can't wait to welcome you back during your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Best stay at a hotel I've ever had!
review: This was an excellent pick for those traveling with the family or even as couples. They offer wide variety of opportunities to venture out on. Being on the main strip your walking distance from a lot of restaurants and bars.

title: Great Property
review: Spent a week here at this property, and I would like to say that it was one of the better Hilton properties that I have been to. My wife adored the view, as we could see the pool and rides across the street from the hotel. I would definitely recommend this hotel to those who are traveling in the area.

title: Good Time as Always
review: It's great to hear how much you and your wife enjoyed your stay with us and that the view was everything you wanted!  Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience and we can't wait to host your next trip to Orlando.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Concierge service
review: f I could give this Hotel 4.5 stars I would and the only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because the drain in the shower was slow. But other than that the hotel was great, from check in to check out. The staff as whole was awesome. The Embassy Suites have become our new favorite as well as go to Hotel going forward. Clean, accommodating, a two hour complimentary happy hour and a wonderful breakfast that included made to order omelettes, potatoes, grits, sausage , bacon, fruit etc.... and not to mention the late checkout (to sleep off the late night activities). Not bad even though I didn't pay attention to the address when I booked the room, meant to book the location Embassy Suites down the street but hey this one was still a winner!

title: Another great Hilton property
review: I'm so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that our team was awesome!  I'm also glad to hear you are a big fan of our brand as Embassy's are my favorite hotels to stay in when I travel as well.  I'm sorry that you had issues with your shower drain.  I'd love to know the suite you were staying in so we can address the issue so future guests don't have the same challenge.  Please feel free to reach out to me at your convenience at Gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301.  We look forward to your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Coverings 2019
review: My stay at this hotel was amazing. I had the opportunity to speak with a beautiful and wonderful lady name Jan Dimova who works in guest services. She helped me and my family get tickets to Universal, Disney and to a fun filled show at Mangos. She was so sweet and kind helpful. There were always to other ladies Sanina and Laura who were simply amazing and sweet as well. All three of these ladies rock. I will highly recommend guests to  definitely use the guest  concierge services. If u see Jan please  say you rock Jan. Thank you for everything. We love u from Rachal Perez Samiyyah, Gary Jones and family.

title: Great Hotel for Work & Play!
review: Embassy Suites on International Drive allows you to achieve work life balance!  I was there for a convention, but the family got to enjoy all the amenities and attractions!  Embassy provides convenient shuttles to theme parks (to/from) and offers proximity to Convention Center.  Everybody enjoyed rolling out of bed with made to order breakfast! Everybody appreciated managers reception!  It was a successful and memorable trip!

title: Nice Hotel - Walking distance to Convention Center/Restaurants
review: What a terrific review thank you so much for sharing!  I'm so happy to hear while you were attending your convention that your family was able to relax and enjoy many of our amenities.  We pride ourselves on being able to offer something for everyone and it's great to see when that works to perfection!  We can't wait to see you again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Best Embassy that I've every visited
review: This was a nice hotel walking distance to the convention center and nearby to many nice restaurants and "The Pointe" where there is a movie theater, restaurants, and shops.  Very convenient for me attending a convention.  I stayed on Floor 7 the "Premium Floor".  The snacks and drinks were complimentary on this floor which was really nice!  It was a 2 room suite with a wet bar, coffee make, refrigerator, and microwave.  Bathroom was a little small, but it was nice and clean and a big vanity area and nice amenities.    Bed was very comfortable and clean with fluffy soft pillows and a firm mattress.    Free breakfast in the morning was very nice with a lot of variety and even gluten free options.  Eggs, bacon, sausage, biscuits+ gravy, pancakes, oatmeal, cereal fruit, yogurt,…

title: Very Good Stay
review: It's so great to hear how much you enjoyed your stay and I truly appreciate you taking time to share.  I agree we have the perfect location and our breakfast can't be beat!  I also appreciate your feedback regarding our elevators.  I have scheduled our maintenance company to come out and verify they are running at maximum efficiency as they were fully refurbished just a few years ago.  We look forward to welcoming you back again.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Amazing business trip
review: Excellent stay.  I have absolutely nothing negative to say.  This was the best hotel stay that I have ever had.  FANTASTIC JOB!!!  I truly will stay again - and will tell everyone about this jewel of a hotel.

title: Conference Trip that became the Matrix
review: So like a lot of people visited Orlando for a conference.  Being a Hilton I thought this would be a flash hotel. Unfortunately this hotel was much the Matrix. For those who don't know what I am saying its all about the peak of US culture and progress was late 1980's to early 1990's.  A waterfall that fell 3 floors into the main hall but meant the whole hotel smelt damp and musty was interesting.   Breakfast was free and included but I think they have two pieces of fruit on offer. Bucket loads of fried stuff ie the bacon is good but otherwise heart attach city. Coffee don't even bother get it when you leave for anywhere but here.  Room is not too bad ie the bed was fairly comfortable, odd lounge room particularly as my curtains were broken so only sheers to stop everyone going…

title: Not to Embassy standards
review: I'm very sorry to hear you had such a challenging stay Garth.  Based on your description it sounds like you were staying at our sister Embassy the Embassy Suites I-Drive 360 as we do not have a waterfall nor curtains in our living rooms.  We'd love to host you on your next visit to restore your faith in the Embassy brand as well as Hilton.  Have a great day.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Excellent Hotel
review: This is by far the worse Embassy I have ever stayed. The elevator was not working, the tub was chipped like it had been painted, the carpets look like it was not vacuumed properly, ran out of hot water, the omelet cooks did not know how to make a proper omelet and the happy hour snacks were not what I expected. Overall, one of the worse Embassy suites.

title: End your day at home away from home
review: I appreciate your feedback from your recent stay and would love the opportunity to speak with you more about the challenges you had while on property.  Please feel free to reach out to me at your convenience at 407-581-4301 or Gregory.rice@hilton.com.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Higher then 5 stars
review: Beautiful hotel with spacious suites and great amenities- pool (Indoor & outdoor), restaurant, free breakfast and happy hour.  All Staff were friendly and accommodating. The complimentary shuttle to Disney and Universal were helpful.  Great location with many bars and restaurants nearby and a Walgreens.

title: Another great stay at the Embassy Suites
review: Having just stayed for 9 nights I have to say yet another great big thank you to the management and staff, all who go out of their way to make us feel welcome and important. Our room as usual was big and clean and kept clean and fresh throughout our stay. The breakfast was always fresh and with plenty of choice, omelettes are brilliant The evening reception 5.30-7.30 is much appreciated if we're back in time. Had a very busy visit this time so didn't get chance to use either of the pools, but they are usually clean and great for a welcome refreshing dip at the end of the day. Thanks in particular go to Robert, Jose and Cathy for making us feel so welcome The hotel is in a great location with many many restaurants and attractions within easy walking distance. Would I stay again…

title: Basic room with living room
review: Lynn and Paul thank you so much for staying with us again and I truly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience!  I've shared your praises with Robert, Jose and Kathy and they are very grateful.  We hope to see you again next year but look forward to the entire crew coming back in 2021!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Wonderful stay Great Staff
review: Just a normal basic room with living room. Not really up to date. Perfect location to airport.  Didn't like we had to pay $16.00 to park car in there parking lot.  This is a good place for 1 night to go to airport in morning.

title: A Great Business Stay
review: Thank you for the response Eileen but I believe you have the wrong property.  We are the Embassy at the Convention Center in Orlando and there is another property at the airport that charges $16 per day for parking.  Next time you are in Orlando you should stay with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great hotel for business trip!
review: I stayed recently on a business trip.  At first during check in I was a little worried because the hotel had a large swimming competition of young people staying at the property.  I was pleasantly surprised.  My 4 nights here were very enjoyable.  My room was quite and although a bit dated it was clean and the staff was amazing!  I experianced an issue in my bathroom with water leaking from the room above.  It was addressed professionally and courteously be the hotel staff.  I look forward to return again soon.  Thank you!

title: Great stay
review: Traveled for business- had a great stay. Friendly staff and clean rooms. Shuttle service was useful and helpful during my trip. Bar staffing were friendly and in room dining was fast and well made. Thanks for the hospitality!

title: Business Trip
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for the great review!  I'm happy you enjoyed our clean rooms, shuttle service and most importantly friendly team members.  We look forward to your next trip to Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Good time at the Embassy Suites
review: Was in town for an amazing conference and the Embassy was a selected hotel. I used Digital Key which worked perfectly. Enjoyed the night reception upon arrival and dinner. Had to leave too early for breakfast but was nice to be able to grab a coffee before leaving. Great staff all around!

title: Everything You Could Want!
review: I'm thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful stay with us Sunny and really appreciate you taking the time to share!  Our Hilton Honors app is terrific and I'm a big fan of digital key as well.  We will see you next time!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: We Loved It!
review: Nice clean spacious room, comfy beds, nice pool and hot tub, hot breakfast, GOOD COFFFEE... What more do you want?? Good value and close to the theme parks too, about a $8 UBER but they give you vouchers for a free shuttle...

title: Convention Mecca in Orlando!
review: Stayed here for the 20th annual Safe Patient Handling & Mobility conference at the Rosen International Conference just up the road. I really love the Embassy hotels for their consistent, exceptional Custer Service, beautiful facilities, excellent service offerings and most important of all, cleanliness. This location was the truest of all those characteristics.   We were treated warm and welcome by all throughout our entire stay but most importantly Jose at the front desk was the poster child of quality customer service and what it should look like!   Anytime we had any kind of an issue no matter how small they would pay attention to the matter immediately and then ask us how they could make it up to us even if it wasn’t any big deal. Of coarse, we didn’t ask for anything in…

title: Classy and convenient
review: Thank you so much Shawn!  I truly appreciate you choosing to stay with us and for sharing all your kind words about how much you enjoyed the property and especially Jose.  He is a gem and we will be sure to sing his praises on your behalf at our next huddle.  We can't wait to welcome you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Perfect for Family Vacation
review: From our late arrival to our very early check-out we were treated with courtesy and congeniality. The facilities were immaculate and so very comfortable. We enjoyed the location - walking distance to many attractions and access to the I-Ride trolley for many others. Questions were answered and helpful suggestions were given for our needs.

title: Weekend Birthday Getaway
review: It's so great to hear you had such a good time Carrell and I appreciate you sharing your feedback on our property and helpful team members.  We can't wait until your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Suite Keeper finds my Bose Headphones and returns ,,,
review: Suites are spacious for Family of 4 (plus 2). Perfect location for the Parks (Disney, Universal). Shuttle service to parks. Breakfast is awesome. Accommodating and Courteous staff, especially Mr. Jose at the front desk was very helpful. Will definitely go back next time.

title: Nice hotel.
review: This hotel is nice. The breakfast, pools, service, location all great. However, our room faced I-4. The noise outside woke me up twice, and I'm a heavy sleeper. The business center with computers very dark at night. It was hard to see the keyboard. The indoor jacuzzi didn't work 2 days of our stay. Would I stay here again? Yes, as long as it's not near the noisy side of the property. The service was excellent. The food, complimentary drinks and are wonderful. Location is great near shopping, restaurants, etc. Near theme parks.

title: My Review
review: I'm so happy to hear you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay and appreciate you sharing with us!  I'm sorry to hear the indoor Jacuzzi wasn't working while you were here and will make sure our Engineering team gets it up and running.  We look forward to hosting you again the next time you come to visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Outstanding stay
review: First time ever staying at an Embassy Suites. Last minute trip to Orlando and they had one bedroom suite available. We booked  it for three nights thru hotels.com the day before the trip.  Check-in was fast and easy. Parking is $15 per night and I knew it do no complaint there. If this bothers you you may want to reconsider.  The good:   Really nice location on International Drive  afternoon reception 0530 to 0730 complimentary liquor and light snacks.  Free breakfast made to order eggs. Also pancakes, fruit and such.   Indoor and Outdoor pool and hot tub.   I really could not find anything wrong. Both times we called, once for extra towels and another for pillows they were quick.  One issue was WiFi. My reservation with hotels.com said FREE WIFI. Try logging in to hotel wifi…

title: CARF Conference
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Robert and for sharing your great experience!  I'm so happy you enjoyed the quick check-in, made to order breakfast and evening reception.  I'm sorry there was some confusion regarding Wi-Fi.  We have reached out to hotels.com to update their website with the correct information as we only provide complimentary Wi-Fi to Hilton honors members and not to everyone.  We look forward to your next visit with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Nice place to stay
review: A real jewel on International Drive.  Hotels in this area can be very hit-and-miss, if you want a guaranteed hit, book this one.  Terrific evening reception from 5:30-7:30 with free drinks/snacks, a breakfast that's a large cut above most in terms of offerings/quality/space and clean, big rooms.  Terrific location.  Staff was super friendly and helpful.  The only real nitpick I can possibly think of is that our room had a distinct "new carpet" smell that wasn't offensive at all, more mildly unpleasant.  However, I chalked that up to what appeared to be new carpeting in the room, so I'll take the trade-off any day !  Really an all-around great stay.

title: Great Suites
review: Another great stay at Embassy Suites. Rooms are fabulous and very comfortable. It was a special anniversary for us and the staff put some extra touches in our room which was great. Great complimentary breakfast. Reception staff very helpful and pleasant at all times. Just a bit disappointed some nights when drinks served at managers reception were in plastic cups when they ran out of glasses. Great location with Miller's Ale House just over the road which is our favourite. Overall an enjoyable stay and we will be back

title: Girls trip
review: I'm so happy to hear you had such a wonderful experience Geoff and truly appreciate you taking time to share.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your special anniversary and I'm so glad our team was able to help you celebrate!  We look forward to your next stay with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great Place to stay and Perfect Location!!
review: Amazing location, great walking distance from alot of activities. Nice staff, clean room even though it smelled mildew. Great drinks at evening reception. Both indoor and outdoor Pool and hot tub were very relaxing.

title: Lovely Hotel and wonderful conference space
review: Thank you so much for having your girls trip weekend with us Mrs. Eabron and I truly appreciate you sharing your fantastic experience.  We look forward to your next visit with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Exceptional Staff
review: Stayed here with the both families for a wedding. Up to date with technology with digital keys and very service oriented. Great location! Any and everything you want or need right there on the strip and also 10 minutes away form Disney and Unversial Studios.

title: Nice getaway
review: We’ve used this hotel for local conventions previously. It’s been beautifully remodeled. The room we had was very comfortable, staff was very attentive, the evening reception was a nice touch after checking in.

title: Staff was excellent!
review: Welcome back and thank you again for choosing to stay with us!  I'm so happy to find our renovations to be just as beautiful as we do and that our team took great care of you.  We look forward to your next stay with us.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Best Orlando Hotel for Disney
review: Great location and fantastic to have the evening reception and breakfast, however the staff was just the best! Marsha at the front desk was the sweetest and extremely helpful! Doris who stocked our suite was great as well as everyone else we encountered! The only thing I’ll say is there wasn’t a towel rack in the bathroom, but we made do just fine. We’ll definitely book this hotel again!

title: Excellent experience
review: I'm thrilled to hear what a great stay you had with us Brie and even more pleased that Marsha and Doris took such great care of you!  We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you are in Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Very enjoyable stay
review: This continues to be one of my families go to hotels when we’re going to Disney. IDrive sometimes intimidates people but this hotel is easy to get in and out of and quick to Disney!  The hotel is clean and neat, complimentary breakfast is excellent and the suite makes it easy to have the whole family in one room!

title: parks and perked out
review: we choose hotel, as near all the parks, and easy to get to and from, Its on a really good part of International drive, with lots about, and near the hotel Yard House, Outback, and loads of other places to eat and see, We checked in, just in time for happy hour, after being at the park, Great room, Great service, nice Happy hour, easy to park, The room was just perfect, they gave us quite place,The staff are fantastic, from check i to check out, Breakfast is fantastic, and included in the price,Great fruit, great omlettes cooked to order,, toaster as usual slow, so get it going b4 you get your food, Pool was small, but nice, and clean, All in all great place, nice bar, great food, great place, only bad thing wi fi kept dropping, but hotel said upgrading it, was included, One of…

title: Great Location
review: What a lovely review Gertie thank you so much for sharing and for choosing to stay with us.  I agree that we have a terrific location and I'm so glad our team took fantastic care of you while you were here!  We look forward to hosting you and your family the next time you are in town.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great Location on IDrive
review: We stayed here with my family for just one night as we went to Universal for a two day trip. We got an early check in on Saturday at noon and went to Universal for the day. Every great restaurant is walking distance across the street. The hotel is next to the highway so it’s not a resort feel unless you go to indoor pool which is nice. Cook to order breakfast included made it even better. Biggest downside was the $15.95 charge we got for self parking that wasn’t explained by The discount website we booked through.

title: Embassy Suites International Drive Covention Center
review: Thank you for staying with us Steve and for sharing your great experience!  I'm so happy we were able to get you in to your suite early on Saturday and that you and your family enjoyed the location, cooked to order breakfast and indoor pool.  When you have a moment I would love to know how you booked your reservation to ensure all of our 3rd party partners have accurate information.  Please feel free to reach out at your convenience to Gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Orlando Business travel - NAFEM 2019
review: Perfect location to get to all the resort areas of Orlando have to offer. Large hotel with great lobby space to hang out or enjoy the complementary evening cocktails/breakfast buffet. Plenty of dining/drinking/entertainment options within walking distance or quickly accessible via the IDrive trolly.  Everyone we interacted with, front desk, bar and valet stand were exceedingly polite and professional. The only down side is they are lightly staffed which caused delays a few times making purchases at the front desk and retrieving the car from the valet. With a hotel this big they are a bit thin.  Our room was on the highway side of the building (I4-right there) and provided a constant hum of noise in the bedroom. We did not find this a problem but some may.

title: Good hotel
review: good location and great service.  The amenities such as breakfast and evening reception were very good. Also like the room and the layout of the lobby.  It was in walking distance of restaurants and attractions on international drive.

title: Awesome Suites
review: It's so great to hear from you Veronica and thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful experience!  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great experience!
review: Had the opportunity to stay at this Embassy Suites location and had a great visit. The facility itself is in great shape but the staff in all departments are even better. They are accommodating to the MAX.Would definitely stay there again

title: Wonderful Holiday
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for the amazing review!  We look forward to hosting you the next time you come to Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: very nice!
review: Most of the staff were very kind and helpful. The room was very nice and clean. The location was great and the amenities were useful. I would stay here again. We did have a small mix up with laundry. They told us it would be 16.00 and it ended up being almost 70.00. Check in was easy, and the breakfast was good.

title: Great location!
review: The hotel is not only close to the Disney attractions, but there are a large number of restaurants ranging from casual to more formal within walking distance of the hotel.  The Eye of Orlando and other attractions are also within a close walk of the hotel.

title: Close to Restaurants & Convention Center
review: What a wonderful review thank you so much for sharing Scott and for choosing to stay with us again!  We can't wait for your next visit in 2020!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: A nice place to stay solo, with family or friends.
review: Embassy Suites is always a good choice if you enjoy the extra space of a living area and amenities like refrigerator and microwave.  The complimentary breakfast is good, and the evening reception with free beverages is a nice perk.  I was there for a convention, so this is an excellent location.  My only problem on this visit was the first room faced the Interstate and was extremely noisy.  However, the next morning, hotel staff were extremely nice and accommodating and moved me to a quieter location.  The bathrooms at this hotel are small but there is a second sink/vanity in the bedroom that helps with morning routines.

title: Just an OK stay
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Jen and for sharing your wonderful experience.  I'm so happy you enjoyed our location, size of our suites and complimentary cooked to order breakfast and evening reception.  I'm sorry your first room was a little too noisy but I'm glad our team took great care of you and got you in a room that was much more to your liking.  We can't wait to welcome you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Light Sleepers Beware
review: A wonderful hotel at a great location on International Drive.  Check-in was a breeze.  Room was absolutely spotless.  You cannot go wrong with their buffet breakfast.  Good choices and to have eggs made to your choice, nice.Cocktail reception is very good.Close by the Convention Center, excellent restaurants within walking distance.  Universal, Disney, and or SeaWorld a short drive away.Staff friendly and courteous.

title: Relief!
review: I was at a hotel earlier in the week that someone else booked for me. It was miserable. Arriving here, to a spotless, comfortable room was refreshing and relaxing at the same time.  Great service and a very clean and comfortable facility.

title: Great hotel
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and I'm so happy we were able to turn your trip to Orlando around!  We look forward to welcoming you back during your next stay!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Awesome stay
review: We really enjoyed our stay at this Embassy Suites. The whole process was easy from reservation to check out. Complimentary breakfast was also really great, there was a variety of options and the food was good. We also really appreciated the Disney shuttle service. Saved us the hassle and price of parking onsite.

title: Great stay
review: I'm thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your time with us!  We strive to make your vacation seamless and I'm so happy we exceeded your expectations.  We can't wait until your next visit with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great Experience!
review: Awesome Hotel and Awesome Staff. Excellent ambience. Strongly recommend to all. Lots of shopping & dining places around. Complimentary breakfast and complimentary evening snacks, friendly staff with a smile.

title: Great Location, Fabulous House keeper
review: We stayed here for 5 nights and it was great, our stay was made extra special by our house keeper Kim who added lovely personal touches to our room for one of the kids birthdays and the room was always spotless clean when we arrived back after a long day! We hope to see Kim again next year when we come back!. The Hotel is in a great location as the local walgreens is 5 mins away and lots of bars and restaurants just mins walk away. The staff were lovely and the breakfast was lovely too. the Lady in the ticket office where you can buy your park tickets was very helpful too.

title: Another outstanding stay at an Embassy Suite hotel
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Mrs. Gray and for going out of your way to recognize Kim and her efforts!  She is a fantastic team member and we are very lucky to have her.  I'm also very happy you enjoyed the location and the rest of our friendly team!  We can't wait for your next visit with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great place for family
review: This is the most outstanding Embassy Suite hotel that I have ever stayed at. The staff, facilities, room, location, complimentary breakfast and manager's reception were exceptional. The only thing that I would have liked that wasn't offered was an airport shuttle service. I plan on making this Embassy Suites an annual stay!

title: Great Hotel. Great location
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for the amazing review!  I'm thrilled you had such an incredible stay and we look forward to welcoming you back again and again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Fabulous Family Florida Hotel
