review: This is a great hotel for families. Large clean rooms. Breakfast was good and attendants are right there when you finish with a plate or to answer any questions. Will definitely stay next time we are in the area. Close to stores and restaurants too.

title: large suite room!
review: Each room is really large. Afternoon tea time is an impressive experience. Good service and good staff. The front desk lady even helped me to search my Hilton Honors no. and enter it to get points! The breakfast is also really amazing. Will absolutely come back next time.

title: Lovely property
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Lisa and for sharing your awesome experience!  I'm so happy you loved the size of our suites, evening reception and amazing breakfast.  We look forward to hosting your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Comfortable, convenient stay on Orlando
review: We stayed here because of the location on I Drive - so convenient. We walked to get supper and enjoy the rides up the street.   We were given an upgraded room - I always enjoy when we get a little perk of being a Diamond member so it was greatly appreciated.  The room was very nice and had snacks that our daughters really enjoyed.  I would definitely stay here again!  The staff was very kind and the breakfast was just wonderful - everything about our stay was great.

title: Last Minute Family Get-Away
review: I'm so happy that you chose to stay with us and thank you for sharing your wonderful experience!  It's great that our team to such good care of you and we can't wait to welcome you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Hotel Stay.
review: We like Embassy Suites because of the separate bedroom plus fridge and microwave.  This ES is in excellent condition and looks like it was given a facelift.  The beads were very comfortable, breakfast yummy and all of the staff I encountered were friendly and helpful!  The location is excellent no matter what park you go to unless you choose an onsite hotel.  We spent the day at Discovery Cove and it was only ten minutes door to door.  It is also walking distance to tons of restaurants and activities on International drive.  There is a Senor Frogs just across the street.  One of the things I liked best is the ability to do laundry; it was $2.50 for wash and $2.50 to dry credit cards accepted and laundry soap available for purchase as well.

title: Great hotel, excellent location
review: Very clean hotel, spacious room in a very central convenient location well serviced by public transport. Self service laundry facilities available on alternate floors at a very reasonable cost. Happy hour/reception available to all guests on selected nights with a limited selection of free alcohol and wines, nibbles provided. 24 hour reception. We arrived late at night due to a delayed flight and were greeted at the hotel by very friendly and welcoming staff. Good selection of hot food available for breakfast with fresh omelets cooked to order. There was a mix up with the transfer to Disneyworld and the hotel very kindly arranged a taxi transfer for us. Our room faced the street but was relatively quiet at night as the hotel is set back from the road.

title: Embassy
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Fiona and for your amazing review!  I'm so thrilled you loved so many of our amenities and that our team took great care of you upon your late arrival.  We can't wait until you visit us again!  Happy Holidays.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Worst Service Ever!
review: Overall experience was good. I think the room was nice and clean. The evening reception was good but I wish it had more food variety. The breakfast was really good and I enjoy every bite. The staff was helpful and nice.

title: Great Hotel
review: It's so lovely to hear how much you enjoyed your time with us and that the breakfast and our team were great.  We look forward to your next stay with us!  Happy holidays!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Good location
review: As I write this I'm in room 612 at this hotel. At 7:45pm I called and asked for 5 bottles of water. Never showed. I called back at 9pm. Never showed. Called back at 10:30 and the assured me that they would send it right up. Its currently 11:10 and nothing. Officially the WORST hotel ever!!!

title: family trip to orlando
review: We chose this hotel because it is one of the few hotels in Orlando with an indoor pool. We knew there would be a thunderstorm the first day of our trip and that was the day we planned to swim and relax before spending the rest of the days of our trip at theme parks.  It definitely served this purpose. The indoor pool is large, clean, warm and shallow which was perfect for our children. It is open almost all day too. The hot tub next to it is nice although not as hot as you would expect.  The breakfast was free but not up to the standard of other embassy suite hotels.  It was literally the same food every day.  The omelet station uses the same grill and utensils for veggies and meat which meant we could not eat omelets since we are vegetarian.   Other embassy hotels offer hard…

title: Buggy
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your experience!  I'm so happy you loved our indoor pool, restaurant, large suites and location.  I'm sorry to hear breakfast was not rotated as it should have been.  We have our core items that we set up each day and then rotate some items on the buffet including our fruit and several hot items.  I will follow up with our food and beverage team to ensure we correct for future guests.  We look forward to your next visit with us!  Happy Holidays!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Limited transfer service to Disney
review: Roaches found in the room upon arrival at 1:00 a.m.  Noisy in the main bedroom from the traffic outside. There was a sliding glass door instead of a sound proof window. There is no need for a sliding door. You couldn't even walk out.

title: Spot on!
review: Thank you for staying with us Matthew and for sharing your feedback.  I'm very sorry you experienced challenges in your suite upon arrival and would love to speak with you to see how our team handle the issues and what we could have done better.  Please feel free to reach out to me at your convenience at 407-581-4301 or Gregory.rice@hilton.com.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Happy Holidays!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great Experience
review: The transfer service is handled by an outside vendor, with only three pick up /drop off times. This limited our visits to the Disney parks. During out stay the times also changed without notice. I wouldn't recommend staying here just for Disney. Wonderful location on International Drive. The trolley is a great way to travel around for restaurants ,shopping and Sea World.

title: Short but memorable stay
review: I stood for the weekend with my family for a business Christmas party. The hotel was beautiful and clean. The service was impeccable. Breakfast had a nice selection and was so good. Definitely worth it and would certainly recommend this hotel to a friend. Thank you for a pleasant stay.

title: Awesome hotel
review: Thank you for the wonderful review Natalie and for sharing your lovely experience!  We look forward to hosting you again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: excellent location and quality
review: My husband and I have stayed at this Embassy Suites before many times.  It's our favorite.  It was clean, well staffed and close to everything Orlando has to offer.  Try to get a room away from I-4, it's much quieter.

title: Clean and comfortable
review: Thank you for the great review Anthony and for staying with us again and again.  We value your loyalty and can't wait to host your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Very nice Embassy Suites.
review: extremely well located Hotel , very clean and nice , good costumer service, affordable and elegant , excellent suites , apartment style , wonderful beds and pillows , very functional , sofa bed included

title: Excellent Hotel
review: No matter what your visit to Orlando may call for, this is a great hotel with fair prices.  It has everything you need for your stay. (Restaurant, Pools indoor and outdoor, Free Breakfast, Evening Social, kind staff, clean rooms that are spacious, etc.)  I make this hotel my choice year in and year out.

title: Dirty bathroom dirty air filters horrible shower
review: What a wonderful review thank you so much for choosing to stay with us again and share your experience!  We can't wait to welcome you back for your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Front desk manager saved my day!
review: Urine on toilet seat atbcheck in. Ac was off and filter was dirty. I was put in handicap room and the hot cold water was difficult to figure out. They said they did a deep clean aftwrbubchecked in but they didn’t. Tried to charge me early departure fee when they messed up reservation.

title: Solid Embassy Suites with helpful staff
review: Thank you for staying with us Mr. Harry and I am very sorry to hear about the issues you experienced upon arrival.  I'd love the chance to speak with you to learn more about these challenges to prevent future guests having them.  Feel free to contact me at your convenience at Gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Good place to stay at International Drive
review: I stayed here this past Monday to Thursday. When I arrived late Monday evening I had to tell them my confirmation number which I thought odd. Come to find out they had me arriving on Sunday night so they had me as a no show and canceled my reservation. Fortunately the manager at the front desk was able to find a room for me. I am thankful because of all the vacationers and Convention travelers I thought I was going to have to rent a car and find a hotel out of town. I’m sure it didn’t hurt to be a Diamond level loyalty member with Hilton but still appreciating the kind and cheerful service. They demonstrated why I’m a loyal customer. The rest of my stay included the experience of great customer service at breakfast, the evening receptions and the front desk staff that keeps me…

title: Would stay here again
review: This was in a very convenient location with many shops and restaurants nearby.  It is a pretty hotel and everything was clean.  Check in was easy. The breakfast was very good, especially the made to order station where the staff was quick but so friendly.  My only complaint is that one elevator (out of 4) was down so the wait was long to go between floors.

title: Nice hotel but with caveats
review: I'm so happy to hear how great your stay was and appreciate you sharing!  It's also great to know how much you enjoyed the location and our awesome breakfast!  I'm sorry that one of our elevators was down during your stay.  We've been working with our maintenance provider as much as we can to get it back as we know it's very important.  We look forward to your next visit with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Always a great stay with Hilton Brand
review: Hotel is nice, with a good breakfast, friendly staff and good location near the Orlando Convention Center, but there are some things to be aware of: Shuttle service to theme parks is limited, with two or three time available in the morning (only rides to the parks, no returns) and two or three pickup times in the evening. We ended up using Uber about half the time rather than the limited shuttle service. While there are lots of restaurants within walking distance of the hotel, few of them appear to be open for lunch. Don't let the bellman get you a cab. We made that mistake going to the airport and ended up getting ripped off. By the way, no hotel shuttle service anywhere... Including the airport.

title: My hotel stay at embassy
review: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate you sharing your experience.  I'm glad you found our hotel nice and the team friendly!  I wanted to make you aware that we do indeed offer return shuttle service and I apologize if that wasn't made clear to you.  We offer trips to the parks in the morning and trips back from the parks in the afternoon/evening.  I also wanted to apologize for the issue you had with retrieving a cab to the airport and I will be following up with my valet and bell team.  We look forward to hosting you on your next visit to Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Average Embassy Suites Location in Orlando
review: We were there for a quick getaway w/ my fam. The property was great, the service was great. The room/suite was also great. My family very much enjoyed the amenities the hotel had to offer. Kids enjoyed the pool. We enjoyed complementary evening reception and breakfast.They had complimentary shuttle service to Disney and Universal parks so that was great.I definitely recommend this property.

title: Breakfast and lobby area looked great.
review: Breakfast was top notch and the lobby area looked very modern and clean. Although, some issue in the room musky smell, broken toilet, issues with lights. Also, no cable guide for the TV. Staff said it was on the the channel below 1 but I never saw it.

title: Where do I begin?
review: I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us overall Philip and appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  I'm sorry you had some issues with you room and would love to know the suite number so we can take care of them for future guests.  Please feel free to reach out to me at Gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301 at your convenience.  I look forward to hearing from you!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great Stay - Super Attentive Housekeeper
review: When we arrived to our room, we noticed that we had a terrible view of the roof top with all of the equipment in all of it's glory!  We spent $200/night on this room.  They moved us to a better room after I complained. The first night I set up a wake up call for 6am so that I could be on time the next day for my son's graduation from vocational school the next morning at 8am.  My wake up call came in at 7am, an hour late because no one changed their clocks for daylight savings!  We missed my son's graduation which was the entire reason why we booked the trip!  After complaining, I was given free parking...  Not exactly the compensation that I was expecting!  The first day, house keeping never showed.  I ordered extra pillows that never came, so that was another inconvenience…

title: Well above expectations
review: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  I'm very sorry to hear that you did not get a room in a location that you desired originally but am happy to hear that our team was able to accommodate you.  I'm also sorry that you had several other challenges and would love the chance to speak with you to ensure we correct these issues for future guests.  Please feel free to reach out to me at your convenience at Gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Mixed Bag
review: My daughter and I stayed here for a couple of days to check out bands in the area. Everyone at the hotel was super friendly and the rooms were clean and roomy. I can not function without morning coffee (with lots of cream and sugar). Thank God this hotel has an in room coffee maker and the coffee is amazing. However, by my second cup, I was out of cream and noticed the housekeeper in the hall. Not only did she provide me with extra creamer, but when she cleaned the room she left me extra cream. The next day we got out of the room late, so no housekeeping, but that doll of a lady, YOKASTA, left us a goody bag hanging on the door when we returned, late that night, with towels and yes all my supplies for coffee.... After checking out, I realized I left all of my make-up in the…

title: Great stay!
review: Stayed here for a conference and had a great time. The staff is very friendly and attentive to the needs of all the guests. Breakfast was excellent and included most items I usually eat for breakfast.

title: Roaches...Need I say more???
review: It's so wonderful to hear how great your stay was and I appreciate you sharing your experience!  We can't wait to welcome you back on your next visit to Orlando.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Warm welcome
review: To be honest I was very disappointed. The noise from the freeway was unbearable...so much so that I didn't even sleep in the bedroom, I slept on the couch with the bedroom door closed. My refrigerator froze all my stuff, in addition to that, knowing that a team member had cockroaches in his room (room 515) made me feel extremely uneasy about the property. On a positive, the service of the staff was excellent with the exception of the bartender on Halloween night...I didn't get his name. We stopped in for a drink after returning from dinner before retiring to our respective rooms. We ordered one round and after we finished those drinks we asked the gentleman if we could have one last round, he informed us the bar was closed, he's locked everything up, and in fact needed to turn…

title: EXCELLENT STAFF
review: Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your experience.  I'm very happy to hear that our team took excellent care of you but am disappointed that you had such a negative interaction with one of our bartenders.  I'm also very sorry that you had so many issues in your suite.  I'd love to speak with you more about your challenges to ensure these don't occur in the future.  Please feel free to reach out to me at your convenience at 407-581-4301 or Gregory.rice@hilton.com.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: This might be the worst Embassy Suites that we have stayed at.
review: We arrived after a long flight suffering delays and a thunderstorm that virtually closed Orlando airport. On arrival we were warmly greeted by Robert who efficiently checked us in and made us feel at home straight away. The hotel has been refurbished since our last visit and is now really nice. The free breakfast was excellent as was the attitude of all the staff we have come across so far. Plenty of parking and the hotel is near so many good restaurants. Would recommend this hotel.

title: 11th Birthday Surprise!
review: Canceled flight, so we drove 10 hrs to surprise our son for his birthday. Checked in at 530am. Everything and everyone was awesome! Thank you! Breakfast was everything!!!! #DisneyWasLit Overall satisfied!

title: perfect family vacation
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your amazing experience!  I'm glad after such a long drive that everything was perfect!  We can't wait for your next visit and hope it's a little easier to get here next time.  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Just OK
review: The hotel is well situation on the International Drive with many restaurants around. Easy access to the I-4 for trips to the theme parks. They have lovely breakfast spread which would keep anyone going all day. There is a booth selling tickets to theme parks and other attractions. Plenty of free parking. Rooms were nice and big and suites. Clean and well equipped rooms. The staff were friendly and helpful too. We did see a child get his hands stuck in the main automatic door, but accidents happens. Would recommend it to all. They have evening reception too, but we never made it in the four days were there.

title: Great hotel.  close to lots of activities for families.
review: It's great to hear you had such a lovely trip and enjoyed so many of the great aspects of our hotel!  I'm very happy our team such good care of you and we can't wait to welcome you back on your next visit to Orlando.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Enjoyed the Stay
review: Room was OK, as was breakfast and evening reception.  My big concern was there was a wasps nest on our balcony that we asked staff to remove multiple times.  I was stung on the leg once. When we checked out 5 days later the nest was still there.

title: Excellent Stay
review: I had a great experience here. I had to make some changes to my stay dates and the staff was so accommodating and friendly. All the staff during my stay were friendly and eager to ensure my stay was excellent. I stay in many hotels for business and this was one of the best!

title: Nice Hotel, bad room
review: It's so great to hear you had such a wonderful stay with us!  Thank you so much for choosing us and for sharing your wonderful experience!  We can't wait to host you again.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Busy Convention Week
review: I typically like Embassy Suites and, on the outside, this is no exception. Good location, nice atrium, fast elevators. Unfortunately, I think our room had been...soiled...in some way before our arrival. An industrial fan was outside the door when we arrived.  The room smelled and looked nice at first, but had that strong cinnamon scent that Serv Pro uses to mask offensive odors. It wore off the second day and after being gone all day, we walked into a distinct odor. Also, our room was on the back side of the hotel and we heard interstate noise all night.

title: Great stay
review: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate you sharing your feedback.  I'm very sorry that there was an industrial carpet blower outside of your suite upon arrival.  That should never happen and I'd love to hear more specifics so I can follow up with my team.  Please feel free to contact me at your convenience at 407-581-4301 or Gregory.rice@hilton.com.  I hope you have a wonderful day and I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Disney world trip
review: We elected to stay at Embassy Suites I-Drive / Convention Center, as it was one of the partner hotels for the Microsoft Ignite tech conference.  (My wife tagged along to get some Florida time for the week!)  Summary:  Even during a busy week with lots of convention attendees there, this was a good hotel with no deal breakers.  There were some things that could use improving, and those are listed below.  Would we stay here again?  YES.  Check in was easy,  Getting to the rooms is easy , as there are four elevators in the core area, 2 on each "side".  Never had to wait too long for an elevator.  Room was on the third floor.  King bed Suite, as you would expect.  Plenty of space to throw your stuff and live out of suitcases.  Also plenty of drawers if you choose to unpack and stay…

title: LOUD neighborhood
review: The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. However, my room was street facing, and it was SUPER LOUD. Neighbors like Senior Frogs, Howl at the Moon, and Hooters was something I wasn't aware of It was like there was a nightclub in my room every night. Wouldn't stay here again for that reason alone.

title: Clean and great staff
review: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate you sharing your experience.  I'm very happy that our staff were very helpful and friendly.  We are working on replacing on all of our sliding glass doors and windows to reduce the decibel noise coming into our suites.  That project will be completed by this time next year.  We look forward to welcoming you back then!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Excellent Staff - Wonderful Hotel
review: The staff was outstanding, very helpful and very polite. At check in they made sure the room was to my liking.  Very clean rooms and property.  Breakfast is good also.  I went out for a run and they stopped me on my way in to give me a bottle of water, very nice touch.  Would stay here again.

title: Running from Hurricane Florence
review: It's so wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us Tony and I'm thrilled to team offered you some water after a nice run!  We can't wait to welcome you back again and again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great experience
review: This is my wife's favorite hotel in Orlando.  We both like it, but she loves it. I must say the staff is excellent. Recently stayed for my wife's birthday and they made it so special.  The recently updated the lobby and while it is modern and nice, personally I miss florida touch the lobby and food area used to have.  However, this is a great hotel and wonderful place to stay.  It is also one of the few hotels that have an indoor pool. It used to have a Suana which for the life of me I don't know why they took that out of the in door pool area.  The breakfast is complimentary and they have a chef to cook your eggs or omelette any way you want them.  The only set back to me is the new restaurant, it just seems a little bland.  It's not a sports bar or a restaurant of any…

title: Super hotel...Clean and modern.
review: Stayed here for a week in September.  Loved the hotel. It was clean and modern. Check in was swift(ish) and friendly. They even allowed us an extra hour after checkout which was handy.  Room was spacious with a great view of the Orlando Eye. Aircon was great and the cleaners did a fantastic job.  Lovely breakfast every morning with efficient  staff.  I absolutely LOVED my stay here..but the only down side for me was that in the evening in the happy hour where you get free drinks and nibbles..there is a catch...you habe time share sales people badgering you. When you are on holiday relaxing you really don't need this and I'm shocked Hilton allow it. No doubt this company is paying Hilton for the drinks and nibbles so they can use their hotel as a sales pitch...I think this is…

title: Business as usual, comfy and nice
review: I'm so glad to hear you had such a great stay with us and appreciate you taking the time to share!  I agree that we have wonderful large suites and a fantastic breakfast.  I'm very sorry to hear that your experience during our evening reception was not up to par.  I assure you that is not the typical experience.  I'd love to discuss your specific issues more so we can follow up and make sure it does not happen to future guests.  Please feel free to reach out to me at your convenience at 407-581-4301 or Gregory.rice@hilton.com.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Enjoyed my stay
review: I love staying at this Embassy and will definitely stay again. The complimentary breakfast was very good.  Love the omelettes and the evening reception was very good. My suite was nice and the staff was very helpful and pleasant 👍🏽😀 CG

title: Not up to the Embassy Suite Level
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your great experience!  I'm glad you love the cooked to order breakfast, large suites and friendly staff.  We can't wait to welcome you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Love returning to Embassy
review: Pros: Enjoyed my stay... loved the two individual spaces in the rooms...the free cocktail reception is very relaxing...Cons: walls were very thin... the balcony is narrow and there’s no privacy between the balcony’s.

title: Excellent property
review: The staff of this property did an excellent job from start to finish.  The reception team was fast and friendly; the room was spotless and comfortable, and the breakfast was world class.  I was I was staying longer!

title: Awesome location and building and people
review: It's so great to hear how much you enjoyed your stay Andrew!  Thank you so much for staying and sharing your experience.  We can't wait to welcome you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Fantastic upgrade!
review: Wonderful place for our family of 4.  2 rooms.  Living and kitchenette along with a fold out couch in one room and other room had 2 very nice queen beds in it.  TV's and sinks in each of those 2 rooms along with a very nice bathroom.  Wonderful hot and cold breakfast with omelettes cooked to order.  Great, helpful front desk people and wonderful poster celebrating the event we were in town for (Irish Dance North American Championships).  Only complaint we had was out wardrobe in the bedroom stunk like BO.  We told the front desk about it, they tried to spray it but it still was there so we couldn't use it at all.  Thanks for everything else.

title: Remodel is beautiful!
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Janelle and for sharing your amazing experience!  I'm so happy to hear you loved the size of our suites, cooked to order breakfast and friendly and helpful staff!  We can't wait to welcome you back again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: My stay at the Embassy Suites Orlando International Drive
review: We stayed here many years ago and the place was beginning to look run down.  The upgrade was complete overhaul, the rooms are fantastic, the pool beautiful, the staff very friendly, and the lobby and common areas squeaky clean.  Absolutely loved our stay!

title: Great hotel service
review: Services at the hotel is excellent. They make it a point to engage you on a regular basis which goes a long way in assuring the customer that they are being thought of. Restaurant was good.  I will stay there again.

title: Great stay in Orlando
review: Thank you so much for the lovely review and for choosing to stay with us!  I'm very happy to hear our team was always friendly and engaging as we talk about the importance of doing that with every guest.  We can't wait until your next visit with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Relaxation, comfort, welcoming
review: The Embassy Suites in Orlando on International Drive was a great location. I was there on business and the location of the hotel along with the staff made it one of my top stays. The location was within walking distance of great restaurants, great night life and an all around fun vibe. I would highly recommend this property.

title: Nice place to spend a few days
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Neil and for the amazing review!  I'm so happy you loved our hotel and the great location and most importantly that our team provided excellent service.  Come back anytime for business or leisure!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great breakfast, nice rooms, quiet and powerful air conditioning, good location, good value
review: I was so happy with my stay at Embassy Suites that I will now make them my go-to hotel for accommodations. The rooms were clean and spacious. The staff was warm and welcoming. I will definitely return to this hotel on my next visit.

title: Excellent
review: I must say that I am very pleased with my stay here at the Embassy Suites. The staff has been very helpful and met all of my needs. I would highly recommend this hotel to my peers and friends visiting the Orlando area. Many thanks.

title: Just ok
review: What a terrific review Jerry thank you so much for taking the time to share!  I'm so happy that all your needs were met and we can't wait to welcome you back on your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Nice looking Hotel with very good amenities and a very helpfull staff.
review: Breakfast was great, beds are not comfortable, sink clogged, tub clogged, pay for parking. Free drink nice! Breakfast staff super hard working and accommodating! Pool was freezing not heated and shady not enough direct sun to warm it up.

title: Enjoyable stay
review: Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your experience.  I'm happy you enjoyed our breakfast, evening reception and friendly breakfast staff.  I have not heard any issues regarding our pool heaters as we keep our pools at a minimum of 82 degrees and would love to hear more about your specific experience to do some research with my team.  Please feel free to contact me at your convenience at Gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301.  I look forward to speaking with you soon.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Orlando/Disney family vacation
review: The inside heated pool was very nice. The gym was good. The place was beautiful. The only setback was the lovers on the front of the room near the hallway. We could not close them enough to keep the light our of the room. They placed us between the two elevators and that area was really well bright. Otherwise than that, the room and the rest of the hotel was really nice.

title: Very convenient
review: We stayed alone for three days and the experience was amazing. The suite was very comfortable and clean. Very kind and nice staff. The omelet station was the highlight of breakfast. We will surely stay at this hotel again.

title: Great Stay
review: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your lovely experience!  I'm so happy you enjoyed our large, comfortable suites, delicious breakfast and most importantly, our kind and helpful staff.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: A little vacation
review: The hotel was in a great location, close to restaurants, theme parks and other great things to do.  The room was spacious and very clean. Excellent breakfast, with made to order omelets and other great choices. Plenty of night life in the area for adults and Dave and Busters for the family.

title: Great hotel but two things made it disappointing for me
review: I'm thrilled to hear you had such a great stay Peter and am happy you decided to share your experience!  I agree with you that our location is excellent for all times of day and our breakfast can't be beat!  We look forward to your next visit with us when you are back in town.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Awesome stay
review: I want to said thank you a all employee for my staying in the hotel alexis from front desk Johanna from front desk to and pam from restaurants thank you for everything beautiful hotel thanks you the food excellent housekeeping wonderful job the room very clean 313 no complaints for enething

title: Would not stay here again
review: The hotel was okay. We recently booked a room to stay in Orlando after our cruise. I took a few days to ensure I had time to think about the whole stay and provide a fair review. First impressions are important. While the hotel is nice the woman who checked us in was rude and condescending. We were very well aware that we were EARLY, we simply wanted to know when we should return if the room was ready early. I had called the hotel the week before and was told there would be no charge for early check in. I told her anout that call but she tried to charge an extra $25. We had already paid the room in full as part of our travel package. I don’t think it would have rubbed me the wrong way if she wasn’t so rude about it. At any rate, we went to a movie and the room was ready a couple…

title: LOCATION IS PERFECT
review: Thank you for staying with us RVA and for sharing your experience.  I'm very happy that you enjoyed your suite, our beautiful building and one of our lovely male front desk team members.  I'm very sorry that you had such a poor arrival experience.  I know that sets the tone for the entire stay and we blew it.  I'd love to speak with you more about it at your convenience to ensure this never happens again and to re-assure you that it is not the typical experience for our guests.  Please feel free to contact me at 407-581-4301 or Gregory.rice@hilton.com and I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Excellent Place to stay great location
review: Visited Orlando as a bucket list trip.  My husband and I enjoyed the location and amenities. The location is close to attractions, plenty of restaurants, shopping areas etc. I would recommend this hotel to close friends and family. However front desk staff should be more attentive to the goings and comings of its guest.  My husband and I entered and exited the premises several times a night with interact with the first desk.  That is a security concern for me.  You MUST be aware of who is entering and existing the hotel. Other than that the staff was amazing and I will definitely return in the future.

title: Some things goods, other things could be better
review: I'm so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us Kimberly and that you found our location and amenities perfect!  I will be speaking with our front office team as well to remind them of the importance of interacting with all of our guests to continue to improve our service execution.  We look forward to your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Clean rooms and helpful staff
review: Great location.. excellent breakfast.. helpful stay.. only thing missing was welcome gift bags ..especially to Hilton Honors Members like myself.. but other than that recommended spot. located in a central area with access to dining and shopping.

title: Great family hotel
review: Stayed for 2 weeks in early August this year ( 2018 ) The hotel was very good, the rooms spacious and very clean. The breakfast catered for everybody ranging from the usual cereal, cooked breakfast, toast and fruit to cooked to order omelettes etc, the staff at breakfast where excellent and couldn't do enough for you and as stated in an earlier review, the dapper gentleman in the bow tie in the breakfast area was 5*, always greeting with a smile and a good morning. The location is excellent in a pleasant area of International Drive with restaurants, take aways, small supermarkets and Wallgreens ( chemist) within a short walk. The shuttles to the parks where on time and the valets outside who explain everything to you are friendly and informative. On the whole a very enjoyable…

title: Very disapponted
review: I'm thrilled to hear you had such a great time with us Steve and that you enjoyed so many aspects of your extended 2 week vacation!  We can't wait to welcome you back again and again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great family vacation
review: The hotel was in a good location, but I think the week that we decided to stay must have been a bad day for everyone that worked there because they were truly off their game.  The check-in was a nightmare and the housekeeping was way off. The complimentary breakfast was the best part of staying at this hotel, the staff was great!!!!

title: Very good family hotel
review: Thank you for staying with us Patricia and I appreciate you sharing your experience.  I'm very sorry you had such a poor experience with your arrival and overall cleanliness.  I'm glad to see our breakfast team took great care of you and would love to speak with you more at your convenience about your stay.  Please feel free to call me at 407-581-4301 or email me at Gregory.rice@hilton.com.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Very nice, but check your bill carefully
review: We went for a three day family vacation. Our room was extremely well kept, they would always service our room and leave it spotless. The hotel has recently been remodeled and it looks great! Very modern and clean.   The best service we received was during breakfast. The dapper looking young gentleman with the bow tie was true definition of customer service. When the milk machine was empty, after they refilled it, he came to our desk with two cups of milk knowing we wanted some milk for the kids cereal. I failed in not getting his name, but you sir are amazing!   Marsha also provided a great customer service upon check out. Great smile.  We will definitely come back to stay!

title: Family trip
review: Elevator was broken with no attempt to fix. Took forever to get downstairs! Very rude ppl working the evening complimentary gathering. Tried to over charge me when checking out.  Very busy hotel and loud. The outside pools very small. Lady out there with a thong on. And kids running around. Breakfast was good.

title: Famvac Aug18
review: Thank you for staying with us Elaina and sharing your experience.  I wanted to apologize for the issues with the elevators this weekend and assure you are team was actively working on sourcing the parts we needed to get them back up and running.  I also wanted to apologize for our team at the evening reception not being more accommodating.  I'd love the chance to speak with you more about your stay at your convenience and can be reached at Gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301.  I look forward to hearing from you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Nice Place to Stay
review: Nice  hotel I'm a great location to dining and theme parks. All around friendly staff from check in to room attendants. Any concerns are promopro taking cate of to ensure your stay is pleasant. We will definitely stay at this location again.

title: Would visit again
review: Thank you so much for staying with us during your family vacation and I'm so happy to hear you had such a wonderful experience.  We can't wait to welcome you and your family back during your next visit to Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Disney vacation
review: I thought the hotel was very nice. The staff were professional and courteous. The rooms are always clean and nicely decorated. I would recommend anyone traveling to this area to stay at the Embassy Suites of Orlando.

title: Embassy Suites Jamaican Ct
review: My husband was having surgery at Dr Phillips Hospital so I needed a nearby hotel.  Since our preferences are Hilton we chose Embassy Suites. From valet to room maids everything was perfect!  Everyone was eager to help!   Our corner room (324) was very large!  Very clean, and I don’t know where Hilton purchases their mattresses & linens but very very comfortable!: Free Breakfast was great, eggs, meats, cooked to order omelets, pancakes, fruit on & on! Great coffee also to go cups & all FREE! Also an afternoon (5:30-7:00pm) free cocktails & buffet of munchies!  With free breakfast afternoon cocktails the room prices are amazing I had a little problem about checkout date, not sure if my husband needed another day in Hospital... Delores at front desk was wonderful, gave me # to call…

title: Free drinks every night and breakfast on the hotel, surely not!
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Marie and for sharing your lovely experience!  I'm so happy to hear you had such a great stay and that the team to great care of your during your trip.  We can't wait for your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Good but be aware..
review: Well, this is my second time at this hotel. Yes it's true every night between 5.30pm and 7.30pm you can enjoy free drinks including wine, beer, spirits and some cocktails.  We went for room only package, which meant having to buy lunch and dinner outside but with local restaurant prices around International drive it was cheap. I was always told when something looks too good it usually is !!  trust me not here, I heard loads of people talking about how good renting a villa is, well after staying here it does not interest me. The hotel is very clean with rooms cleaned every day, and notes from staff left in room to "have a nice day" its a nice touch.  Staff are very friendly, the only down side is at breakfast sometimes Hilton staff come to talk to you about Hilton reward card but…

title: First Time in Orlando with nephew and goddaughter
review: I'm so happy to hear you had such a lovely stay with us Craig and I truly appreciate you taking time to share your experience.  I agree with you that we are the best value in town with all you can eat cooked-to-order breakfast, complimentary evening reception and spacious suites.  I'm glad you and your family had such a great holiday and we look forward to your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: A perfect stay !!
review: The hotel was recently remodeled. Looks really nice. If you are a light sleeper be aware that you are near a major Highway and it is noisy in three sides og the hotel ou tof four. Parking fees (15 dollars per night). ridiculous charge in Orlando. Love embassy suite but tired of parking fees especially when you are in a city that land and parking is plentiful. Hotel is very clean and staff are very nice especially the food team.

title: Great Place to Stay
review: Spacious & clean rooms, helpful staff, close to accommodations, great manager reception in the evening and fabulous breakfast all included with cost of room.  Nothing better than saving money on eating out while on vacation!

title: Bummer for hard earned family vacation!
review: I'm so thrilled to hear you had such a great experience with us KP and we can't wait to see you no your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Beautiful hotel fell short
review: This was the worst experience with Hilton / Embassy Suites I have ever had. I am still a fan of Hilton and Embassy but will not stay in this one ever again. I booked my trip using my hard earned american express points so I suppose that is why I got the worst room location in the hotel but that does not explain the staff telling me they would replace a disgustingly dirt chair twice and not doing it, unsafe meal conditions for people with allergies and not understanding of it and general dirty conditions.

title: Vacation
review: I appreciate you sharing your experience Brock and am very sorry that our team did not follow through on their commitments.  I'd love the opportunity to speak with you more about your stay at your convenience and can be reached at 407-581-4301 or Gregory.rice@hilton.com.  I look forward to speaking with you.   Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Modern accommodations, friendly staff, good value and excellent stay!
review: This hotel is beautiful, in a prime location but fell short of the level of service I’m accustomed to at Embassy Suites. At check in, was told the room type that was supposed to be guaranteed wasn’t available. Internet service advertised on website as free was disclosed upon check in to come with a cost. Gentleman that checked me in gave complimentary parking as an apology for room issue, offered Hilton Honors as way to get free internet. Internet service was spotty. Breakfast... delicious! Great choices and appreciated fresh omelet station. Evening reception was also great. Unfortunately we arrived back to the room at 11:30 pm to see no housekeeping services were rendered. They offered to clean it at 12:30 am but that is unacceptable to me. At check out, was told that because…

title: Worth the trip!
review: My family laid over at ES before going on cruise.  With clean and spacious rooms [we got a suite for 5], beautiful well maintained outside pool & spa, and outstanding complimentary breakfast it started out vacation out on a good note.  Excellent value for price!

title: Vacations in Orlando
review: I'm so happy to hear you had such a wonderful experience and really appreciate you taking the time to share!  I'm glad we were able to help you get your vacation started off with a bang!  We can't wait until your next visit with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Excellent Place to Stay
review: The hotel is beautiful. The employees make you feel like at home, in family. Excellent treatment. The breakfast was delicious. Excellent service all the time. The room was very comfortable and clean. Hope I'll be back soon!!!

title: Great experience
review: It's so great to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us and how friendly and helpful our team were during your visit.  We also can't wait to host you again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Extremely loud........nickel and dime you at every turn.
review: Prob the best hotel with a great location in the area.  Offers a lot during your stay, i.e. Breakfast & Reception. I stay here anytime I am in Orlando in the I-Drive area.  I really like this hotel and you will also.

title: Nice hotel
review: This was a perfect hotel to enjoy the activities on International Drive. All the attractions were walking distance away. Rooms were excellent. The interiors were very stylish. Breakfast was nice. Evening reception was a nice touch. Overall enjoyed our stay. Situated at the heart of International Drive. Loved this place.

title: Worth the choice
review: It's so lovely to hear you had such a wonderful experience with us and thank you for sharing!  I'm very pleased to hear you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay with us and we can't wait until your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: On Main
review: First choice would be Homewood Suites Intl Drive ( for a second stay) , but as it was sold out, decided to book the Embassy quite in front. And we did not miss it. Comfortable and clean suite. Good breakfast and some nibbles in the evening. Great staff : smiling, welcoming and helpful ( had some issues with packages, but were well handled by front desk). International Drive is a very good area to stay in Orlando, restaurants, I Drive , I trolley ... specially if you have already been to Orlando a few times. Definitely will stay there again.

title: Great location, aging facilities
review: Thank you for staying with us Rob and for the great review!  I'm very happy to hear our staff was always smiling and helpful and that you enjoyed your experience with us.  We can't wait to welcome you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Meh
review: This hotel is On a International drive, Very close to many eateries and some  touristy shops and amusements.  Walk/Close to a movie theater, Bowling, Games Center, Ridley’s.  Also close to the Orlando Convention Center.    The breakfast is good and has a made to order option. The chef does Not disappoint.....Be ready for a meal.  After a day sightseeing or Flying at the skydive simulator or a helicopter ride (both so close) enjoy drinks and a snack (chips/ popcorn, pretzels, fruit or some pudding). Beer, wine.....even a mixed drink is available free. Ya FREE.   Not to worry the Uber system is awesome as well as Taxi’s. So no DWI’s.  I walked to dinner, steak, Italian it just pizza ( Hut or a pizza place both close) Food Mart was also near by and CVS&WalGreens.  You really can’t…

title: Why you should stay here.
review: it's in a great location, central for the theme parks by day and a short walk to the restaurants and bars in the evening. Our suite was spacious and comfortable with a huge, comfy bed. The only reservations I had about the room was the mirror in the bathroom didn't demist, and the coffee machine was rubbish. Minor details. There are a lot of hotels on iDrive that are fine, so why here? Breakfast was included and was excellent. The fresh cooked omelette was great with plenty of other options. Also,  the evening drinks reception was very good- a couple of drinks to set up for the evening was great. The pool area was OK, though not remarkable, staff were friendly and helpful throughout. I'd have no problems recommending this.

title: It was good no complaints
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Dave and for the lovely review!  I'm so happy you enjoyed many of our great features and amenities including our large suites, cooked to order breakfast and evening reception.  We can't wait until your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Very disappointing
review: Great , everything was great , no problems. Housekeeping should Just pay attention a little more to cleaning but Other than that the room was great they even had an evening reception with free alcohol, snacks(could be better) and soda!

title: Wonderful Hospitality and Great Location
review: It's so great to hear how lovely your stay was Safia and I appreciate you taking the time to share.  I'll pass your note about housekeeping on to the team so we can address.  We can't wait to see you on your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: The Staff was excellent!
review: I came in early from out of town and had reservations for a restaurant at 4 pm so I needed to get dressed. They charged me a 25 dollar fee and put me next to the elevator which caused me to be up all night from the noise. After that the room was Extremely cold and we could not change the dial manually we kept asking for the air to be turned up after 3 attempts they moved the air up so hot we were sweating. Then the toilet overflowed and we had to move to another room. This room was the same way cold and next to the elevator. After speaking with an ambassador who cared about my situation she moved me to another room which was better but had not been cleaned properly there were dirty towels and cups all over the room. I was very disappointed

title: Great week!
review: Wonderful hotel, clean, great ambiance. Staff friendly, smiling and helpful. Rooms are perfect for families....having the two rooms, 2 tv’s, fridge and microwave make it so much easier. The breakfast buffet is delicious and a big bonus. As is the managers evening cocktails and snacks....really a big plus when it comes to getting good value for your dollar. Would definitely recommend!!

title: Ants and noise
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Kim and for sharing your amazing experience!  I'm so happy to hear you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay and we can't wait to welcome you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Check your bags before you leave!
review: We had a massive amount of ants in our bedroom vanity, night stand, and wall. Staff came in the next day and sprayed while we were gone. The windows were extremely thin (almost sounded like they were open, even though they were locked shut). I could hear conversations from the parking lot from our 4th floor suite.

title: Always nice, skip the sale pitch
review: I appreciate you staying with us and for sharing your feedback. I'm very sorry to hear you had issues with ants as we don't typically have that challenge here.  I am glad our staff were able to come and take care of it for you.  I also wanted to make you aware we are in the process of upgrading all of our exterior doors and windows and expect that project to be complete in just a few months.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Best Customer Service
review: This is my second stay on business, third stay in total. Came here for Premier hair show 2018. Last year was wonderful. This year, not so much. Stayed Friday to Tuesday. I save all year to come to this show. We drive a truck  because we buy so much. The last afternoon one of my roommates decided to do laundry. She purchased her box of tide used only half, left the other half for someone else. The Premiere show passes out bags with advertising on them, this is what she took her clothes in. She washed, put in dryer. Timer said 50 min. She went back in 60 min. No clothes! No bag, just the half boxof soap? Dryer was still warm? She described a cleaning person that was in the area. She used a phone, called the desk. Then she walked to the desk. They said you must have been on another…

title: I had booked the Wyndham and the kitchen was a flooded,  bathrooms in disrepair, beds hard, etc. called Embassy Suites
review: In disrepair, beds hard/ pillows sucked. Call Embassy Suites and had a wonderful experience, thanks to your staff and management team we turn a bad vacation into a wonderful trip for our grandson, he loved the pools the reception party ( chip and dip) better than dinner.

title: Most disappointing Embassy Suites experience
review: I'm so happy to hear you had such a great experience with us Jeanette and that we were able to turn your whole vacation around!  We can't wait until your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Good hotel, if you book it in time
review: As a long-time HHonors member I rarely give negative reviews, but felt the need to this time to hopefully spur Hilton on to make changes and give travelers the heads up. Had one of my most disappointing stays here with my family on vacation and wouldn’t want others to deal with this with so many other options available in the area.  Brief summary: - Room quality was substandard. Shower curtain sagged to middle of rod leaving sides open, grout and paint were sloppy. - Breakfast was pitiful. Food quality was poor, continually out of staple foods on the buffet (eggs, bacon, potatoes, etc.) and coffee tasted terrible. - Several unfriendly staff in food service area, appearing to hate their jobs and CRW nothing for the guests and their needs. To be fair, bell hop, front desk and…

title: Great place to stay!
review: Thank you for staying with us RJ and I'm very sorry to hear you had such a poor experience with us.  I am glad that most of our staff were friendly and will address the issues you experienced at breakfast with our Director of Food and Beverage.  I'd love the opportunity to speak with you more about your experience at your convenience and can be reached at 407-581-4301 or Gregory.rice@hilton.com.  I look forward to speaking with you!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Need to upgrade Wi-Fi
review: Because I booked this hotel rather late during a big conference this hotel was overpriced. Staff was friendly and the room was perfectly fine, but for the money I payed you expect more than just fine. I had hotels at half the price with far more attention to the smaller details. I have seen prices for this hotel at less than half of the price, which do make it good value for money, especially because the rooms are huge and if you're a family of 4 you'll have plenty of space in one room. Not sure why the previous review was complaining about WiFi as I had no issues whatsoever. The complimentary WiFi is fast enough for normal internet access/checking mails, the upgraded WiFi (free in the premium rooms, which is not very clear) even allows you to watch Netflix.

title: Nice Hotel Close to Universal Studios
review: Stayed at this Embassy Suites last fall for a convention. The rooms are spacious and have separate living rooms and bedrooms. The usual breakfast buffet was well stocked with plenty of options from bacon and eggs and biscuits and gravy to fresh fruits and pastries. Close to several attractions on the strip. Indoor and outdoor pools and jacuzzis are another special feature of this property. Business center and free WIFI are a nice touch. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Family vacation
review: I'm so thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful experience and enjoyed so many of our amenities!  We look forward to your next stay and can't wait to welcome you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great Hotel. Great Value
review: Great stay overall. The staff, room, and service recieved was commendable. Me and my family really enjoyed ourselves and created new memories to last a lifetime and this included Hilton and the warm and welcoming staff. I would suggest adding and upgrading the washer and dryers to newer model and toss the old ones currently in use. Also I would suggest a fourth chair to the table which currently have three chairs.  Small potatoes but worth noting. Had a good stay.

title: Improvement Needed
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Timothy and for the amazing review!  I'm so happy to hear you and your family had such a great time and created lasting memories!  You bring up some valid points about our laundry machines and additional seating and I will look into some options.  We can't wait to see you again!  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Home, it's everything and then some!
review: Everything was exactly as you would like to have when you travel.  The hotel staff texted us to check on our stay and we were able to ask for extra pillows while at dinner and they were in the room waiting for us upon our return.  5 star service

title: Amazing stay!!
review: Had an amazing stay at the Embassy Suites a few weeks ago! My fiance and I stayed in Orlando to visit Disney the last 3 days of our 11 day vacation. We had mentioned to Jose, the assistant front office manager, that we had just gotten engaged a few days prior while on a cruise. Next thing you know, that evening Jose sends us up a bottle of champagne and chocolate covered strawberries! We stayed at two other Hilton properties over the course of that vacation and no one provided as great of service as Jose did at the Embassy Suites. The cleanliness of the room, the FREE breakfast options, the FREE evening cocktail hour- who can beat that!?!? We absolutely have found our forever hotel for our Orlando trips. Thank you so much Jose and the rest of the employees at the Embassy Suites…

title: Girl’s Trip
review: I'm so thrilled to hear we took great care you and your fiancé Alyssa!  We really pride ourselves on providing great service and exceeding expectations, especially when celebrating important milestones.  I'm going to personally recognize Jose during our next team huddle for doing such a wonderful job.  We can't wait to welcome you back again and again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great hotel!
review: We booked the this Embassy Suites because of the convenience of the location to Pointe Orlando. The free breakfast was a factor in our decision between this hotel and others nearby.  We were extremely satisfied with the suite, hotel staff, and all aspects of this stay.

title: Birthday night amongst friends
review: Thank you so much for staying with us on your recent girls trip and I'm so happy to hear you had such a great time!  We can't wait until your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Nice, good price, great location
review: We stayed here after our cruise for a few days of R&R in Orlando. It was very convenient to everything on I-Dr as we could take the trolley or Uber anywhere we wanted to go. Even at 4am an UberXL only took 4 minutes. The staff was great and very helpful. They have popcorn at nights and free soda and lemonade during certain hours. The beds were comfy, plenty of TV channels, lots of room. The pool and common areas were very clean. I'd definitely stay here again. However..... There are a few things I will warn about: 1. If you plan on taking a shower and their capacity is less than 70% then you need to run your hot water for at least 10 minutes before getting in. Otherwise it's barely luke warm even turned all the way up. 2. Do not get a room facing I-4 because it's VERY noisy if…

title: Meets Expectations
review: The complimentary snacks, drinks, breakfast, and other amenities made my stay extremely comfortable.  The newly, redesigned rooms are efficient and cozy; additionally, this location is convenient to access nearby resorts, restaurants, and other attractions.

title: Our WONDERFUL stay
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your lovely experience.  I'm very happy to hear you enjoyed so many of our amenities, newly renovated suites and great location.  We can't wait to host your next visit to the area!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great hotel and staff
review: First of all, what an amazing hotel. My wife and I stayed here for our 2 year anniversary and we absolutely loved it. We come to Orlando at least five times a year and this has got to be the best hotel we have stayed in within the last 5 years. I'm sad that we did not find this hotel earlier. The room was spectacular clean and wonderful,the only downside was that my wife likes the bed to be like 1000 down pillows soft enough to fall into. I on the other hand found it to be spectacular. The staff here was amazing from day one. Wanda was the most accommodating and friendly person I have seen at a front desk in a very long time. She made us feel so special and helped us in every way. When she found out it was our anniversary, she went above and beyond and had chocolate covered…

title: Great Customer Service
review: What a lovely review thank you so much for sharing Tobey!  I'm very happy your chose to stay with us during your 2 year anniversary and that you had the best stay ever in Orlando!  I'm also very happy to hear that Wanda and the rest of the team took great care of you.  We can't wait to see you on your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Awful! Never gave the secure deposit back
review: great Staff and clean hotel  Jose at check in was very welcoming . Had an issue with tub drain and maintenance responded very quickly and got the job done right the first time . We will be returning in July

title: Checked out early! Awful.
review: We had such hope for this hotel, great location, smart interior and nice room,... until we tried to sleep! This hotel is Horrendously noisy. Main bedroom got all the noise from the road and bars opposite, we were woken multiple times a night. If it is wasn't that noise it was the noisy aircon coming on and off through the night, we couldn't switch of permanently as would have been way too hot. From the sofa bed in the lounge the children were woken multiple times a night by other guests noise, for the first two nights I didnt mention anything to reception as hoped the next night things would improve. However on the next night the children were woken around midnight by party in a neighbouring room that went on until 4am. After trying to settle the children many times only for…

title: Best hotel for the money
review: Thank you for your response.  We don't have any record of these issues that you are referencing and want to make sure you have the correct property as there are multiple Embassy Suites in Orlando and on International Drive.  I'd love the opportunity to speak with you and verify the hotel and if ensure that the issues are corrected.  Please feel free to contact me at your convenience at Gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great Location
review: Always clean and friendly and comfortable.  We have stayed here many times. The breakfast buffet has the best choices and the evening happy hour is awesome. They serve snacks and alcohol. It is close to everything

title: Another tremendous stay
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Ellen and for sharing your amazing experience!  We love that you keep coming back again and again and can't wait to see you next time!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great stay
review: Business trip for a trade show at the convention center. The location was perfect. The hotel was great, complementary breakfast in the morning and happy hour in the evening.   Restaurants and bars are within walking distance.

title: Business but fun
review: I enjoyed my stay. Some of the staff were friendly. the rooms were very nice. Some of the food left something to be desired but in all I enjoyed my stay and I would return with my family. enjoyed my stay.

title: BEST VALUE IN ORLANDO!
review: I'm so happy to hear you enjoyed your business trip with us and that our staff were friendly and rooms exactly what you were looking for.  We look forward to your next trip with your family!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Worked well for its purpose
review: Recently visited on business.  Hotel is modern, well equipped with everything you could possible need. Indoor and outdoor pool, fitness center, business center, excellent full breakfast with omelettes made to order, complimentary evening reception, attentive friendly staff, beautiful modern rooms with quality televisions and extensive channel selection.

title: It was ok
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for the wonderful review!  I'm so glad you enjoyed everything about your stay and we can't wait to welcome you back on your next trip to Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Wonderful hotel !
review: Spacious suite with great city view - good thing is you can go out into the balcony and enjoy the view and escape the AC for a bit. If you're using public transport, there is a bus stop very close, and the I-Drive trolley serves the area too.   Breakfast is pretty awful, but that is usually the case for US hotels of a similar standard. Mass-produced, tasteless bagels etc. Coffee as expected in the US is awful too. At least the evening reception has some fruit - much welcome.

title: Nice property
review: We stayed here for 2 nights recently for a volleyball tournament at OCCC. It is very close to parking. Close to several restaurants on I-drive. Parking was free and plentiful. The rooms appear to be updated and very nice and clean. Breakfast was standard for an Embassy suites, but it was good. Lobby was very nice and clean. Staff were friendly. I would stay here again if I needed to.

title: Embassy suites.  again
review: Thank you so much for staying with us during your volleyball tournament and for sharing your great experience!  I'm so happy to hear how much you enjoyed our great location, recently updated suites and most importantly our friendly staff.  We can't wait to host your next visit with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: family holiday
review: We have stayed in the Embassy Suites many many times and wouldn't stay anywhere else. The staff are all very welcoming and attentive, nothing is too much trouble. As usual the breakfast was lovely, only took a couple of days and the omelette chef remembered my order.  The evening reception was always appreciated, either for a drink on the way in from a busy day or on the way out to dinner. Our suite (709) was kept perfectly clean and well stocked with treats (floor 7 is a premium floor).  We overlook I4 but the noise is never a problem with the patio doors closed and we can see the fireworks from Magic Kingdom and EPCOT from the room. The hotel is close to many restaurants as well as having a really good one itself. We've been coming for do long now we're on our third manager,…

title: Excellent Embassy Suites
review: Thank you so much for staying with us again Frank and for sharing your amazing experience!  We are so thrilled you continue to choose our hotel again and again and can't say enough how much we appreciate your loyalty.  Please feel free to reach out to me directly for any future needs you have at Gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301 and we can't wait for your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great location and hotel
review: We stayed for two weeks over the Easter period at the Embassy Suite in Orlando, its a great location, with lots of bars and restaurants located close by.  Our room was nice and modern, quite a bit of traffic noise as the hotel backs on to a main highway.    The swimming pool area is very small, with not much in the way of seating, the indoor pool was closed for some of our stay.    The hot  breakfast was nice but its the same every day with no variety of choice, even the same fruit and cakes. The hotel was very busy during our stay, there was no where to sit at breakfast and long queues to get food.;   The  room cleaning was not great, Our sheets did not get changed during our stay until we asked for them on around day 10, and the guy at receptions attitude left a lot to be…

title: Great for families
review: Had a one nite stay before headed for a cruise.  We were too late for most restaurants, so ordered from the bar in the hotel. The bartender was very nice, helpful with food, and the sandwiches we had were very good, even for late nite bar food.  Our room was great, sofa bed very comfy, and housekeeping made it up in advance.  The showers had great pressure, and the always included embassy breakfast up to par. Welcoming staff, clean property, could easily stay here a week on a vacation.

title: Poor Service and pushing timeshares
review: It's so wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us and I really appreciate you taking the time to share.  I'm also a big fan of our sandwiches and can't wait to pass on your lovely feedback to our F&B team.  We can't wait to host your next trip to Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Spring Break/Wedding Anniversary
review: Recommend passing on this hotel. Service was terrible and they have people walking around asking you to buy timeshares while you eat breakfast. Disapointed in Hilton for accepting such poor quality from this hotel. Paid over $200/night for the worst Hilton experience in our travels. Will book future hotels with a different hotel brand

title: Embassy Suites International Drive - Convenient Location
review: Thank you for staying with us and I'm very sorry to hear we fell short of your and our expectations for delivering high level service and experience.  I would love the opportunity to speak with you more at your convenience about your stay.  I can be reached at 407-581-4301 or Gregory.rice@hilton.com.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Nice location!
review: We had an awesome time!!! The staff was excellent, the hotel was immaculate. It is located near all the good restaurants, shopping, and family activities. The walks at night  are fun and memorable:)!!!

title: Great location, clean, close to everything
review: Our family stayed Last week, beds and pull out sofa was very comfortable. Great breakfast in am, lots of choices including omelet station. Staff was wonderful and very close to universal and quick easy drive to Disney. Will be staying there again.

title: Definitely recommend
review: I'm so happy to hear you had such a great experience Andrea and I appreciate you taking the time to share.  We can't wait until your next visit to Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Good Location
review: Excellent service, clean, spacious, nice rooms. Everything was on point. Staff was very helpful when needed, and responded in a timely manner. The breakfast, and evening reception we're beyond what I expected. Great stay. Definitely recommend.

title: Good hotel near strip o restaurants
review: It's so wonderful to hear how much you enjoyed everything with your stay.  I really appreciate you choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  We look forward to your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great Stay!
review: Last minute trip to spend time with family. This is a great location - close to parks, endless restaurant options close by, & plenty to keep you entertained. Newly remodeled so the suite we had was clean & nicely appointed with microwave & mini fridge to keep water cool. Like all central atrium hotels it is bright...& noisy, with atrium activity amplified to all levels. So, if you need quiet in the early evening, find another location!

title: Business Trip
review: Great location, friendly Staff, clean rooms, awesome breakfast and free happy hour. On the down side, no pool service even though there were menus on the tables and there was a maintenance issue with the wall in our room. The wall was peeling above the mirror in the bedroom .

title: disappointed stay this time around
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Sabrina and sharing your lovely experience.  I'm so happy to hear how much you enjoyed the location, staff, breakfast and clean suites.  Our Food and Beverage team should be making rounds at the pool so I will follow up with them.  I will also have our engineering team take a look at the wall in the bedroom of your suite to repair that issue.  We look forward to your next visit with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Spring Break Getaway
review: my family and I were hitting the amusement parks this week and decided to stay at the Embassy suites by Hilton Orlando international drive and the room we are staying in is not worth the price we paid per night. this particular Embassy location seems to be raising their rates but their standards are getting lower. The bathroom needs some renovations, the breakfast was very average at best. I have stayed at many other Embassy suites that are so much cleaner and nicer and their breakfasts are more fresh. I will not be staying at this location anymore. Use your discernment.

title: Nice hotel right where you want to be...
review: Thank you for staying with us Joseph and I appreciate you sharing your feedback.  I'm very sorry to hear that we fell short on delivering our service standards and would love the opportunity to speak with you about some of the specific challenges with in your suite and at breakfast.  You can connect with me at your convenience at Gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Universal Stay
review: The hotel was a great location for our friends and family getaway.  The kids had a great time with the quality of the room and the pool. The breakfast was amazing and the staff was extremely helpful. i would recommend

title: Family vacation
review: Nice hotel and very clean.  They didn't tell us on the promo that it did not include parking which was $12 a day but in speaking with the account receivables, they took the charge off. Breakfast every day.  They have have a reception for welcoming you with snacks and drinks.  Outdoor movie, warm pool and washer/dryer if needed.
