Mattress needs to be changed out in the rooms..kinda felt like sleeping in a hotdog but over all a nice stay.

title: Great hotel and location
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Marijane and for sharing your experience.  I'm sorry that we didn't do a better job communicating with you prior to arrival but am glad that our team made it right and that you were able to enjoy so many of our amenities.  We can't wait to host your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great Hotel
review: We stayed 3 nights at this property and the experience was great from beginning to end. The drive from the airport is only approx. 15 min, ample self parking, and the check in was a breeze. Robert was very friendly and made the check in stress free. Since we wanted a suite on the top floor facing I Drive, we left our bags with Moe and walked across the street to Bahamas Breezy for lunch. We rec'd a text 15-20 later informing us that our suite was ready. The suite was nice with a king bed, 2 TV's, fridge, microwave, a sectional sofa and much more,,,. We were surprised day 2 with cheese & crackers, chocolate covered strawberries, and bottle of wine. The daily reception is nice -  complementary cocktails and light snacks. The only constructive criticism is maybe pipe in some light…

title: Expressway noise
review: It's so great to hear how much you enjoyed our team members, the size of our suites and all of our amenities.  I'll be sure to share your lovely feedback with Robert and Krystal as I know they will enjoy it.  I will also have our Director of F&B look into your suggestion about music as I really like that idea and make sure our chef has his team review the temperature of the food on the buffet.  We look forward to your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Good option for I Drive
review: Stayed here with my family of five.  The hotel is modern and clean and the staff was great.  A++ hotel.  Great area with tons of restaurant and bar options.  Also easy to get to Disney/Universal parks.  I would recommend to anyone for business or pleasure.

title: Great family hotel
review: Nice hotel located in the prime of Orlando. Close to restaurants, theme parks and a short drive from downtown Disney. Customer service was exceptional. We would stay there again. Thanks for a great time.

title: Not so Presidential Suite....
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Tae and for sharing your wonderful experience!  I'm so happy you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay and we can't wait to welcome you back.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Excellent Stay
review: Not sure where to begin, so I'll start from the beginning. My family was supposed to check in yesterday (3/20/18) at 4pm. We actually got there at about 6pm and our room still wasn't ready. We were asked to wait while they finished inspecting and cleaning the room. 15 minutes passed and a gentle man with a name tag (I believe David) walks up to my family and asked what the problem was. I explained to him that I wasn't exactly sure, but from what I was advised our room needed to be cleaned and inspected. Gentleman didn't offer an apology, instead he decided to say, "Well, the rain makes things busy..." in a very rude/curt way. He then walks away. I just thought because we were in the presidential suite things would have been more organized and we would have gotten what we paid…

title: Wedding weekend
review: Thank you for staying with us Mrs. Johnson and for sharing your experience.  I'm sorry to hear we fell short of delivering our typically high service standards and missed on a number of opportunities to exceed your expectations.  I also see that we worked with you at check out to make it right but clearly missed the mark on what we needed to do to make up for all of the challenges you experienced.  I would love the opportunity to speak with you more about your experience at your convenience and can be reached at 407-581-4301 or Gregory.rice@hilton.com.  I look forward to speaking with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Noise noise noise
review: We booked a suite for 2 adults and 4 children. Upon arrival the front desk was incredibly helpful and friendly. Our suite was ready early which was a bonus. The room was huge and a bonus was a separate sink area in the bedroom. The pool was nice and we enjoyed spending time out there. This was an incredible value for the money. We will definitely stay again.

title: Happy Hour Ends at 7:30 PM -- No Service at 7:31 PM
review: On our last of four days at this Embassy Suites we went to Universal and used the hotel's 7:15 PM shuttle service to travel back to the hotel.  We walked directly to the bar to get a drink after being dropped off out front.  When we got there a man was just closing off the bar, and we said that we just got off the shuttle and asked if we could we get a drink.  The woman behind the bar shook her head and said that it was 7.31.  (My watch said 7:30.).  It was only me and my husband, not 100 people, yet no drinks for us.  Shuttle:  We only used the one to Universal.  It leaves at 9:00 AM but doesn't come back until 7:15 PM or 9:15 PM.  There is no other option during the day.  Although they say the bus will be in space 67, the buses don't always go where they are supposed to.  We…

title: Freeway noise was deafening - NO sleep.
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your experience.  I'm happy to hear that overall you enjoyed your stay and appreciate the detail you provided about your positive and not so positive interactions.  We will certainly follow up with our bartenders as I agree with you they should be more flexible.  We look forward to hosting your next visit with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Book of Mormon
review: Our room overlooked I4.  NO soundproofing in room.  The noise, even with earplugs, was horrid with semi truck engine brakes and loud motorcycles punctuating the constant din of freeway traffic just yards from window.  I am surprised Hilton allows its franchise on this property — especially on the west side facing the freeway.  Clean and quiet are basic essentials that even a proper two star hotel will deliver.  This experience was awful.  Beware.

title: Great hotel, great location for an off-Disney experience
review: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience. I'm sorry to hear this most recent stay wasn't an enjoyable one and fell below your expectations. I'd love the opportunity to speak with you more about it at your convenience and can be reached at Gregory.rice@hilton.com or 407-581-4301. I look forward to hearing from you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Good Hotel with Excellent Service!
review: I have stayed here in the past so chose to stay here again when in Orlando. However I got the sleeper sofa and it was full of gummy bears! I was very disappointed obviously the bedding had not been changed or cleaned. First time we stayed was a great experience, not so much this time.

title: Not what I expect from Embassy Suites
review: My husband and I stayed here last Saturday night just to get away. When we stay in Orlando, we usually stay at the Embassy Suites on Jamaican Court but it was sold out so we tried this one. We will not make this mistake again. The room itself was nice but the light over the table flickered the whole time and the outlet in the bathroom could not be used as it looked like something blew up in it and there was remnants of something stuck in the holes. We went down for the evening reception and were sorely disappointed. There is only one bartender there to accommodate the entire hotel on a Saturday night so you have to stand in line like cattle only to be greeted by a less than friendly bartender to only give you the choice of minimal drinks. My husband and I normally order amaretto…

title: Very Happy Here
review: Thank you for your response and for staying with us.  I'm so sorry to hear your experience was below your and our expectations and would love the opportunity to speak with you more about it.  Please feel free to call me at your convenience at 407-352-4301 or email me at Gregory.rice@hilton.com as I would love learn more so we can make necessary improvements.    Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Disappointed for an Embassy Suite property
review: Last trip to Orlando I stayed downtown, never again as I just wasn’t happy staying in that area .International drive is so much better as everything is in walking distance and I really enjoyed this hotel . Room was excellent , free breakfast and staff is great  . I will be back !

title: Average place to stay.
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your amazing experience!  I'm so happy you enjoyed everything about the suites, breakfast and wonderful staff.  We look forward to your next stay with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: It's an Embassy Suites...They are alwasy nice
review: Value vs Room Rate is out of proportion. This is a middle of the road hotel property charging upper class room rates. View from our room was the apartment complex next door and the Interstate just beyond. Beds are comfortable and a decent breakfast is included.

title: Good option in Orlando
review: This hotel is a very good option in Orlndo specially for families. It's close to most attractions and restaurants. Easy access and a lot of parking spots. The rooms are very spacious with a lot of amenities. I will recommend this hotel with no hesitation.

title: Pool water temp may break it....
review: I really appreciate the kind words and lovely review!  Thank you for staying with us and for sharing your experience.  We can't wait to host your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great hotel with awesome location
review: Very clean. Great breakfast. Good location. Was here in January for the long MLK weekend. Aside from the frigid pool water at the indoor pool, we were happy. Decided to come back to Orlando for another weekend and give the hotel another try. The indoor pool water was much warmer and family was happier.

title: Meh
review: I'm thrilled to hear you had such a great experience with us and appreciate you sharing.  During your first visit our heater for the indoor pool actually went down and we got it replaced as quickly as we could.  As you mentioned the temperature is much warmer now and everything is working perfectly.  We can't wait to see you again on your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Nice Hotel for Taking in a Convention
review: Complimentary breakfast and happy hour drinks are an amazing benefit! Staff was pleasant and helpful, except for one grumpy bartender. Facility looks a little dated from the outside, but the interior is beautiful.

title: Nice Stay, could use some improvements
review: Great Hotel, only bad thing is that we had to leave before breakfast started.  They also charge $15 a day to self park.   $25 to valet ,  They should offer free parking like the other hotels.   Breakfast didn't start till 7:30am, we had to leave at 7am.  The hotel has a evening hour which was great!

title: Convenient and Comfortable Stay
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Anthony and for the wonderful review!  I'm sorry to hear you didn't get to enjoy breakfast but am happy you thought so highly of our evening reception.  We look forward to your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Welcoming and comfortable stay
review: Hotel was very clean and comfortable.  Great location for restaurants, bars and shopping.  Staff was very attentive, friendly, and very professional.  This is a good hotel for person and or business. Glad this was the hotel of choice!  I will return!!

title: Great Hilton Affiliate.
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Sara and for sharing your amazing experience!  I'm so happy you had such a great time and best of all you will be coming back!  We look forward to your next visit with us.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: First time in Orlando
review: Overall a smooth and fun experience. Everyone we interacted with was very welcoming and professional.  The hotel had a lot of amenities, and the breakfast in the morning was great!  Their omelette chef made a delicious omelette.

title: Great Stay....Great Location in Orlando
review: We stayed at Embassy Suites for 2 weeks over New Year. Check in was quick and efficient. We only ate breakfast on a couple of occasions during our stay, there was a variety on offer as well as the freshly made omelettes with a good selection of fillings that we always enjoyed, The evening reception was also good for a refreshment before going out.    The room we had (630) was easily spacious enough for a couple, with a big super king bed which was very comfortable and was changed every few days. There was plenty storage in the bedroom for our clothes. It also has a vanity unit which is very useful as the bathrooms are quite compact.  The sitting area was very comfortable with a modern sofa, dining table, small sink, fridge and coffee maker. The free wifi only worked in the…

title: Excellent Stay
review: Thank you so much for the kind words Paul and Sharon and for continuing to chose to stay with us again.  We loved having you hear and can't wait until you return next year!  Gregory Rice  General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Average - BEWARE NO SOUNDPROOFING
review: Very nice hotel and great lobby area we used for breakfast and to sit with friends and talk.  Conveniently located near attractions, stores and restaurants.  Nice breakfast offerings including a station where they make real eggs any style.  Evening reception was a nice touch offering chips, dips, carrots/celery and a few drinks.  Considering all of the amenities, this hotel offers a great value and experience.

title: Great Stay
review: I'm thrilled to hear what an amazing experience you had Barry and really appreciate you taking the time to share!  It's so wonderful to know you enjoyed so many of our great features and we look forward to welcoming you back!  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Pretty nice
review: My review is based solely on the room noise and location and WiFi, which to me are big make or breaks for a stay.  I found the lobby to be nice and upgraded, the fitness center was modern and clean, the breakfast was good, and the hotel staff was friendly.  My major issues lie with the continued issues from Hilton with WiFi connection.  I'm a Hilton Gold Member and I'm continually disappointed by their inability to get their WiFi connection even adequate.  I was located on the top floor of the hotel and I could get average speed if I was sitting in the living room of my room but as soon as I went into the bedroom, the connection would not reach and the WiFi would go down.  I've had this issue with their properties before where the connection would not reach to all the rooms. …

title: What is the point of having a reservation if you do not honor it?
review: I booked this hotel at a premium rate in order to attend a trade show at the nearby convention center.  I booked my room months in advance and called to confirm my reservation about a month prior to arriving.  After a long day of traveling and getting to this hotel I was told upon arrival that they did not have a room for me and I needed to go to a hotel located in the Disney property.  I specifically booked a room at this hotel so I wouldn't waste half my day driving & parking at the extremely busy trade show/convention center.  I repeatedly told the on call manager who was little more that 18 years old that I wanted my confirmed room at that hotel to which she replied she had none and then proceeded to lie to my face about the fact that she would comp any taxi fees and that I…

title: On I Drive, close enough to everything.
review: I appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback from your recent experience with us.  I apologize for the issues you faced and would love the opportunity to speak with you further about them.  Please feel free to reach out to me at 407-581-4301 or email me at Gregory.rice@Hilton.com at your convenience.  Have a wonderful day.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: To many good hotels in the area to stay here again!
review: Stayed here for 5 nights between Christmas and New Year’s Day. The rooms look recently renovated and clean which is very nice. But I think it’s an older hotel, so the walls and floors are pretty thin. We could clearly hear the neighbors talking. We had a corner room, but still close enough to the elevators. But the wifi in the room was terrible, in the bedroom it was non existent.  In the lobby and breakfast area the wifi was good, but that’s not very convenient.  The breakfast was very good, wide selection on the buffet area & there is a chef for cook to order eggs.  There is also an evening reception, but the snacks were limited.  The location was perfect on International Drive, close enough to drive to everything, but far enough that you are out of the congested areas.  Would…

title: Epic Vacation
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Spencer and for sharing your great experience!  I'm so happy to hear how much you enjoyed our renovated suites, location and wonderful breakfast!  I'm sorry to hear the Wi-Fi in your room was giving you issues but am happy to see that it worked in the public areas.  We can't wait to host you on your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Room & staff
review: Thought we made a good choice when booking at the embassy suites...we were wrong. Considering this has been the coldest week in Florida so far the draft coming in from our slider was horrible at night, you could hear everything. Realized the problem when we woke up and it was raining and leaking thru the slider and into our room. The next issue we had was that there was no coffee maker in our room, they provided you with everything you need to make coffee including k-cups but don't expect to use them in the morning since ya know....theres no coffee maker. At breakfast we ran into this nice woman named Brittany that went up to the front desk to ask them about it and they told her no, that room isn't suppose to have one. Weird. You would think that was something that every hotel…

title: Bathroom needs some attention
review: The hotel is overall a nice place with the expected amenities. Pool, hot tub, fitness gym, free breakfast, etc. The staff were all friendly, and accommodating. We stayed in a 1 BR suite with 2 queen beds, and a sleeper sofa in the living room. We loved the set up of the room because we were all in one room, but still had some privacy between ourselves. The only reason I didn't give this hotel five stars is because of the bathroom. Although not a major problem, it was rather small. However, what really bothered us was the shower. The pressure in the shower was so strong that water leaked onto the bathroom floors (even with the shower liner in the tub), making it impossible for us to take a shower without water splashing every where. Another problem, was how hot the bathroom got.…

title: Excellent Hotel
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your experience.  I'm very happy to hear how much you loved your suite and the layout and would love the opportunity to discuss the challenges with your bathroom further.  Please reach out to me at your convenience at Gregory.rice@Hilton.com or 407-581-4301.  Have a wonderful day and Happy New Year!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Wonderful Winter Vacation!!!!
review: You are guaranteed to love this Hotel in every way. The staff are friendly and gave excellent services. The suites are spacious, clean, and quite comfortable. The bed sheets are a beautiful white. Overall, this hotel is an excellent hotel.

title: Hotel did not handle issue
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Deborah and for the wonderful review!  I'm so happy you enjoyed everything and we truly look forward to your next visit with us.  Happy New Year!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Absolutely no complaints
review: Wow!!! Thank you Embassy Suites for making my Christmas vacation spectacular!!! Everything, from checking in/out, complimentary breakfast (which was very yummy), front desk staff, valet staff, housekeeping staff, complimentary shuttle to Disney and Universal Parks was AMAZING!!!!!  This is our third time staying here and we will return December 2018!

title: Excellent
review: This was an excellent hotel.  The room was like in a new hotel .  Staff was great from check in to check out.Great breakfast and evening reception.   Trolley  stop was in front of hotel so we didn't have to take a taxi every time we went somewhere as we didn't have a car.

title: Nice
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Diane and for the amazing review!  I'm so happy to hear the staff was excellent and you loved our location!  We can't wait to see you on your next visit.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Always the best
review: We enjoyed our stay. The room was icy cold the first three days. Finally the wait staff from the restaurant called a co worker who came and produced some heat. The shower constantly on when trying to fill the tub was not resolved.

title: Dec 2017
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your experience.  I'm sorry it took so long for us to address the heat in your suite but am glad our team was able to help.  Have a wonderful holiday season and we can't until your next visit to Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Embassy suites
review: Embassy Suites Orlando was great! From our arrival to departure, everything was wonderful.   Rooms are clean, comfortable and spacious.  Staff was great, food good, love the complimentary evening reception!  Hilton makes it hard to stay anywhere else!

title: Dog Show Delight
review: The hotel was one of several partners with the AKC dog shows being held mid-December.  Our one bedroom king suite was extremely comfortable -- lots of room for me, my husband, the dog, and her crate and goodies.  Free doggy biscuits in the lobby.    Delicious breakfast.  I had a few bites of my husband's cheese omelette one day--had oatmeal and all the fixings the next two days, along with a bowl of fresh fruit (melons, & pineapple).  Great strong coffee.  Very clean, very convenient location near Orlando Pointe and the Convention Center (less than a mile).  We have attended the dog show 3 times--certainly this time, the first time at this property, felt far more luxurious and comfortable.  My husband used the exercise center, and said it was fantastic.  He also had some other…

title: Nice Hotel Nice location
review: I'm so happy to hear how wonderful your trip was during the annual AKC dog show and that of the three years in attendance you loved our hotel the best!  I can't thank you enough for staying with us and for sharing all the wonderful things about our property.  We truly look forward to the your return in 2018!  Happy Holidays.  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great Location.
review: Embassy has a nice location walking distance to a number of restaurants. 15 min walk to the convention center was easy and safe. Rooms are nice comfy beds had no issue with hot water on 7th floor, good breakfast, happy hour as well. A little pricey in my opinion but the staff was super easy check in and out. I would stay here again.

title: Beware of roaming time share sellers!
review: I'm so happy you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate you taking the time to share your experience!  I'm glad our breakfast, location and comfy beds were just what you were looking for and we can't wait to welcome you back.  Have a Happy Holidays!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Excellent!
review: Excellent location in the heart of I-drive, lovely suite and Free breakfast which is excellent with lots of choice and an hour of complimentary drinks with snacks such as tortilla chips with 5 layer dip. we loved it here although our kids found it a little boring. Only small niggle we had was elevators were very slow and there was no staircase unless you used the fire exit.

title: Personal Time after a Conference
review: I stayed in this hotel for a  few nights at the end of a conference that was at the Orange County Convention Center. I stayed at a different hotel for the duration of the conference but moved to this hotel for my personal stay. While it was a great hotel and I had excellent service, I think I would have preferred this hotel for the business part of my stay. The benefits of Embassy Suites was the free breakfast every morning, the manager's hour with free drinks and snacks, and the very spacious rooms. The hotel was beautifully decorated, and as part of the Hilton Honors club, the staff would text me updates or make sure that I had no issues with my stay. For my personal days, the main aspect I was hoping for was more of an outdoor space to enjoy. There is both an indoor and…

title: Very nice hotel with comfortable beds.
review: Thank you for staying with us during the leisure portion of your trip Kiersten and I'm very happy to hear how much you enjoyed our many amenities.  We'd love to have you back again for business or pleasure and can't wait until your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great stay
review: This hotel was spacious and beautiful inside the lobby and the rooms were the same with comfortable bedding. The hotel had big indoor and outdoor pools with a kiddy pool about a foot deep which was perfect for my toddlers. The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast had a big variety to choose from with custom ordered omelets also. The lobby/breakfast staff was also very friendly and quick to clean up after guests. It was nice that the sitting area was large so you weren't cramped eating next to others like a smaller hotel dining area would be. They also offered complementary snacks and beverages in the evening which we heard from other was real nice although we weren't around at that time. I would definetly recommend this hotel. It is conveniently located on…

title: Great location and amazing staff!
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for the amazing review!  I'm so happy to hear you were able to enjoy both pools and many of the great amenities we have to offer.  It's always great to hear how friendly our staff are as well and they will be very pleased when we share this with them.  Have a wonderful holiday season!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: My Stay
review: From the minute we stepped into the newly remodeled lobby we felt it was very welcoming.  It's December, so the holiday decorations are wonderful.  The new rooms are beautiful and functional.  We were given a room on the top floor, which had a very nice balcony overlooking the Orlando Eye and all of I-Drive.

title: Comfy Suite
review: We stayed here one night after our cruise. The suite was nice and comfy. Staff was great. There is plenty to do in the area. Lots of restaurants, senor frogs and more. The complimentary breakfast buffet is amazing. We will be back soon.

title: Embassy Suites Orlando International drive
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for the great review! I'm happy you chose us as your post cruise destination and enjoyed so many of our great features and location.  We look forward to your next visit when you can spend more time exploring I-Drive!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Thanksgiving holiday
review: Good Location.  Clean and great rooms with plenty of work space and a nice couch in living room plus coffee, microwave and mini fridge!  Nice indoor and outdoor pool.  Jacuzzi is inside also so very nice!  Staff is very nice, and let's not forget FREE cocktails rom 5:30 to 7:30.

title: Excellent Hotel near a lot of attractions
review: I'm thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your stay Mike and really appreciate you taking time to share!  I'm so happy you were able to enjoy so many of our amenities including our great managers reception.  Until next time!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: It's an Embassy Suites but......
review: Fab hotel, clean tidy and friendly been comming here every year for ten years, and will be back next year. Nothing is to little or to much for the staff. Breakfast is brilliant lots to choose from, everything is clean and tidy and so central to everything.

title: Great value for your money!
review: This hotel was very clean and quiet.  The rooms are spacious and the beds are very comfortable.  The bathrooms are large.  The evening reception was a very nice way to take a break after a long day at the parks.  Every morning we enjoyed the complimentary breakfast.  It was a full breakfast including made to order omelets.  There was a shuttle service to the parks that picks you up right in front of the hotel.  The price was very fair for the week, especially for all that was included.  We would definitely stay here on our next trip!!

title: Exceptional hospitality
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your awesome experience!  I'm so happy you enjoyed our spacious suites, evening reception and cooked to order breakfast as those are our brand pillars and really important to our success!  We look forward to hosting you on your next visit.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Hotel review
review: Loved this Embassy suites hotel.  Large, welcoming lobby with atrium.  Much space to sit especially during breakfast, there was enough seating for all.  Managers special a plus.  Rooms very spacious, clean with an open feeling when you step out of your room.  All of the staff were welcoming and friendly.  I would like to recognize Donovan, for his upbeat personality and his strong work ethic.  Also Kathy, the bartender who was very personable and on top of everything.  Had a memorable experience and will return to this hotel.

title: At home feeling
review: It's so great to hear about your wonderful experience with us.  I truly appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback and am delighted to hear that Donovan and Kathy really stood out to you as going above and beyond.  We can't wait for your next visit to Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great place to stay while in Orlando!
review: Great hotel. Really worth the pricepoint. Very good service and room quality. I would very much recommend this hotel for business or pleasure. The pool was clean and heated. The complimentary breakfast and HH were well worth it and overall just nice additions to the experience.

title: Another Good Experience
review: My 4th time holidaying in this hotel and it lived up to expectations. Great location and well run hotel. Staff are very friendly and helpful. I would reccoment a room facing international drive as it is quieter. Manager reception is a good way to start your evening.

title: Wonderful Stay
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Tommy and for sharing your amazing experience!  We look forward to your next holiday with us and can't wait to see you again.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great place to stay
review: We stayed here as a family of five (3 adults, 2 teenagers) for 10 nights.   We had a wonderful stay in this hotel. The rooms were spacious and spotlessly clean. The staff were extremely helpful, and the concierge gave us lots of information about what to do in the area. They also provide shuttles to Universal and Disney parks.  The hotel is in an ideal location, so many restaurants within walking distance. Less than 10 minutes drive to Universal Studios. Less than 20 minutes to Disney and Florida Mall. And it is on the itrolley route for access to outlets and SeaWorld/Aquatica.   The complimentary breakfast had so many options, and the omelettes were delicious. I do feel that the buffet food was not hot enough but that’s just a personal opinion. Evening drinks reception was a…

title: Good amenities and well located!
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your great experience!  I'm so happy to hear you enjoyed our large suites and great amenities from the shuttle to our complimentary breakfast and reception.  We can't wait to see you again on your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Location is excellent
review: The hotel was beautiful, clean, and staff was friendly and quite helpful.  The restaurant food was top notch and staff went over the top to make us feel like family.    Shuttle drivers to/from Universal were prompt and friendly, although traveling off season, there were only two choices for drop off/pick up.  Nothing a cab ride back from CityWalk couldn't fix at an affordable rate. (Around $12.50 one way).   Located near a ton of restaurants if you don't want to dine at hotel (although I do recommend the hotel food as it is very good with large portions).  A lovely extended weekend vacay for the family!

title: Rip off
review: Totally deceptive reservations policy disguises their 72 hour notice requirement. What kind of lying, deceitful mentality let's these people sleep at night knowing that they are ripping people off.  They use big bold fonts to tout FREE cancellations but hide the fact that you will be charged unless canceling 72...that's right...not customary 24 hours...72 hours. Got me there. But they'll never see another dollar of my money. So long Hilton.

title: Pre cruise resting place
review: Thank you for sharing your feedback Paul and I'm so sorry you had such an unpleasant experience. I would love to hear more details regarding your experience with our reservations team to make sure we are not misleading you or any future guests as that is certainly not our goal.  Please feel free to call me at 407-581-4301 or email me at Gregory.rice@Hilton.com and I look forward to hearing from you.  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Worst stay at Embassy ever
review: We are taking a family vacation that's two weeks long, and it started was this amazing facility for our 2-week adventure. The Embassy Suites, no matter where you are and where you go has the same great quality service and policies. If there is one thing I can count on its consistency of the complementary to our happy hour which includes free alcoholic beverages and light snacks, and a nice hot breakfast in the morning. Another great thing that this hotel offers is a free shuttle service within 2 miles as well as free shuttle service to and from the airport they start at 4 a.m. and it ends at midnight. Anything I requested everybody here has been nothing short of kind and quick responding. The only qualm I had was that our toilet didn't flush unless you held it down for about 5…

title: Awesome location
review: Just came from a two -night stay at Marriott in Orlando and wish we had never left!!  We are here for a 3-night stay at this hotel.  Service by the 3 giggling and inattentive staff at the counter should have given it all away.  Left at 9 am and came back at 10 pm to find our room had not been cleaned.  Called for coffee replenishment for the next morning and was told there is no coffee. Said they would get some from a vacant room- yep they NEVER showed up!  Horrible.  Go to the Marriott!

title: Enjoyed my stay
review: Thank you for sharing your feedback and I'm so sorry you had such an unpleasant experience.  I would love to hear more details surrounding your stay so we can work to improve our service execution and prevent further negative experiences for all of our future guests.  Please feel free to call me at 407-581-4301 or email me at Gregory.rice@Hilton.com and I look forward to hearing from you.  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great location and service. Elevator situation horrible
review: I travel 100+ nights year and split my time between Hilton/Embassy Suites and Marriott.  This Embassy suites is one of the better ones I've stayed at.  Great location, walking distance to many great restaurants and bars.  Front desk service was friendly and efficient.  The free breakfast is above average and the free evening reception that something Marriott simply doesn't match.  The bartender and breakfast area service was both friendly and efficient.    Our room was clean and comfortable.  The sitting area is a nice place to work.  The one glaring and major flaw is the elevator service.  There are two sets of glass elevators.  The elevators are slow, very slow to begin with.    Making matters worse, and for whatever reason, they shutdown one full bank of elevators (2 units)…

title: Great hotel to stay in Orlando
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your experience! I'm so pleased to hear you had such a great time and enjoyed the great location, service and amenities we have. I'm sorry to hear you experienced some challenges with our elevators during your visit.  I'm not sure why they would have shut down any bank of elevators and would love to get some more details from you as we did not have anything scheduled.  I can be reached by phone or email at 407-581-4301 or Gregory.rice@hilton.com.  I look forward to hearing from you and we can't wait to see you again on your next trip.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Another Brilliant Stay at Embassy Suites on International Drive, Orlando
review: This hotel has very nice facilities and very gracious staff. They also provide a very nice, hot, complementary breakfast, including eggs made to order. It is also in a good location to visit the local attractions.

title: love Embassy
review: Thank you so much for staying with us Sara and sharing your great experience!  I'm so pleased to hear you had such a great time and enjoyed so many of our great amenities and location.  We can't wait to see you again on your next trip.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great Service
review: This is my second vacation at Embassy Suites Hotel on International Drive, Florida (not the Jamaica Court Hotel of the same name nearby). Recently had a renovation which had made it look all new & fresh and a fantastic location on International Drive. The bonus for USA is this hotel includes an amazing buffet breakfast with full hot & cold choices, and the double bonus is that you have a Happy Hour free full bar from 5.30 to 7.30 pm every night. The rooms & bathroom are spacious and I know ate disabled friendly, & also include a kitchenette with the important fridge for cold drinks. I didn’t use any other kitchen facilities as I was on vacation. I will definitely return again & again & would thoroughly recommend this hotel.

title: Great hotel stay
review: Good location, suites were clean and quiet.  Staff was very helpful and friendly.  Great place to stay for business or leisure.  I would stay here again when I return to Orlando.  Also close enough to the airport.

title: Very satisfied
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your great experience!  I'm so happy to hear you had such a wonderful time and we can't wait until you come back to visit us again.  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Clean, spacious, free breakfast, close to all!
review: Stayed in a king bed suite, window view, second floor. Very spacious, bed was comfortable. Extra room was great for working on laptop. They have a complimentary reception every night, free cocktails and appetizers. I didn't get to part take as business took me away, but that is a great value. Breakfast spread was great, scrambled eggs, potatoes, biscuits and gravy, bacon and sausage, yogurt, cereal, fruit, the whole nine yards. Staff was insanely attentive. International Drive is an excellent walking location, many restaurants and bars, just about a 10 minute walk to Orlando Pointe Shops.

title: AHHHMAZZING
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your great experience.  I'm so happy you decided to stay with us and that you enjoyed so many aspects of our hotel.  We look forward to hosting you again the next time you come to Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Internet does not work in the rooms
review: It's difficult to find a hotel room for a family of 5 that allows enough space.  This Embassy Suites delivers!!  Plenty of room, very nice lobby and grounds.  The nightly manager's reception (free snacks and drinks) and the free hot breakfast are definite bonuses, as are the 2 pools (indoor and outdoor).  Right on I-drive and close to everything Orlando.

title: top notch
review: beautiful hotel with friendly and helpful service.  happy hour and breakfast buffet are two great features at this conveniently located motel. Lots to do on International Drive.  looking forward to a return visit.

title: I THINK I AM IN LOVE
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your amazing experience!  I'm so happy to hear how much you enjoyed all of our great features and we can't wait to see you again!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Wonderful experience
review: This is the best High End hotel for your money.  This place is Great!   The hotel lobby is beautiful and the staff are off the chain NICE!  The suites are very updated and flat out georgous.  Love this place!!!!  The free breakfast was just unbelievable.....even had an "ORDER YOUR OWN OMLETTE STATION" and any thing you would want for breakfast.  Did I Mention it comes with your booking at the hotel.....Meaning NO EXTRA charges!!!!  They also have a Evening reception that is also included.  I will never stay anywhere else.....EMBASSY YOU HAVE ME!!!!!  If I could give you more than a five (5) I would.  To me you should be a 100%!!!!!  Would like to thank Embassy Suites and the wonderful staff......you are the bench mark to what a 4+STAR HOTEL should be.  Thanks for taking the…

title: Great Stay
review: I'm thrilled to hear how much you loved your experience Coach!  Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful experience with everyone.  We can't wait until your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Sweet 16
review: This is a perfect hotel for anyone looking to be close to the attractions and a plethora of food/shopping options. The managers cocktail hour and complimentary breakfast are an extra bonus at Embassy!

title: Fab hotel,excellent location.Free breakfast & WIFI. $26 from airport in taxi.Bars/ restaurants 200 yards away.
review: Embassy Suites, $26 in an Uber from Orlando airport to the hotel.  Directly across the road, about a 2 minute walk from the hotel bars & restaurants are located, plenty to choose from,walk in either direction or take a rickshaw to explore the area. Hooters bar was opposite, even though the road outside our window, we had no noise at all from traffic. Situated in the center of International Drive, great location for shopping outlets at either North or South end of idrive. The i trolley bus stopped directly outside the hotel to take you to the North outlet. This cost $2 each (have correct change) & came every 15 approximately during the day.Across the road (about 200yards) to get i trolley other way down International drive.  Rooms really large. Separate Lounge as you come in the…

title: Nice hotel will definitely stay again
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your amazing experience Suzanne! I'm so happy to hear how much you enjoyed everything from our complimentary breakfast, to the evening reception to our newly renovated suites. I'm also glad our team took great care of you before you shipped out for your cruise. We can't wait until your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Alright but constant humming
review: This hotel is on the main drag of international drive. Very convenient for restaurants, shopping, convention center. Service is really great and it includes a free breakfast buffet. What surprised me at this particular Embassy suites was it did not offer waffles to order as most of all the others do. However they do offer omelettes to order which was very nice. Free happy hour offering snacks and drinks every evening, is really nice before going out to dinner or on the town.

title: Great, as usual.
review: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your great experience!  I love hearing about all the great things you enjoyed from our excellent location to the great service our staff provides.  We look forward to your next visit with us when you are back in Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Perfect location
review: The rooms are good here, two double beds, good sized bathroom and a small lounge area with TV. Breakfast is OK and the food overall is pretty good. Problems experienced included the room key systems failing (in all of Florida apparently), room service that takes an hour when busy, the parking barrier never works with room keys - but the biggest issue in this hotel is the noise. It's hard to get a room away from the freeway and when you do outside is the noisiest air con fans I've ever heard.  Trust me you'll need to bring ear plugs to this hotel. So, would I return - no I'm afraid.

title: Place worth staying
review: Check in was easy. Hotel has been renovated in the past year or so and is now very attractive and the rooms are nice. Great place to stay in the heart of International Drive. Easy walking distance to a number of interactive attractions and great restaurants.

title: Good for family vacation
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your amazing experience! I'm so happy to hear how much you enjoyed our newly renovated suites, easy check in and fantastic location. We look forward to your next visit when you are back in town!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Disappointed
review: Stayed here for a week on business. Food decent, staff very friendly and helpful. Love the atrium. Room has a total of 3 sinks with sleeper sofa and two TVs. TV reception was mediocre in the bedroom but ok in the living room. Roomy suites but  stuffy smell. Not sure if that's Hurricane Irma effect or regularly like this. Room on 8th floor with balcony to the freeway and was very noisy at night. Good for family travel not so much for business.

title: AJ
review: Thank you Angela for choosing to stay with us and sharing your experience.  I'm happy to hear how much you enjoyed the atrium, large rooms and friendly staff we have at the hotel.  With new suites we don't typically have a stuffy odor and have rarely had issues with TV reception so I will have my team investigate.  We look forward to your next visit with us!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great place to stay
review: Stayed here before the lobby was noisy all night.  Complained to the front desk and they assured it would be resolved and it was.  The evening event was scaled back from several items to eat to popcorn and fruit disappointed

title: Best bang for your buck HANDS DOWN.
review: The hotel is amazing.  I love the center atrium with natural sunlight.  Love the concept of hotel suites. Couches in living room and bed were very comfortable.  The complimentary champagne and complimentary cupcakes with strawberries in the refrigerator was a great touch. Breakfast was amazing. Not your continental breakfast of other hotels. The happy hour reception is awesome.  I try to make it my goal to always stay with embassy when I travel because of the great amenities they offer.

title: Great Stay
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your amazing experience!  I'm so happy to hear how much you enjoyed everything from our complimentary breakfast, to the evening reception to our newly renovated suites.  I'm also glad our team recognized you were celebrating a special occasion with us.  We can't wait until your next visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great location, friendly staff
review: The hotel is on I-drive which I didn't know about the location before arriving, but once we got there it was perfect for us.  Even after the hurricane there was little disturbance to this area.  Hotel is super clean and comfy. Staff was friendly enough. Central location to Disney and Universal was the best part.

title: EH...NOT EVEN CLOSE TO WHAT WE EXPECTED!!!
review: I'm thrilled to hear you had such a great time with us and that you enjoyed our amazing location, friendly staff and brand new rooms!  Thank you so much for sharing and we look forward to your next stay with us when you come back to visit!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Our choice in hotels where ever we travel
review: A great location near many restaurants. Hotel looks good after the renovation. Plenty of hot water this time! Breakfast and evening reception good. Embassy Suites is always my first choice. Would be nice if parking was free.

title: Embassy Suites International Drive
review: I would like to say that I am very impressed  with the employees of this hotel, Every employee I spoke with housekeepers, front desk, breakfast servers and  maintenance  were  welcome, friendly some of them did not have any power at their home.This hotel best asset is their employees. All of them understand what customer services mean to the guest. kudos for them! They need to be recognized by your headquarters CEO.

title: horrible
review: I'm thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us and how amazing our staff is.  I couldn't agree with you more that they are the number 1 asset of this property and I truly appreciate you taking the time to share.  We look forward to your next stay with us!    Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center.

title: The staff of this hotel are incredible...
review: Horrible smell in the room and hallway. They had a blower out there that was so loud I couldn't sleep. The noise level from the highway was also really loud. When I reported my problem the staff didn't seem to care.

title: Hurricane Irma evacuee
review: Thank you for staying with us and I appreciate your feedback Megan.  I'm very sorry to hear your experience was far below our standards and we have reached out to you to better understand what we can do better so we can correct our deficiencies and future guests don't have the same experience.  We look forward to touching base with you.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Wonderful, attentive staff!
review: Dear Greg,  It’s Friday evening and things are slowly getting back to normal after Irma.  I wanted to write a letter to you and your entire staff, due to the exemplary service that my family received during our 3 night stay this past weekend.  I don’t use the word exemplary often, but you and your team deserve praise of the highest form.    When we arrived at your hotel, Derick greeted us with a huge smile and unloaded our 3 fully packed cars and took everything to our room.  I was impressed with his customer focus and empathy in a tough situation. Also, I must mention that Raymond was equally impressive as we checked out.  His composure during a very busy checkout was reassuring and welcomed.   During our stay, we received your invitation to the “Activity Room,” and that’s…

title: Another excellent holiday
review: We visit Orlando once or twice a year and always stay in Embassy Suites Int. Drive.  This is an excellent hotel with excellent staff and the best location in Orlando.  There is a restaurant and bar in the hotel and a fantastic selection of Restaurants, Cafe's, Fast food and Bars are all within walking distance. It has an out door and an indoor pool a spa and a kiddies pool. A full cooked breakfast and a 2 hour free bar is included in the room rate. All rooms are suites and are spotless and very comfortable, there's a TV in the sitting room area and another in the bedroom. Also a fridge and microwave and a safe. There's plenty of parking and a good bus service passes the door for non motorists. Car rental is available.

title: Ideal family hotel
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for the excellent review!  I'm glad to hear how much you enjoyed your time with us and how accommodating our staff are. I agree our location can't be beat and love that you enjoyed all the great amenities we have to offer. Can't wait to see you again next time!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Beautiful, clean and friendly
review: This is very well situated in International Drive close to many restaurants and the attractions so no need for the car all the time. The rooms are spacious and contain a kitchenette with microwave and fridge. Why then do they not provide any cutlery, crockery or cooking utensils? There is a complimentary service of drinks accompanied by nachos and salsa, popcorn and pretzels every day. Breakfast is included and is good-better if you queue for the freshly prepared eggs or omelettes. We were there taking shelter during the recent hurricane so did not experience the outdoor pool but there is also a smaller indoor pool.

title: Great Location
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your experience.  I am so happy to hear how much you enjoyed your time with us and the great location and amenities we have.  I appreciate your feedback about providing utensils in the room as its something we've considered doing in the past and will revisit.  Look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Orlando.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: The perfect spot
review: We were in town for the Surf Show and had a wonderful experience at this hotel.  Accommodations were beautiful, restaurants were delicious and staff was one of the best!  Would highly recommend.   Great price for business travel.

title: Dissappaointed from the last time we stayed
review: Booked here because we had stayed here a few years ago. It's a great location for Disney and restaurants etc. Starting to look a little tired. Rooms need a bit of perking up.  We liked this hotel because the buffet breakfast was great and it's included in the price of the hotel.  This time they had half the selection of food and the fruit was tinned fruit very dissappaointed.

title: Like Embassy
review: Good Day Dawn and thank you for the review.  I'm not sure you have the right hotel as we just completed a full renovation just over 6 months ago and redid all of our guest rooms and our lobby.  I'd love to talk further with you about it and you can reach me at 407-581-4301.  Have a wonderful day.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Excellent Stay Again
review: Good place to stay nice rooms.  Very good breakfast.  Great managers reception in the evenings. Staff was very helpful and polite.  Checked on us during the week to make sure everything was ok. Pool outside and inside.  Conference rooms to hold meetings.

title: Better than your standard 3* but
review: Thank you so much for sharing your experience and choosing to stay with us.  I was so happy to hear you were able to enjoy so many of our great amenities.  We look forward to your next visit!   Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Good experience in Orlando
review: Room was clean, breakfast was great, staff is certainly helpful and so nice all the time during my stay.  Great location to all major attractions. Bus stop out front is a plus.  Front desk and Porter staff is very helpful with local questions.

title: Good location if you can bear the traffic from highway 4 while you try to sleep.
review: Hotel was in great location for Orlando. Close to good restaurants and entrainment. Beware rooms that face hwy 4 are extremely noisy from traffic all night long. Good luck sleeping! Not much help from front desk.

title: Great Experience
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your experience.  I'm sorry to hear that we fell short of your expectations and that our staff was not as helpful when you brought this to our attention.  I will be sure to follow up with them and use this as a learning opportunity.  I do hope the next time you visit Orlando you will give us another chance to prove to you that this was not a typical experience.  Gregory Rice General Manager  Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: The Taylor Review
review: Great hotel with friendly staff. They gave us tickets for the bus service that they took us to Orange County Convention Center.  The rooms were nice and I was impressed with the large bath towels. A real value.

title: Convenient, Clean and good Value
review: I so happy to hear how much you enjoyed your time with us and how friendly and helpful our staff are.  We also love our newly renovated rooms and our resort style towels. Can't wait to see you again next time!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Great staff and service!
review: If i ever make it back to Orlando I don't want to stay in any other hotel... Embassy Suites is the way to go!!!!! Food was amazing, newly renovated rooms, staff was wonderful.and all the good restaurants on the strip.

title: Very nice hotel in Orlando near shops
review: The Embassy Suites on International Drive in Orlando is a recently updated hotel. It is very near all of the action on I-Drive. There is a trolley stop near by so you can travel cheaply around the area. The beds are comfy. They have attentive staff. Breakfast is great. The evening reception could be little better, but overall good.

title: Very good family friendly hotel
review: I'm so happy to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you sharing your great experience! I'm also excited to know how much you enjoy the brand new renovations, our location, comfortable beds and friendly staff.  Come back and see us again on your next trip!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Very nice, comfortable, friendly and close to everything u can imagine.
review: Excellent breakfast as usual, great location on Intl Drive. Staff was pleasant. I wish ES would add a 24 hr coffee and cookie/fruit area. Also would appreciate a better TV/cable selection as it is below quality compared to even lesser quality hotels.

title: Not very relaxing
review: Thank you so much your staying with us and sharing your great experience! I'm thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed the breakfast and location and that are staff was so pleasant.  We appreciate your feedback on the coffee station as well as providing better cable options.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you come to Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Very nice hotel, clean, comfortable, great staff
review: Can't beat it, it's close to almost anything, you can walk or drive anywhere. Safe and clean. Really enjoyed my stay. If i needed to rest I did without worry. It rained but I still had fun. Would love to do it again.

title: Great hotel & fab location but very uncomfortable bed settee!
review: This hotel is in a fantastic location for all parks & there are lots of little local restaurants & bars around, as well as the Orlando Eye just up the road which can be seen from certain rooms in the hotel.  The hotel itself is really good, albeit slightly noisy if you're sleeping on the sofa bed in the living area as the foyer is big so a bit echoey for the lower floors. The sofa bed is also extremely uncomfortable!  The staff were amazing, friendly & couldn't be more helpful & rooms are cleaned daily.  The hotel has an amazing yummy free breakfast plus 2 hours every evening of free alcohol - great after a long day at the parks.  I would definitely recommend this hotel (a long as the sofa bed is not required) 😉.....

title: Great service, nice renovation.
review: Thank you so much your staying with us and sharing your great experience! I'm so happy to hear you had such a positive trip and that our team were so amazing.  I'm sorry to hear our sofa bed was not comfortable for you.  They are all brand new so Ill have our Engineers take a look and see if there was an issue.  We look forward to hosting your next trip when you come back to the area!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: so nice
review: Stayed here before and the place has been renovated and upgraded very nicely. The Staff couldn't have been more helpful. Good spot on I-Drive close to numerous restaurants and bars and easy access to everything Disney. Although I was here on business i noticed that there was an In House booking area for parks and rides etc

title: Embassy Suites is Aways My First Choice
review: Thank you so much your staying with us and the amazing review!  Our team will be thrilled to hear how much you enjoyed your experience with us and how friendly and helpful you found them!  Come back and see us again when you are on vacation so you can enjoy all the great amenities around.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Another weekend Disney Trip
review: we stayed over night. the location is great. people are so nice. staff was polite and helpful. it is a older embassy but still very nice. i never passes a staff member that didn't say hi and ask if i was OK or needed anything. parking was extra.

title: Family Reunion
review: My family held our family union this weekend We had a wonderful time.  The hotel took care of all of our needs.  That you for letting us use the pool after hours.  The location was awesome tons of restaurants and place to hang out for all ages.  Will stay at this hotel again.

title: Embassy Suites Delivers Again
review: Thank you so much for your feedback!  I'm delighted to here you and your family enjoyed your special weekend with us.  I'm also happy to know the cardboard boat races were a hit.  We look forward to your stay with us in the future!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Love the upgrades!
review: WOW! The bed provided king-size comfort! As always the staff are very courteous, the room was clean and the breakfast was delicious.  They provide free shuttle service to and from Universal Studios which worked out perfectly for myself and my two teenage boys. Got a relatively decent rate for this trip, but wish it could be just a touch more affordable for my minute teacher's salary. :o)

title: Upgraded contemporary styling makes this hotel very nice place to stay
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and taking the time to share your great experience.  I'm happy to hear you enjoyed the shuttle service and that you and your 2 boys had a great time.  Can't wait to host you next time around.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Super location!
review: We have stayed here many times over the past few years, but it's been a while since our last stay. We were pleasantly surprised to see the renovations that were done recently! The new contemporary design is refreshing, and the room design actually makes everything feel so much bigger now. Already thought the rooms were spacious, but now even better. More seating added in the front area of the suites is wonderful. And additional seating in the atrium area for breakfast was a definite upgrade! Breakfast selection is good-eggs, bacon, sausage, potatoes, pastries, cereal, etc. and the made to order on letters are always great! Managers reception in the evenings is a favorite for snacks and drinks and just s little relaxation after busy days in the parks. Great job in the remodel,…

title: good location but rooms not sufficient
review: I recently stayed at this hotel and I was very disappointed. Firstly, the accommodation is sold for 6 people however you could just about manage with four people. The rooms are dark and partly refurbished and not to mention, the sofa bed was extremely uncomfortable and not enough bedding was provided. The house keeping was not up to standard. I was on the 8th floor and still the traffic on the I4 was very disruptive however we had a good view of the disney fireworks.Moreover, the lifts were extremely slow. The breakfast was good with plenty of choice and good service, however it is only until 9:30 during the week. The evening reception is basic, with long queues and repetitive snacks as well as poor service from the bar staff (unless you tip). Having said all this, the hotel is…

title: Shuttle buses are horrible
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for taking time to give us some feedback.  I'm very sorry to hear that we didn't exceed your expectations during your visit as that is what we strive to do.    I'm going to share all of the feedback you've provided with our team so we can improve our operations and better service you and our other future guests.  The issues with cleanliness and service are very correctable and I thank you again for sharing them.  I look forward to welcoming you back in the future and exceeding your expectations.  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: A superb location in Orlando
review: Shuttle bus is horrible you are better off taking a bus or taxi to Disney because the bus has no seats and mold in it the windows of the bus very nasty the hote on the other hand was amazing good place to stay.

title: this is a average hotel
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and for proving us feedback.  I'm sorry to hear about the issues with our shuttle.  I've personally met with the owner of the company to ensure we receive better service in the future.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Awesome stay and location
review: A great hotel in a nice area, not too busy, not too deserted, not too expensive. pleasant staff and clean accommodations. Our stay was seven days and we feel that we received value for our money. many attractions, shopping and restaurants nearby (actually within walking distance) I would effeminately recommend this hotel to my friends and relatives. Complementary breakfast, reasonable parking, and Tienanmen like a weight room and indoor pool is a big plus for this already nice hotel.

title: Comfy bed
review: 4 nights of great sleep thanks to really comfortable bed and pillows. A rare treat for a hotel. 2 Queen suite spacious, well-equipped and very clean. Good in-room coffee. Breakfast good for an inclusive deal. Evening 'reception' was a little disappointing as service was from a separate counter rather than from the main bar - feeling a little bit like a 2nd class citizen there. Appreciated the warm welcome from Mohamed on check in.  Overall would recommend and will use again if in this area.

title: Vacation to Magic Kingdom
review: Thank you so much for staying with us and the great feedback.  I too love our beds and have one at my house because they are so great!  I'm also happy to hear that Mohamed took great care of you.  Look forward to seeing you next time you are in the area!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: Excellent stay.
review: After reading the great  reviews on TripAdvisor, I decided to stay at this hotel. I am so glad I did! It truly lived up to all the great reviews. You can tell the hotel received a renovation in 2016, the hotel is remarkably clean! The complimentary breakfast had a great selection and the cook to order omelette is a must!

title: Kids Vacation 2017
review: Thank you so much for choosing us as your destination and for the great review.  We look forward to hosting you again next time you are in Orlando!  Gregory Rice General Manager Embassy Suites I-Drive Convention Center

title: A hero in time of need
review: Disney trip. Great breakfast. Nice location. Staff was very prompt and courteous. Enjoyed the evening reception. Rain a little while there but they have an indoor pool so the kids still got to swim. Elevator are slow. I would definitely book again.

title: Family Vacation 2017
review: We looked this hotel. Everything was great and the location was exceptional. We were able to walk to a lot of restaurants and attractions. The staff was extremely nice. Housekeeping took care of all of our needs. The breakfast every morning was fresh and really good.

title: Get your $$$ worth
review: The service of the hotel overall was good BUT for 7 days and a charge of almost $1600.00 for a suite on the 7th floor in July, housekeeping could have been ALOT better. Please request a complete change of bedding as well as vacuuming floors and not just make the bed and change the trash!! Also make sure the tub drains your shower water WHILE YOUR IN IT!!

title: Survey
review: We utilize feedback such as this as opportunities for improvement and thus can appreciate your candid feedback. One promise I can make and keep is to address your concerns with the appropriate department. These opportunities are one of the most guaranteed methods of improving our services provided and for that I am forever grateful. Please let me know if you have any additional questions or concerns, I am always available to help!

title: Excellent Location With Great Perks!
review: Hotel is very nice, clean, convenient, and very friendly staff. I enjoyed my stay and hope to come back in the future. I stayed for two nights and was thoroughly pleased. The location is great and is very convenient. There are many restaurant and places for entertainment within walking distance. The staff is very friendly and helpful. I had some questions that they were able to help me with without any hesitation or problems.

title: very nice Embassy Suites hotel
review: I attended a convention in Orlando, and my first choice for hotels is always Embassy Suites because of the complimentary full breakfast and the Manager's Special (free appetizers and alcohol).  This hotel is located on International Drive near several restaurants and attractions.  The bellman service was exceptional; they were very nice and helpful.  We had a conference room suite, and it was great for small meetings.    Unfortunately, during one of Orlando's frequent down pours in July, our bathroom was flooded.  We wanted to be upgraded and comp'd one night, and they were agreeable.  We decided that it would be too much of a hassle to move, so they did comp our room one night, and they provided snacks and drinks for the remainder of our stay, so that was nice.  The outdoor and…

title: Not what we excepted
review: I usually like Hilton's smaller hotels so I chose this one for a 2 adult and 2 teenager family suite over Hampton given the high prices for Orlando area hotels. Other than the convenient location, I would say it was subpar for an Embassy Suite. Even though I factored in that mid-July is high season and there was a high turn-over due to the location/time of the year etc., I can say with clean consciousness that housekeeping was very poor, breakfast was way below mediocre and the hotel bathroom needed major upgrades even though we changed rooms due to dirty floors, inadequate cleanliness of the room after talking to the manager twice about them. I am not even going to talk about 'the evening reception', parking fees etc. Your call!

title: Last minute Orlando trip
review: We stayed at this hotel July 21-24. I'd rebook this hotel in a heartbeat! We arrived at 1pm and our room wasn't ready but they held our bags for us so we could wander around by the hotel. There's so many places around the hotel to visit. Great restaurants, attractions& drinks around to be had! When our room was ready they sent a text so we could return when we were ready to get settled in. We got our keys and our room was on the 3rd floor. Mostly a quiet location. Very spacious room especially for the 2 of us. Bed was comfortable! The first night we were a little warm. The next day the hotel text and asked if everything was going okay. We mentioned the warm bedroom so they sent someone up to check on it while we were enjoying our day at Disney! When we got back it was nice and…

title: disney visit
review: one of the best embassy in Orlando and we have stayed in them all very clean and up to date eating places within walking distance the breakfast clean up people great cook was a little quite but I guess he was very busy maybe he could have a little help best thing was no parking fee only problem noise on hyway side    no parking fee other embassy suite should do the same

title: Nice hotel and convenient location.
review: The room was spacious but the bathroom was small.  The hotel was conveniently located close to the Orange County Convention Center and Universal Studios.  The complimentary breakfast each morning was good and a great way to save some money.  The staff was very helpful with all requests and even helped me print something I needed.  Would stay there again if traveling to that area.

title: Great Hotel along International Drive
review: Great accommodations for you and your family!  Continental Breakfast is fabulous--omelet bar, fresh fruit, etc.  Pool is nice-indoor and outdoor!  Great access to restaurants, walking distance to Orlando Eye, etc.  Near Universal and Walt Disney World/Epcot...

title: Family friendly
review: Love the hotel. Not the cleanest place I've ever stayed but no major complaints. Found one hair stand in the tub and a splash where the housekeeper may have washed the coffee pot in the sink.  I clean and inspect upon arrival of every hotel I stay at. Hospitality is what sets this hotel above the rest. Did have a slight hiccup at checkin. They double charged me for incidental hold but the situation was corrected promptly. Rooms are very spacious. FYI you must pay to park.

title: 2nd Stay
review: Stay was overall nice but room service could have been better and overall cleanliness of the 5th floor dirty food trays with breakfast dishes were left all day and over night till the afternoon. Breakfast was great

title: Great place to stay !!! Close to Universal!!
review: Hello!  While we Thank You for providing honest feedback regarding our property and your overall stay, I apologize your experience wasn't superb. Should you wish to speak to a representative regarding any of your concerns, please feel free to contact me at 407-352-1400. I'd love to discuss further!

title: MY FLORIDA GETAWAY AT THE EMBASSY
review: We arrived VERY late due to airline delays, but were still met with a smile. Check in was amazing it was 2 am and we get all the info we needed and all of our questions answered. BREAKFAST  WOOOW it is just amazing the omelet station is really to die for, and there was a nice selection of fruit scrambled eggs bacon, ham and so on. If I have to nitpick my biggest complaint was there were unions in the potatoes LOL Sorry I hate unions  but that is the level of scrutiny I have to go to find something bad. Staff is there to clean up after you so breakfast is great and the area spotless.  Location plenty of things to do around the hotel or walking distance, the hotel has a shuttle that provides FREE transport to Universal is you sleep in like we did Uber will run you around $8. …

title: I love Embassy Suites
review: I had a great stay as always, but this time I left my personal pillow. I called the hotel prior to returnirng to the hotel to pick it up. House keeping was on the floor and didnt get back with the front desk clerk (Chelsea)prior to my re-arrival. Unfortunatly my pillow was thrown in the trash, but Chelsea was so nice and understanding. She offered to do what ever she could to make things right. That in itself was enough. I didnt want anything but to dig my pillow out of the trash I was really a mess I cant sleep without that pillow Ive had it for years. Chelsea strongly discouraged digging through the trash with a huge smile and glowing personality. Chelsea insisted we take some money and purchase a new pillow...Chelsea I did just that and wish I could thank you again…

title: Good hotel but let down by a staff member
review: This hotel is beautiful and we have stayed before and the refurb is excellent. The breakfast is amazing and the rooms clean and spacious. Upon checking in we were told a certain amount would be debited from out CC however upon checking 7 x this amount was put on hold! I questioned a staff member at reception and was made to feel 10 years old despite it being the staff member who checked us in at fault and not giving correct information, he was very condescending and rude and I really left the desk feeling like crying, it has spoilt our trip despite everything else here being perfect and one of our favourite hotels, i can't wait to change hotel at the weekend.

title: Basic but works for us really well
review: First and foremost, I want to thank you for choosing to stay with us at the Embassy Suites International Drive Convention Center. I most sincerely apologize for the treatment you received during your check-in process, and would love to speak with you directly regarding this issue so we can properly coach and train our team, as this is most unacceptable! Please do not hesitate to call the hotel directly at 407-352-1400 and ask for Krystal, or email me at krystal.vanburen2@hilton.com. I am happy to see everything else has been nice with your stay, and sincerely hope we can provide you with "10" service from here on out!

title: Orlando Visit
review: Absolutely love the location of this hotel, youre in the center of everything. 5 minutes walk to pointe Orlando and surrounded by restaurants and bars. Pool is nice, normally very quiet. Best thing about the hotel is the two ours of complimentary drinks in the evening, it's tough not to get carried away. Saves a fortune before you go out as the drinks in the local bars are expensive. Breakfast is decent, the buffet is located so you can roll out of bed grab food and coffee and take it back to your room.
