Rooms are great as they all have a separate bedroom but we did find out that upgrading only gets you a better coffee maker and snacks, the rooms are the same so save your money

title: Vicente Family
review: Clean nice hotel. Friendly courteous staff. Respectful and helpful. Be sure to note that checkout time is at 12pm. House keeping staff knocked on my door at 11 and asked what time we were planning checking out. I told her I thought check out time was at 12 and she very kindly told me it was 11. However it was actually 12 which caused me to rush (while on vaca)and we checkout by 11:30. Desk staff gave sincere apologies.

title: Summer Trade Show Accomodations
review: We stayed at the Embassy Suites on International Drive for five nights with family.  Both rooms were as expected and the breakfast was great.    We just had one minor issue with the towels the second day, but it was taken care of immediately.   The hotel is right next door to several places to eat or hangout and walking distance form Dave and Busters.

title: StayCation Experience
review: An excellent and relaxing experience in the heart of the International Drive tourist area with dozens of fine eating establishments, entertainment, and movie theater within walking distance; in a well lit and safe environment.  I would recommend it to visitors and local area residents looking for a relaxing time away or not too far from home.

title: Could be much better
review: We were coming to Orlando to go to Universal and our reservations at the onsite hotel started on Monday and we decided to drive up on Sunday but there were no reservations. So being a Diamond Hilton member I checked out the hotels near Universal and booked the Embassy Suites from the pictures and the description. When reserving the reservations it asked for the names of guests and we listed all six of us. parents and 4 kids.  It gave me choices for rooms and I reserved the room before arrival.  After arrival we noted that there were only 3 glasses and also 3 large towels in the room.  Not enough for 6 as we put on the reservation.  We then noted there was a 2 pillows for the sofa bed in the closet but no sheets or blankets for the sofa bed..  I called the Front Desk and told…

title: Love Embassy Suites, Large Room, Great Breakfast and Excellent Service!!!
review: Good Evening! I extend my sincerest apologies for the lack of an experience you've had at our Embassy Suites property on International Drive. Should you wish to discuss, I would absolutely love speaking with you regarding your stay. Feel free to contact me at 407-352-1400 at your convenience.  Andrew A.

title: Great location, nice hotel
review: Upon arriving, I was greeted promptly and checked right in, I was given a high floor. The room was very clean and looked as though it had been recently remodeled. I love the suites, the bathroom separates the two rooms. Very comfortable bed, new furniture and the linens felt and looked new. Very happy with the room, in addition you get a microwave and fridge so you can save on having to go out to eat all the time.  One of the reasons I stay here is that you get free Wifi, don't have to pay a resort fee and you get a great break fast and happy hour for FREE!!! The breakfast has made to order omelets, which are great, lots of hot and cold selections of food. The service at the breakfast is good, very helpful and quick to clear your plates.  Very happy with this hotel, will be back…

title: Average Visit
review: We stayed for 5 days in this hotel and we were very satisfied for booking this hotel for a good price. The location was great since it was accessible to a variety of restos, walking distance to the i360 if you want some nightlife or just plain fun family stroll, Orlando Eye (ferriswheel) just steps away from the hotel has nice lights in the evening, convenient stores were also nearby (like Walgreens since you really need to buy your drinking water which is not provided by the hotel btw), and there's an ITrolly bus stop in front just in case you want to save from time to time Uber fares.  Breakfast was included, and they have an afternoon cocktails in the lobby for some snacks and drinks between 5-7pm (free as well except for specialty cocktails like mojito, piñacolada etc). We…

title: Great location and breakfast included
review: We spent 1 night only at the Embassy suites, but if we would stay in Orlando it would be more nights here.  Great location and nice breakfast, with ice cold low fat milk, which was just fantastic.  The wifi on the hotel was really good, and included. Which of course is really important when you travel with teenagers.  The room was really clean and spacious, and the service was just great.

title: Convenient hotel
review: Very good hotel. Convenient location to get to theme parks. along the I-trolley line on international drive. Plenty of restaurants to choose from. Complimentary breakfast  is a great way to start your day.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone and would certainly stay here again.

title: Perfect area
review: My family and I stayed in a 1 bedroom with 2 beds. The hotel was clean and quite. The area has a lot of activity and places to eat in walking distance. The check in was quick and easy. I love the lounge area, it's very clean and peaceful.  The complimentary breakfast was great if you go early enough.  The staff was very nice and helpful. The only negative was the small balcony and bathroom. The outdoor pool isn't that big. My kids used the indoor pool most of the time. I would stay again.

title: Great Hotel!!!! Great Area
review: Embassy Suites international drive is a great hotel, the Staff was awesome and very friendly. Great Location from the surrounding attractions. Restaurants are in walking distant to hotels and local attractions are near by.

title: Great location. Close to theme parks, shopping and dining.
review: Inside the room is a separate room with a pull out bed / couch, a table with two chairs (which is also a desk with a desk chair), there's a larger mini fridge, microwave, wetbar, a one cup coffee maker and a flat screen tv. In the other room is a large bed with a sink with a large mirror in the room, a small step out patio and a large flat screen tv .  In the bathroom is a shower / tub combo. a large mirror over a large countertop.  There's lots of outlets.

title: Clean, peaceful and excellent staff!
review: This hotel was very clean, the bed slept great!  The decor is modern, great breakfast, omelettes, pancakes, sausage, bacon, cereal, oatmeal, fresh fruit, milk, coffee and juices.  My best vacation ever, even my preteen approved.

title: Vacation in FL
review: The trip was excellent along with the stay could have had so lower prices though as a Hilton member. The staff was really good. The breakfast though was so so. Same food everyday . Eggs one day had foul smell so got egg made to order but that was undercooked

title: Centrally located and recently updated.
review: This hotel is within walking distance to several restaurants and shopping venues.  It has been beautifully renovated and the room was spacious and very clean.  It offers a free shuttle to Walt Disney World, Universal Studios and Sea World.  All of the staff that we encountered were very friendly.

title: Beautiful hotel
review: We moved to this hotel after one night in a disaster of a hotel next door. The hotel is beautiful, clean, great customer service and nice spacious rooms. We will be staying here again in the future when back in Orlando.

title: Amazing stay
review: Embassy suites on international drive has set the bar! The location is in the middle of lots of shopping and dozens of restaurants,  all within a short walking distance. Air Florida helicopter tours is also a short walk as well. The staff at this location were exceptional. From the valet and bellhop service to the front desk and breakfast staff, everyone was very friendly and courteous. Kate at the front desk and Derek the valet were awesome. I highly recommend this location. Thank you Embassy suites.

title: Clean , very modern , free breakfast
review: Family of three enough space for all clean linens multiple sinks for bedroom bathroom and kitchenette  Very modern clean close to restaurants and places to shop  Has onsite parking  Free breakfast with made to order eggs Juice decent coffee

title: Orlando trip
review: Had a really good stay at the embassy suites with really friendly and helpful staff. Hotel was clean and decor was fresh and up to date. The breakfast was good although was mostly the same every day. The complimentary reception was also good

title: Family fun
review: Went for a Crayola factory trip with grandkids. The hotel staff were all awesome, sorry I didn't get names. The breakfast was amazing as well. We loved the hotel so much the grandkids talked me into staying an extra night. Glad we did!

title: Amazing Embassy Suites
review: immaculate comfortable, spacious suites, friendly, helpful staff, breakfast to die for...why stay anywhere else...  INternet was super fast, snacks in the room are tasty, microwave and fridge...3 sinks...2 tv's ...bottom line is if my wife would allow me to sell the home i'd move to Embassy

title: Wonderful stay
review: We enjoyed our stay and the complimentary full breakfast and happy hour were a very nice bonus!  The complimentary wifi could be better. Only a $6 Uber ride to the convention center or you can take the trolley for $2 per ride per person.

title: Sean's Grad Bash
review: Can not say enough about this Embassy Suites on International Drive. We were there for my son's graduation from UCF. From when we first arrived until we checked out all of the staff could not have been nicer and more accommodating to us. It started with Lemonado taking our bags up to our room . He was so pleasant and helpful.He continued to be just as nice as more of my family would arrive and need help parking / getting up to room ect. He was really welcoming. Kate at the front desk helped us with every question we had even before we got there. Very pleasant as well. Loved the Happy Hour! The breakfast was amazing . The omlet guy was very friendly. The young woman who at breakfast ( thin , long hair) couldn't have been nicer to us. We came to breakfast one morning toward the…

title: Nice hotel
review: The location is great. There are restaurants, a movie theater, and the convention center all within walking distance. The staff was nice and the room was clean and as expected. The breakfast is the best at this chain so that's a plus. And there is a Hooters directly across the street.

title: Very Nice Hotel
review: Room was spacious and clean. Excellent location... make note this hotel doesn't do early check in which sucks if you come in from out of town before 4 pm. Other than that it was great experience. We will be back!

title: Hidden Fees
review: Everything was great except I noticed I was charged a $15 per night parking fee. I thought that was steep and being a Hilton Honors Member you would think parking fees would be waived. I know of resorts in Hawaii who don't charge that much.

title: AAU Volleyball Traveling
review: Our experience at Embassy Suites has always been a good one.  When planning our trip to Orlando, Embassy Suites was the very first hotel I searched for.  As a single mom, I love how safe and comfortable I feel staying at Embassy Suites with my daughter. Every room door is located on the inside of the hotel and there is total visibility from any given point.  This is a huge benefit as a parent.   The breakfast is delicious and the evening reception is just icing on the cake.

title: Clean hotel but fall short on quality of breakfast
review: My visit to this embassy suites  was a little disappointing .the breakfast was not so good compared to other Hiltons. And my room was not ready after 4 pm,But the desk accommodated me with an upgrade..

title: Beautiful hotel
review: I had originally booked at one of its sister hotels. Didn't like hotel called hotel ask them did have any rooms available they did. Starting with pulling up to hotel valet service very friendly. Didn't understand why we had pay park but after checking realizing how bad traffic was. We could literally walk to different restaurants without hassle of driving being stuck in traffic. Four elevators so wait time wasn't long. Rooms where very spacious. Plenty of room family of four. Two tv's where awsome kids had their on tv. Breakfast was good. Evening reception was also on point. 15-20 minutes away from all Disney n universal. Definitely will stay here again.

title: Nice hotel... perfect location
review: The bathroom shower was moderately clogged in my room. The shower felt more like a bath. Overall the room and hotel was nice. The hotel is in a perfect location. Dave and busters is in walking distance.

title: Simply Amazing!
review: My experience at this Embassy Suites location has been exceptional! From the check in attendant to the bell man to housekeeping to the lounge area staff - they all made my stay a 5 star experience. The overall hotel and room decor was very modern. The bed and pillows were very comfortable. My room had a balcony overlooking International Drive - great view.  Huge Kudos to Elizabeth at the check in counter. She really is the type of employee that makes the Hilton properties look good. This was definitely worth the money. I would not hesitate to stay here again.

title: Excellent hotel with clean rooms and great breakfast
review: Comfortable and nice after their renovations.  Free happy hour in the evening and a great hot breakfast.  We've stayed here several times as a convention hotel.  Worth the $$ as it is close to all the Restuarant's.

title: Great location with homely feeling
review: The good:  - Location! There are supermarkets, grocers and eating places all within walking distance.   The neutral:  - No plates or utensils are provided, just a microwave. Those who plan to do more substantial meal preparations may prefer to choose another hotel.   - The room is a one-bedroom suite with two queen beds. The sofa bed in the living room is uncomfortable to sleep on. Four people is the maximum for the stay to be comfortable.   The not-so-good:  - The air-conditioning in the room cannot be controlled no matter how we adjust the settings. Even when switched to 'off', the air-conditioning still blasted away and it was very cold most of the time.   - The air-conditioning at the breakfast place was also always very cold. Actually, it was cold throughout the hotel.  …

title: What a wonderful stay
review: Myself and two friends travelled over from Belfast to Orlando, staying at embassy suites for a week.  We arrived to a nice welcome and after a long day of travelling our room was ready.  and what a great room it was.  not only was the hotel lobby striking and different but the door to the room looked like your own little apartment.  The big lounge with corner sofa and TV was great and the table and kitchenette was a great bonus.  the bedroom fitted two queen beds comfortably with lots of room for 3 big cases.  The location of the hotel is perfect.  out to the left to the orlando eye and eateries and to the right to pointe orlando and more eateries.  the hotel offers a free shuttle to universal and disney which is great to avail of.  the breakfasts were fabulous and the happy…

title: Home from home
review: Would definitely stay here again, the staff were so accommodating, and went above and beyond, breakfast buffet was lovely, and after a busy day, the complimentary happy hour was a nice way to end the day

title: service above and beyond
review: From check-in, to food and beverage managers,  to housekeeper, all went out of their way to make sure all was SPECIAL for our stay. We were provided with some extras - for example no V8 at the breakfast buffet--no worries, the AM mgr. bought some!  Having to leave before breakfast is served-- here, have a gift card to buy some food in the grab and go pantry. Swans made out of towels, etc.

title: Very good value for money
review: Good location.  Near a supermarket and good restaurants and pubs.  (All in walking distance) Great breakfast and evening receiption.  There is a I-ride bus stop right outside of the hotel.  The hotel provide free parking too.

title: June,2017
review: The newly renovated hotel was lovely. While I was here last year, the renovation was in full swing. This year we were very pleasantly surprised by the beauty and comfort of the hotel. Definitely the best value on International Drive!

title: So happy
review: It was a amazing stay the people where great and the place was the best .... I will so be using this place again I loved it there .... the room was great the food was great and I really enjoyed my time there

title: Great place
review: Love the hotel, close to everything. Great happy Hour and breakfast. The suites are very clean and roomy. I always stay here during the big beauty show at the convention center. Its great to park your car and not have to get back in it. Great bus schedule, and the bus stop it at the hotel.

title: Excellent hotel
review: Great amenities for the family! This location is great because it is so close to many restaurants and the theme parks.  Complimentary evening reception and breakfast were great and my kids loved swimming in both the indoor and outdoor pool!

title: Stay at the hotel
review: Staff was helpful and the room was great! Breakfast was okay, but not as good as some other embassy suites. The hotel was close to where we wanted to be. Internet was slow and spotty. I would greatly recommend this hotel

title: Great service and value
review: Stayed 2 nights and the whole facility was very clean and attractive.  It is very well maintained.  Definitely recommend and would stay there again in a heartbeat.  The complimentary breakfast was well done.  Food was hot and well filled in even on a busy Saturday morning.

title: Wonderful
review: Excellent  I would love to stay there again. Orlando was great . It was awesome for my family. I'd like to have my birthday at this hotel. The pool was nice. The reception was great.I'll as soon as I can.

title: Loved our Room
review: Our room was very comfortable and clean. Front desk was friendly and fast at check-in.  We had three people in our suite and there was plenty of room.  Nicely renovated with granite and new carpet.   We ate at the restaurant in the hotel was very good.  Very friendly staff serving during evening reception.

title: Huggggge beds
review: lovely hotel but very noisy, nice breakfast, very local to everything, I trolley stops right outside which is a bonus if your out for a evening so not having to walk far to hotel. laundry facilities on site which we used and found useful, All in all would go back again, staff very friendly.

title: great customer service
review: Was pleasantly surprised by this place in many ways.  Room was more than acceptable, but the way we were treated was great.  I had a problem with the concierge (something I booked through him was not recognized at Sea World due to one of Sea World's employee's screw up) and I had to repurchase the tickets once I got to the park.  Even though it wasn't his error and even though I got pretty irate with him, he took some extra steps to get it resolved and get my money back. The bartender at the pool bar gave fast, efficient service and even tried to get my husband to go inside for the free drinks during the nightly reception to try to save us money!  Nightly reception was nice.  We only took advantage of it once but the snacks were good and the bartenders willing to indulge your…

title: Great Suite
review: We loved our room, the suite was spacious and we had all the amenities we needed for a great stay.  The bed was very comfortable and the TV's were great.  The staff was very friendly and helpful with anything that we needed.  I even got text messages from the staff asking if our stay was going well and if we needed anything each day we were there!

title: Love the Renovations, with a few Suprises
review: I have not stayed here in some time, but when I arrived to my surprise the entire hotel had gone through a renovation. I arrived kinda late, but another surprise was that there were three attendants working the from desk (which I usually don't see much). I checked in prior to my arrival and was able to select two rooms beside each other. I needed this as my mom was with us, and I wanted her to feel safe. As I opened her room, she smiled and said "wow this is a big nice room". The new decor was nice and the new layout was great as well. Soon after checking into my room, I received a text from Krystal and Robert (another surprise), asking how is everything with the room. I had never received this before, at any hotel. The bed was vert comfortable and I rested very well. As we went…

title: Even better than before
review: Just returned from Florida, spending our last night here at the Embassy Suites on International drive so as to be near to the Airport to go home. We have stayed here many times, both at the front end, and rear end of our holiday because it is  a good hotel, and only 20 mins. drive from the airport. The hotel had been completely refurbished since our last stay. All of the communal areas, bang up to date. The suites completely new, new bathrooms, beautiful décor, great comfy bed, lovely linens, managers complimentary happy two hours on a night, beautiful made to order breakfast on a morning. Robert, the head concierge, remembered us. Lovely man. Nice to see him again. He was very kind to us and let us  keep our room until 3 p.m. on the day of our return home, night flight.We…

title: Going Back :)
review: Went to celebrate my sisters engagement, going for a weekend of Disney Parks. The Hotel is so pretty! The staff is magnificent. They even surprised my sister with a celebratory dessert all to noticing a button on our shirts! Definitely would recommend especially with the Hotel being directly on International drive and surrounded by shops and restaurants!

title: Worked out great
review: We visited this past week for 3 nights for both business and family. It was right near the conference center for my husband and a quick Uber or taxi ride away from the Parks for me and the kids. I read some reviews saying the tub was slow to drain and that is true; but it wasn't a show stopper for us. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The only hiccup we had was the person at the front desk directed us to the wrong location to wait for the shuttle to Universal so we missed it, but then she more than made up for it by providing us with a taxi on the hotel. The breakfast was adequate - I would say luxurious but definitely sufficient to get you on your way.  I recommend to families looking for plenty of room to sleep with kids, especially if one or both parents are working at…

title: AMAZING RENOVATIONS
review: We recently stayed at Embassy Suites off International Drive for our Disney trip. The renovations are AMAZING. The hotel is beautiful, definitely the best Embassy I’ve stayed at hands down. The hotel staff is amazing in addition to the cocktail hour and made to order breakfast. They have a shuttle to the Disney parks, which I learned upon arrival. I didn’t use it, but it’s a great option for next time. It’s conveniently located on I-Drive, and you can walk to the Orlando Eye area which is about a mile away. (FYI, Shack Shack is amazing!!!) Lovely renovations, superb staff per usual. We can’t wait to return.

title: Orlando Sojourn
review: The hotel is very accessible to all places we wanted to see other than Disneyworld. The room was just right for the family of 4 adults and 2 kids. Breakfast is free and overflowing. Staff very courteous and kind. Going to the Premium Outlets and the Orlando Basilica was a breeze.  Highly recommend for a family vacation on a budget.

title: So Sad
review: I stayed in Embassy Suites two nights and It was a splendid experience. Staff is friendly. Pool is Superb. Beverages are Free between 530-730 pm. And what a fantastic appartement-like room.  So Sad I didnt knew this  earlier otherwise I would have come over more often.  I recommend this hotel.

title: Wonderful Hotel
review: This hotel is fantastic! My husband and I had a terrible travel experience getting to Orlando and the staff did everything they could to ensure that we felt relaxed from the moment we arrived until the moment we left. The rooms are very clean and spacious, the breakfast is fresh with lots of options, the location is great for parks & restaurants and the staff are very friendly. We would definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Great Place for Family Visiting Orlando/Disney/Universal, etc...
review: Stayed 3 nights and was a wonderful experience.  The entire hotel has been renovated and the rooms and lobby areas are excellent.  The lobby area and the breakfast area are one of the best Embassy Suites I have seen.  There is plenty of room in this facility.  Even when busy, the breakfast does not feel crowded.  The hotel is very close to Universal and only a 15-20 minute drive to park in a Disney park.  I would stay here again.  The entire staff was very friendly and accommodating.  Great place to visit either on business or personal travel.  Vert clean.  Just a feel good place.

title: Great Service
review: Great stay at Embassy Suites.  Staff was fantastic!!  Kathy working at the bar during the Manager's Reception was great.  The valet staff was extremely attentive and took great care of us.  Location is convenient, however traffic can be a little noisy at night.

title: great hotel/staff
review: great staff and hotel. Had a few hick ups but the staff went above and beyond to resolve them. Great location to a venue near by I was in town for. Would highly recommend. They have great free breakfast and

title: Great experience
review: I would definitely recommend this hotel.  Everything was perfect during my stay, amazing stuffs and exceptional service.  The location couldn't be better with tons of restaurants options just right cross street.

title: Reunion
review: Just a great value place, right in middle of all the action, great breakfast and great Manager bar, easy to the action and easy to airport just great thank you, I don't want to write a novel, the place was great this should be enough

title: Friendly, personable staff
review: Love love love Embassy suites! Have stayed here on a couple of occasions.  Customer service is above and beyond.  Gilbeou, thank you for your warm,  friendly early morning  greetings and excellent omelets! I remembered both you and Wildine from our last visit! Excellent service stands out!!! We will be back!!!

title: Very Nice Property and Great Staff
review: My wife and I stayed at this property for three nights following a convention as we wanted to hit the parks.  The location is excellent.  There are numerous restaurants and bars within a 2-3 block walking distance.  Most of these are national chain restaurants and there is a great variety of choices.   Be careful if you need to cross I Drive.  Although there are marked crosswalks and state laws requires vehicles to stop, no one does.  Be warned!  The free breakfast is very nice.  Lots of kids, but it is Orlando.  The young women who bus the tables are extremely quick and friendly.  There are two free shuttles daily to both Disney and Universal.  They are easy to use and pick you up right out in the front of the hotel.  WiFi - complimentary WiFi is OK at best.  Speeds about 2Mbs.…

title: A wonderful hotel with great customer service
review: We chose this hotel because of the location, free breakfast, evening cocktails and shuttle to Disney.  That and more.  The Front Desk staff was great.  We arrived early and they found us a room that we could move right into.  I replied to the manager's welcome text and within five minutes, extra towels were brought up.    The pools (indoor and out) were so nice and the hot tub - relaxing.  Housekeeping kept us supplied with towels and fresh cups/glasses.  The refrigerator was oversized.  We had a view of the Disney fireworks every night from our balcony.  The bed was very comfortable.  Plenty of outlets for all of our electronics/chargers.    We even used the concierge service to answer our many questions and to purchase Sea World tickets on our 'off' day.  Wifi was free because…

title: Great!! Great!! Great!!
review: Embassy never disappoints. The room was great, the service was great, and the breakfast was great. Very convenient to everything but off the beaten path. The breakfast attendants were the best ever. Stacy's constant and friendly smile was a great start to the day. Loved the indoor/outdoor pool option. The bed was very comfortable and the room was very very clean. We had a wonderful stay. We will definitely be back!!!

title: Very nice hotel
review: Stayed here many years ago, but the interior has been upgraded somewhat since then. Very nice it is to. Checked in online, nothing much for Hhonors diamond members, just two bottles of pretzels and a chocolate bar.  Suite was nice, overlooking the Olive Garden restaurant next door and the pool area. The best bits were the breakfast and the managers reception, both were very well stocked with breakfast being all you could want and eggs cooked to order. Different snacks each day in the evening as well. Not too sure I'll be back in Orlando but may return if I do.

title: Noise, noise, way too much noise!
review: I have never stayed at a embassy suites before and based on this stay, I will never again.  The hotel is an "open" concept hotel and when they designed it they forgot to add some noise reduction buffers.  I heard people all night not only from the lobby (4 floors down) but from the elevator that was right in front of my room....maybe 5 feet away.  I know I was in Orlando and all the tourist, but is no excuse to design a hotel based on the area and the clientele.   Fortunately I was only there one night, one night too long.

title: Vacation
review: This hotel was great! All the staff was very friendly and helpful, very kid friendly and clean. I would stay here again in a heart beat! I highly recommend this hotel!  The only thing that I was not happy with is that they charge their guests $15 for parking daily. This is the first time that I have ever had to pay for parking at a hotel that I was paying to stay at. I feel that parking should be included in your stay.

title: Great property
review: This property is a wonderful property.  Comfortable beds, good size rooms, very kind and friendly staff, super clean, and a very nice breakfast.  I would recommend it more for an older crowd, families with older kids, business travelers, as it does not have kiddy attractions such as a splash pad or all the Disney charter items you would see in the area.  The hotel has a sophisticated look. It is within walking distance to many good restaurants, and great bars.  Hotel includes a complementary breakfast, and a nice complimentary happy hour. It is actually two hours of free, wine, beer and mixed drinks.  It also has an indoor and out door pool with hot tubs. Its not too far from two major shopping outlets and very close to the convention center.  Its a safe and clean hotel.  You do…

title: Pleasure in Paradise
review: A wonderfully located hotel with cheerful and hospitable staff to  accommodate your visit in Orlando! Stop by the concierge desk especially if this is your first visit to maximize your stay. Breakfast is scrumptious!

title: Wish I had Stayed Longer!
review: My husband, newborn and I stayed at this Embassy Suites recently, and we were so delighted with our stay! The hotel had awesome new upgrades and smells divine. All the staff was super nice. The happy hour was a nice touch, but don't expect to fill up on food with it. I recall seeing animal crackers and hummus...lol. But the best part of the hotel is the location! Right in the heart of I-drive!

title: My stay is good
review: Most of the staff are friendly, except the housekeepers, because the room is not so clean everyday. So, we are just regularly satisfied because of nice impression from staff we met, but just the housekeepers didn't clean well daily.

title: Exceeded my expectations!
review: Hotel opposite premium outlet mall. Rooms are spacious and well equipped. "Managers Reception" from 5.00pm to 7.00pm; free drinks (wine, cocktails etc) and light snacks! Really good! One negative comment; my room was pre-paid however the hotel still insist on taking a credit card swipe even if you are paying cash: why?

title: Dependable
review: I frequently stay at Embassy Suites hotels throughout the US, particularly when travelling with family, as it is affordable and always a reliable brand. This one, nearest the Convention Center on International Drive, was especially roomy, clean, and comfortable with a very efficient and courteous staff.  The breakfast was great, didn’t check out the happy hour at this location but I’ve heard it was fine. I would definitely recommend it and would certainly stay here if ever in Orlando again.

title: Well located
review: Better quality property within walking distance to the Convention Center. Friendly and helpful staff. Great breakfast and evening reception. Close to lots of restaurants. Typical Embassy Suites rooms which provide added space over a standard hotel room.

title: Awesome experience
review: The hotel is very charming! I love the big open lobby. It was also very clean and up to date. The pool was the perfect temperature and I enjoyed the hot tub as well, I did not like that you couldn't enter the restaurant/bar from the pool and had to walk all the way around. At both breakfast and the evening reception, the staff was very attentive and pleasant. I used complimentary Wi-Fi and was on the 6th floor - it was spotty most evenings.

title: Really comfortable hotel
review: This hotel was just renovated, so the rooms are pretty fresh and spotless. I was able to get a room on the top (8th) floor, so it had a little balcony that was large enough to fit a chair. That was pleasant--I could look out on the giant Ferris wheel at night. I liked that the bedroom was actually a completely separate room--with door--from the living room. The bathroom was small, but very brightly lit, including the tub/shower area. It is rare for a hotel to provide a brightly lit bathroom where you can actually see to shave your legs and put on your makeup--I appreciated that. I-Drive is incredibly loud, especially on weekends, but the white-noise apps on my phone and iPad combined made it possible for me to sleep regardless of all the partying going on (I was hearing noise…

title: If it was '96 this place would be great.
review: Not '96 unfortunately, though much of my room may have been last updated then.  No complaints not service, but very dated and has a dated aroma in the room.  Nice people and nice location though!  Breakfast is solid too.  And BTW, young lady clearing tables is a gem.  Not only hard working, but very nice and always asking how she can help.

title: Loud Freeway and Dirty Bathrooms....
review: This hotel is located central to International Drive in Orlando. I thought it would be a good choice but I was wrong. This hotel charges 20.00 a day to Valet park but what they don't tell you is that you will be getting your own car from the parking lot if you leave during the hours when Valet isn't there.   Took me along time to check in one guy working on a sold out night in Orlando seems odd. A second guy did come but much later. Asked for some bathroom amenities which they didn't have but "sent someone to get" but I never saw. Tried calling from the room but no answer.   Had to check out at 1am. 511 my room was right next to the very busy 4 freeway. I was told by the night manager they could give me a free nights stay if I stayed in the room or I could get a refund if I…

title: All i can say is Wonderful
review: Let me tell you my stay was great and the staff made it even more great, from the time I checked in until I left , I was treated wonderfully, we started every morning with breakfast and WILDINE was awesome the whole breakfast staff did a great job, next our room was always immaculately cleaned by FRANCELINE she always had a smile on her face and my kids loved her and her friendly smiley face notes for the kids, after a day at the parks we would relax in your restaurant and let me tell you the evenings was always top notch KIM and Rene was terrific at the end of the day Kim always had great conversation and a marvelous attitude (love that girl). The hotel in itself was beautiful and it was more enhanced by your great staff,  I would like to say Thank you all for the best family…

title: Good hotel.  Different staff would make it great
review: Staff need some training. The room was very nice. Location couldn't be better.    It is clear that this hotel does not invest in staff training. While desk staff are very courteous, it ends there.   The hotel also does not appear to subscribe to the idea of quality assurance.  There was short black hair in the shower, tub from my first day at the hotel until the day I left. It was never cleaned up. That told me I needed to expect that nothing else was clean.   Don't get in a hurry. The front desk had 14 people in line the morning I was waiting to check out and get a printed bill. It was unfortunate that only one person was working the desk and they never called anyone to assist. The one person was very nice and didn't try to get through the line fast. They took their time with…

title: Perfect location and excellent hotel facilities
review: Stayed recently at the Embassy suites for a conference at the Convention Centre.  Convention Centre was a 15 walk; or several minutes on the i-Ride trolley.  Rooms were very well maintained; very comfortable and the staff were always very helpful and friendly.  The morning breakfast is included - very good.  Complimentary snacks in the premium suite were an added bonus as well.

title: Awesome Stay - Wish it was longer
review: The front desk staff was extremely helpful and accommodating. Whenever in Orlando, I WILL be staying here again. The room was so comfortable and quiet I didn't feel like going to my conference meetings. I also wish i could've stayed longer. The cleaning staff was helpful and polite. The food was good and plentiful. the Bartender and generous, which was needed after long days at the convention center. Location was nice comfortable walk to the convention center.

title: Great Location on International Drive
review: We were a party of four and found the hotel perfect for our stay. There was a separate bedroom with an additional sink and mirror to the one in the bathroom which was great when everyone is trying to get ready at once. There was also a small kitchen sink with a microwave and coffee machine. The included breakfast was great with omelettes made fresh to order. There was a free courtesy bus to the theme parks but we only used it once as we preferred to use Uber so we could choose our own times, it was close enough that it wasn't expensive. There were also complimentary drinks and snacks in the afternoon. We were really happy with the Embassy Suites and would definitely recommend it if you are planning on visiting more than one resort and want to be near all the restaurants and…

title: Embassy suites by Hilton (Orlando)
review: Absolutely outstanding!  I really liked every part of my trip.  The staff was outstanding, very friendly.  They definitely enhanced my experience.  The breakfast was really good too - little things like that go a long way for me.

title: Our Orlando mini vacation April 2017
review: Room was very Clean. The location is on International Drive and it's in close proximity to various restaurants and attractions. Breakfast was buffet and it was great. The Hotel has both an indoor & an outdoor pool.

title: Nice hotel
review: We booked here through the convention center for the Star Wars celebration this year. We were given the opportunity to upgrade to a suite room once we did it was very nice and very spacious. Everyone here was very nice and helpful and we had a bus stop pick up in front of our hotel that would take us to the convention center. The convention center it was maybe a mile and a half away. They would have an evening reception from 5:30 to 7:30 where they would give out free snacks and drinks and that was nice refreshment after a long day. We would definitely stay here again at the next time we're in Orlando.

title: Excellent hotel in every way!
review: Excellent hotel in every way!  Fantastic customer service, beautiful property & amenities, great location.  The complimentary breakfast buffet & managers reception are phenomenal.  Have stayed here twice now & a great experience both times.  Our latest stay included Easter Sunday & they had the Bunny, an egg hunt & activities for the kids which we thought was wonderful. Hotel is renovated so updated throughout.  My family would definitely stay here again.

title: Almost Perfect
review: First of all, I wanted to say how impressed I was with every single staff person I encountered at this hotel. Absolutely everyone was so very polite, kind, and friendly. It was the absolute best experience with staff at a hotel I have ever had. This includes speaking with desk staff, baggage handlers, the people picking up after breakfast, and cleaning staff. Everyone was lovely.   My son and I arrived early and I had not called ahead to inform the hotel, just assuming because our flight was coming in at 7:45 AM that our room could not possibly be ready on arrival. I was so surprised and pleased to find there was a room ready for us when we arrived and more so that the hotel offered us breakfast after an exhausting trip.  The room itself was on the 8th floor. I'm not great with…

title: Great experience
review: We visited Orlando for the Star Wars Celebration and stayed at this hotel. Within walking distance to the convention center as well as several restaurants. Breakfast and evening reception were great. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Great hotel
review: I was very impressed with this hotel. Great location so many restaurant choices within walking distance. Amazing breakfast included. Indoor and outdoor pool was great. The rooms were perfect. Overall a great hotel. We are definetely returning here!!

title: Disney Vacation
review: 30 minute drive from Disney. Cheaper to stay in Disney Springs area. I've had a better breakfast at other Embassy Suites locations. Even though renovated, fridge and microwave were old and kept breaking. Would not recommend this location.

title: Good hotel
review: Embassy suites by Hilton is a perfect hotel to stay when you want to visit universal studio's and Disney. The rooms are big, clean and comfortable and friendly staff. Nice swimming pool and free drinks and snacks between 17.00-19.00h.

title: Quite Pleased
review: I was quite pleased with my company for choosing this hotel for our business trip. The room was beautiful, the location was great, and the I enjoyed the complimentary evening reception and breakfast very much!

title: Very good hotel but not for business
review: Remodeled hotel , everything works well. Bathroom very small. Stayed alone imagine if have 3 persons together. Not good for business traveler internet wi fi does not work well . not in all areas of the room works and sign is very low.

title: Great weekend getaway!
review: Good Afternoon,  Thank you for taking the time out of your day to review your stay at our hotel. I'm so happy to see that you enjoyed the amenities and the hotel remodel. I can assure you that we are working on improving our Internet connectivity, I do apologize if you were inconvenienced by a slower internet speed. We are definitely able to assist with troubleshooting of the Internet, so I do hope our team were there to assist you with this.  We hope to see you again on your next trip to the Orlando area.

title: Comfortable and Modern
review: Our check in was very smooth. The staff stored our luggage b/c our room wasn't ready, this way we could go to Universal as soon as we arrived. The room was spacious, and the free breakfast was way beyond expectations!

title: Awesome as usual!
review: Great job on the renovations! Always welcoming and the staff is great. Everything is always very clean. Relaxing environment. Great getaway for us and with walking distance to a lot of entertainment and dining.

title: Nicely Remodeled
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of the Embassy Suites by Hilton Orlando International Drive Convention Center and thank you for staying with us again.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you liked the results of the renovation.  I was extremely proud to hear that the "staff is great".  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time your travels bring you to Orlando.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: A great stay
review: Nice hotel, recently remodeled and it shows, good value for the area, close to Convention Center was able to walk or take the trolley.   Friendly staff and a great breakfast.   Nice "home away from home".

title: Don't Valet your car!!
review: Thank you so much for the 5 star rating of the Embassy Suites by Hilton Orlando Convention Center.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and allowing us to be your "home away from home".  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the renovated hotel and that you felt it was a good value.  We hope to have the opportunity to serve you again when your travels bring you back to Orlando.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: The renovations made to this hotel far exceeded our expectations!
review: My daughter and my nephew loved this Embassy Suites. They kept asking me if they could go back:) They enjoyed both the indoor and outdoor pools. They liked the complimentary breakfast every morning. And the hotel had a very good free shuttle service that was always on time going to and coming back from the theme parks.

title: Great hotel, AMAZING staff!
review: We spent 5 days at this hotel.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  Complimentary breakfast was delicious.  Rooms were clean and comfortable.  Complimentary shuttle to Disney, complimentary voucher for trolley.  We did not need a car during our trip.   Would definitely stay here again and recommend to others!

title: Good location
review: Thank you for taking the time to write such a great review.  The entire team at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Orlando International Drive Convention Center was excited to hear that you had such a great stay.  We truly appreciate the recommendation to stay at our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you back when your travels bring you to Orlando again.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Excellent place to stay in the heart of International Drive
review: Stayed early Feb. 2017 for wife's convention. Room was nice with separate sinks, frig microwave and safe. Clean. Self parking was easy. Managers reception was better than most, with mixed drinks, beer and snacks. Pool was nice. Hotel is well located in the convention drive area. Walked to several restaurants. Across the street from hotel is a drug store (Walgreens?) that sells alcohol.

title: Excellent hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.  We were happy to hear that you enjoyed the experience overall.  There is a Walgreens across International Drive and our location is pretty awesome.  We hope that we will have an opportunity to serve you again and our goal is to provide an experience worthy of a 5 star review.  If I can be of any assistance with your travel plans to Orlando, please reach out.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Great stay
review: This is a recently remodeled fantastic hotel in the heart of International Drive Orlando. Close to downtown, Disney, Universal, Sea World and the Convention Center. Lots of nearby activities and entertainment.

title: Another wonderful stay
review: We have stayed at this hotel on many occasions and have always been more than satisfied with everything.  The newly renovated suites are lovely and as always the staff were very attentive.  Couldn't fault it at all.  The location is also really good close to lots of choice of restaurants.  Will be looking to book again next year without hesitation. Thank you to Bill for helping right from start with my  booking and bearing with my many questions

title: Sweet Suites!
review: Thank you for taking the time to review the Embassy Suites by Hilton Orlando International Drive Convention Center.  I am so delighted to hear that you liked the outcome of our recent renovations and we truly appreciate having the opportunity to serve you year after year.  It is my pleasure to assist with your vacation planning and I am here to answer any questions you may have for the next visit.  We look forward to welcoming you back next year!  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Amazing Stay with Amazing Staff!!!!!
review: I booked this hotel for a business trip mostly because of its proximity to the Orange County Convention Center. I wasn't expecting to much however I was very pleased with the hotel and room accommodations. Hotel staff were very pleasant throughout my stay! The suite concept offered plenty of room to spread out if you wish. I believe the hotel was recently remodeled and it was reflected in the appearance. The breakfast gave plenty to select from and was tasty. I would have given an excellent rating however the renovation of the indoor pool wasn't completed but they did have the outdoor pool which I didn't use because of the cool weather. If you're traveling to Orlando area I would highly recommend you give the Embassy Suites a try.

title: A great stay at a great hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us.  It was great to see that you enjoyed your overall stay and that you "highly recommend" staying here.  I do apologize for the delays with the indoor pool during your visit.  The timing turned out to be horrible due to the colder weather that came through.  It is not typical for us to see such cold temperatures in March.  The indoor pool is open again and ready for use but with the weather being great lately, the outdoor pool has been used frequently and we have not seen much use at the indoor pool.  We certainly hope to have the opportunity to serve you again when your travels bring you back to Orlando.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Weekend get away
review: We've stayed at this hotel several times this year and the place just got renovated and it's beautifullllll!!!!! We love the update and the staff here are just consistently awesome! They always go above and beyond providing great service to their guests even if you're staying there as a Hilton employee. This hotel is exceptional, and I do really appreciate how they treated us every time we stay there. From the front desk staffs esp. Alejandra, Jose and can't remember the other 2 ladies at the front desk who always greeted us soon as we walk in  and FD supervisor - Mohhamed, to the breakfast staff who always smile and say good morning to everybody (Weldine, not sure if I spelled this right and the other lady that unfortunately I could not remember her name. Thank you and thank…

title: Perfect Location
review: My first visit to this hotel and wow what a great experience that my family and I had.  The staff was completely accommodating to our requests.  I called a few times before I came and each time I spoke to Kate over the phone and Kate was such a sweetheart. When I tried to meet Kate, she was busy, so hopefully on my next stay we get to meet. All around this hotel is at a great location with everything you need in close proximity.

title: Exceptional Customer service/satisfaction
review: Thank you for taking the time to review the Embassy Suites by Hilton Orlando International Drive Convention Center.  It is awesome to read that you had a "great experience" and I will be sure to recognize Kate for her efforts!  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Hotel and breakfast are nice, but front desk person was rude and they charge $50 for early checkin
review: As a former avid SPG preferred member. I recently stayed here for a quick weekend trip with my family. From the moment I walked in I was amazed with their exceptional service. Something that I've never received staying at semi high end hotels like the W and or Le Meriden. After two hours of my stay in received a courtesy call/text asking how am I enjoying my stay, and if I had any questions and or concerns don't hesitate to let them know. My special request for a high floor room was met. I even love the Hilton application which shows you your room number one day before u even check in. The compliments breakfast and evening reception hour was another great perk. Lastly this hotel is exceptionally location on International Drive and offers courtesy shuttle to most theme parks. I…

title: Great Business Hotel
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such an amazing review of the Embassy Suites by Hilton Orlando International Drive Convention Center.  I was delighted to read such great comments about the service provided during your stay.  Thank you for the recommendation as well, we certainly hope to have the opportunity to serve you again when your travels bring you back our way.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Nice & easy
review: We arrived at the hotel at about 11:30am and decided to see if we could check in early.  Usually, hotels will let you if there are rooms ready, but many times rooms are not ready, which is understandable.  When we asked if it was possible to check in early, the woman at the front desk said, "I will have to charge you $50 extra if you check in now."  When we said never mind, she just kind of smirked.  After leaving, I called Hilton to ask if this is a new policy, and they said they did not see that policy listed for the property and to call the manager of the hotel directly.  I called, spoke to the same front desk associate and she refused to connect me with a manager.  She said the manager was only available for urgent issues.  So maddening!  We did have a bad taste in our mouth…

title: Celebrating sons birthday at Disney
review: My family and I arrived later nite to the hotel and I must say Jose B from front desk was amazing greeted me with an amazing smile and to have that at 1:30 am was wonderful to see check in was fast and easy my room was beautiful it's nothing like coming into your room with a king size bed to relax your tired body to I rolled around on that bed like a little kid lol !!! Woke up the next day to a wonderful breakfast buffet to still see Jose standing at front desk with a bigger smile on his face as he's greeted his quest ... José thank u so much again for a wonderful stay   Sincerely your   Late check in guest            Elvira Cruz

title: Nice hotel, but very noisy
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a wonderful review. I do hope that your son had a wonderful birthday, there's nowhere better to celebrate than Disney! Jose always has such a wonderful smile and is full of energy, it's always great to hear such wonderful feedback about our team members.   We do hope that you will come and celebrate your next special occasion with us, please do let us know if we can ever assist you further.

title: Spent 21 nights here . On holiday
review: Great location--lousy soundproofing.  Don't stay here unless you like to party and aren't bothered by noise.  The rooms were comfortable, but the single-pane window glass and paper-thin walls mean you will hear every sound from the street, highway and atrium area--especially the 2am bars that proliferate on this strip--and it is LOUD outside.

title: Pre-cruise
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I do apologize that you were disturbed by the noise from the local bars and attractions on International Drive.  We have a great location for those that want to be within walking distance of a large number of restaurants and attractions.  However, our area does tend to be very much alive a little later on the weekends.  While our International Drive rooms are the most requested by repeat guests, they are not for everyone.  With that said, there is an opportunity to improve the soundproofing of the sliding doors within the guest suites.  In fact, we have a project scheduled for later this year to enhance the sliding doors and soundproof the suites to limit outside noise from local establishments on International Drive and the highway behind the hotel.  We are actually very fortunate to have very thick walls, which lead to a lower number of in-house noise complaints from other guests or the atrium.  We certainly hope that this experience will not deter you from staying in our hotel again, please reach out to me directly prior to your stay at Kimberly.johnson@Hilton.com or 407-581-0346 and I will personally organize the allocation of your suite to a quiet location.

title: Beautiful hotel
review: The room was excellent and clean . From management right down to the valet guys all were so friendly and nothing was too much trouble . To Donovan and his breakfast Staff who was always amazing . Donovan always helpful . The bar and grille staff especially Kathy who sways came and had a chat and advised us what best to do if we needed somewhere to go. Service was excellent from room service to housekeeping . But a very big thanks to Raymond and derek the valet guys who always had a smile and joke with us when leaving the hotel each day.  If u want peace of mind on holiday this is the place to stay . They provided transportation to main theme parks cause we didn't want to drive . Would highly recommend this hotel to everyone .

title: Excellent stay for a family
review: Our family of 5 stayed on a long weekend trip to the parks in Orlando.  We had a two room suite that fit our needs perfectly.  Definitely recommended.  The accomadations were excellent as was the value received

title: Will be nice once completed but not during renovations
review: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I'm so excited to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our two room suites are definitely ideal for a family trip to the theme parks, lots of extra room for those Mickey souvenirs! I hope that you managed to enjoy our wonderful breakfast and evening reception during your stay also!   Please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly if I can be of any further assistance, we look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the Orlando area.

title: Relaxing, beautiful property
review: Hotel is being renovated and amenities are not open. Website does not tell you this it implies it was already renovated. Indoor pool, hot tub and sauna closed. Several pieces of gym equipment not working

title: Disappointed
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  I am disappointed to see that you did not enjoy your visit due to the indoor pool closure.  The team is super excited that our major renovation has been completed.  We have finished all guest suites, our new restaurant, atrium, meeting space and so much more.  We are currently resurfacing the indoor pool since it was used a storage area during renovation and experienced some wear and tear.  We are also awaiting some artwork and we are repainting the stair wells but we do not anticipate this work to impact our guests’ experience.    With that said, as we closed out the major portions of the renovation, we updated our website alert to inform our guests of the indoor pool being worked on.  It also stated that our outdoor pool is available and heated.  The alert is set to expire this coming week so I would love to know which website you used to reserve your suite.  If you have time to reach out and discuss which site you used to reserve the suite I would truly appreciate it so I may do some investigating.  My email address is william.friedrich@hilton.com and my direct line is 407-581-4301.   Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Typical Embassy Property
review: I would highly recommend. Rooms are beautifully decorated, comfortable sleeping arrangements. Lobby is gorgeous, location is key. Parked the car and didn't see it until I left. Walked everywhere. Everyone was very nice.

title: Trade Show
review: the stay at embassy suites Orlando Fl. was nice. my company book us there. I know the owner of our had  problems with being over charged $3000.00 , which  left a very bad taste. then when I booked a room for 1 more night he got even madder because he was charged $250 a night. I paid $99.00 for the room.

title: Everything was perfect.
review: The location was perfect for what we wanted to do. When we arrived we were very impressed with both the exterior and interior of the hotel. The front desk check-in person was fast and friendly. The room was great, bed very comfortable. We were surprised to be offered complimentary drinks and munchies at the Manager reception. We went down for breakfast expecting continental and got a full hot breakfast complete with an omelet station. Everything was perfect.

title: Modern Embassy Suites
review: This is probably the most up to date and modern Embassy Suites I have stayed in. The rooms have a fresh and modern look. The breakfast is good, but I must say I have had better in other Embassy Suites. The renovation was in the final stage of my stay, and you could see that some things needed to be fine tuned, such a one of the elevators and my bathroom needed a revisit of the plumber, but all was fixed rapidly. Every question or comment was quickly handled by the staff. The lunch during the event I stayed for in the hotel was excellent, good variety and quality

title: Multiple issues. I asked for GM follow up...nothing. Little hot water first two days. They did not send out my cleaning
review: They never sent out my cleaning and finally had to ask before I heard what was happening. Little to no hot water first two days. Broken elevator, broken machines in gym. Left my glasses in the room and trying to find out if they were there was next to impossible. No body was helpful. I had to call 5 times. I was promised a email to get website, thus system was difficult and delayed me getting my glasses back before I had to fly out. The frustrating part is they had been found exactly where I said and no one bothered to email and no mine would even ask my question until I got to the housekeeping manager. She helped. I asked to speak to the GM and heard nothing!

title: Great stay over the Por Bowl weekend
review: I truly apologize for the inconveniences you described and the lack of follow up.  I can assure you that the poor service your received is not typical of our hotel.  The elevator has been repaired and we have just placed an order for three brand new treadmills that should arrive within the next few weeks.  In the meantime, we have the old machines working as we await the shipment.  I had not been notified of your request to speak with me, but I saw the survey you filled out as well and I have reached out via the contact information we have on file.  I hope we have the opportunity to speak soon so I may do my best to make it right.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Very impressed!
review: After staying at disney for a few nights and being disappointed, we took the kids here for the remainder of the trip. I was very impressed with the clean rooms and the professionalism of the staff. They went above and beyond to make sure that we had a wonderful stay! The included breakfast was also delicious!

title: Great stay, awesome resturant
review: Restaurant was fabulous, great food and service!   Nice to eat where we stayed.  Totally remodeled hotel and restaurant- fresh and new.  Happy hour staff and breakfast staff were all extra attentive too.

title: Another Embassy Suite, no highs and no lows
review: The property holds up to the Embassy Suite standards. Nothing special, but nothing really bad. The Complimentary breakfast and cocktail reception are nice but nothing to write home about. The staff is very pleasant and accommodating.

title: Amazing Hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your experience.  We truly appreciate the comments regarding the staff.  I was disappointed to hear that we did deliver on our goal of delivering memorable and authentic experiences.  I would love to speak to you about your stay and can be reached via email at william.friedrich@hilton.com or phone at (407) 581-4301.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Enjoyed the Stay
review: This is an amazing hotel. The room was immaculate. Service at this hotel was fantastic. Every staff member was friendly and kind. The bed was very comfortable. The room had all the amenities I needed. I will definitely be back next year.

title: Great place for business or vacation
review: This hotel has the best breakfast ever and its included!!!  And FREE parking and FREE internet and FREE Wine/ Cocktails. All these should persuade you  to go stay here.  It has recently been remodeled and I loved the rooms.  So nice and big and open.  I stayed 8 days and it was so much more space than a normal hotel room.

title: Another great Hilton Stay
review: As always this was another great stay at a Hilton property.  The room was very clean as was the other amenities.  I would highly recommend this property if you were staying on International Drive it is centrally located to all the restaurants and the convention center.

title: Comfortable, Great Location
review: I recently stayed at this hotel whike attending a convention. Although the hotel was very full with different convention attendees, it never felt crowded. Wait times for elevators were minimal, breakfast selections were plentiful, and the staff was friendly. I am only giving a four because a coworker had issues with ants in her room.

title: Great updates
review: Have stayed here a few times annually for a work conference in late January.  Pleasantly surprised to see major cosmetic updates when I arrived this Jan 2017.  Staff is very friendly and helpful (Andrew, Robert, and Kim were highlights).  Looking forward to visiting again.

title: At peace in Orlando
review: AWSOME! I always have an excellent stay at the Embassy Suites in Orlando FL. I get a good nights rest, I enjoy the breakfast in the mornings, and the people are fantastic. Plenty of restaurants close by (some just across the street). Close to the airport for a quick return trip.

title: Very nice and great price!
review: We stayed there for a conference and the rooms were tasteful and very clean. The staff was polite and pleasant. The free breakfast was better than others I have experienced. This is a very nice hotel and the price is reasonable. The location is great. We were close to numerous restaurants and attractions, some within walking distance. I would certainly stay there again and I would recommend this hotel to locals and tourists alike.

title: New, clean, fresh, roomy and near the attractions
review: I stayed for a business trip, but I noticed that the hotel was near the attractions and walking distance to many hotels. The property seems either new or newly refurbished.  The rooms are full suites and very roomy.  The hotel is set up with an atrium in the middle and the room door all exiting to a walkway around the atrium.  The bathrooms were modern and clean and the beds were comfortable.  They had a breakfast with many choices and a happy hour, but I didn't visit the happy hour.  The price was reasonable.

title: Disappointed
review: Very disappointed in this stay, with service and accomidations. They had problems with elevators throughout the stay, and never got it fixed. The bathtub looked like something I would find in a Motel 6 room (or worse). The service from the desk was poor, with staff taking a long time to serve more than one or two customers. There appeared to be no sense of urgency to get people checked in quickly. There were also "none to limited" carts to help take clothes either to or from rooms. That made getting into your room a lengthy process. Overall stay was clearly not up to what I would expect from an Embassy Suites Hotel.

title: Absolutely  WONDERFUL!
review: Thank you for writing a review of your stay.  I was disappointed to read that you did not enjoy your visit.  We did have some challenges with two elevators in December and January but all issues have been rectified.  In one case, a door was pushed out of alignment by a luggage cart and took several days and three visits to correct.  In the second case, we had a contractor inadvertently cut the oil line that feeds the hydraulic system and this took nearly two weeks to correct.  We truly apologize for the inconvenience this caused during your stay.  With that said, I would love to know more about which room you stayed in so I can inspect the bath tub and what service failures you experienced at the Front Desk.  My email address is william.friedrich@hilton.com and my direct line is (407) 581-4301.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Excellent stay
review: Everything about this hotel is wonderful! My boy friend and I stood in a premium sweet on the 7th floor and we had such an awesome experience. Rooms are newly renovated and super clean. Very modern luxury feel to the rooms and front desk area. The only thing is that the hotel is still going through construction but just for the indoor pool area. There was no annoying construction noises which was good. The front desk team are very sweet and helpful. The only thing I was not to happy about was the shuttle service to Universal we asked the bus driver if we had to be back at 7:15 pm to get back on the bus because that what the paper said and the driver said 7:00 pm. We get back there before 7:00 like 6:50 and he did not get there until 7:30. So that was my only thing I disliked. …

title: Location would be the only reason I'd go here
review: Recently redone. The outside pool was great. Heated. Rooms nice unless you are facing the highway then expect it to be loud and don't expect to get much sleep. The made to order breakfast is wonderful. Lots to choose from. The managers reception is a joke. Don't bother. Overall for the price there are others I would go to but the location might be right where you want to be. Lots of restaurants within walking distance.

title: Great hotel for a short stay
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your experience.  We loved to see some of the great comments but disappointed to hear that we did not provide a great experience overall.  We have heard some comments from light sleepers about the noise from the highway at times.  We are working out the details of a solution as we speak.  In lieu of simply applying a better seal to the sliding doors on the guest suites, we are looking into replacing them completely with a sound proof solution similar to what you would find at many airport hotels.  I am hoping to have this project completed in 2017 to enhance the guest experience for everyone.  I was also disappointed to hear that you did not enjoy the nightly reception.  I would love to hear more about your stay if you have the time.  I can be reached at william.friedrich@hilton.com or via phone at (407) 581-4301.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Great hotel but construction work during stay
review: Like most Embassy Suites hotels this location is a good value. The hotel location is convenient and it was easy to walk to dining. The pool was crowded, as was the work out room, but nice to have a pool after a day at the parks. The buffet breakfast was good and helped to get the day started. Rooms/suites were clean. Requested extra pillows for all of the guests because the pillows on the bed were small and flat. Staff were friendly and offered advice on local dining options.

title: Lovely experience
review: Visited here in August 2016. The location was great - in a lively atmosphere, right outside the bus stop & walking distance from many restaurants and shops.  The hotel also provided complementary bus tickets for the I-Drive bus which was great & transport to the Disney Theme Parks and Universal Studios.  Also, loved the fact that the hotel provided drinks & entertainment in the afternoon which was great after a long day visiting the park. As well as this, the hotel also provides breakfast for all guests, the breakfast was great with an excellent variety. The only down-sides were that; firstly there was a great deal of construction work in the hotel during our stay which we were not made aware of. It was very loud and was heard in our rooms early in the morning.  In addition to…

title: great stay for the money
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay.  The guest room renovations are 100% complete and overall we are now working on some finishing touches in the public space such as artwork and décor in the atrium and lobby.  We would love to have an opportunity to serve you again.  When your travels bring you back to Orlando, please reach out to me directly so I can assist with your reservations and plans personally.  My email address is william.friedrich@hilton.com and my direct phone is (407) 581-4301.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Excellent  from the room to the staff
review: We stayed  this past weekend  in #834  breathtaking  views  of Idrive  and the Orlando  Eye! The room was huge, the breakfast  was superb , with the exception  of not having  grits  or biscuits , but I guess  the made to order omelet  makes  up for that. The Outdoor  pool is beautiful , but with us living  here in Orlando  this past weekends  weather  was not ideal for us to swim outdoors , but once the indoor  pool  is complete  I'm certain  this  will be our staycation destination ! Special  shout out to J.P  and his coworker  in maintenance  and the staff from the receptionist  to housekeeping , you guys must be paid very well for you to be that courteous and accommodating !

title: Could have been better.
review: This trip could have been better were it not for the poor service during the breakfast the Male cook, I noticed, was not giving customers what they asked for and with all the  food allergies we have today that's a lawsuit waiting to happen.

title: Great Location, Decent Hotel
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay.  I was happy to see the 4 star rating but disappointed to hear that you did not have a good experience with our breakfast cook.  We have offered training and coaching to the team member in question based on your feedback and that of some other guests over the past several weeks.  The daily cooked to order breakfast is an Embassy Suites brand pillar.  It is a large part of why guests choose our hotel and brand.  The breakfast presentation and delivery is a key area and should be an amazing experience in all aspects.  We will do better and certainly hope to have the opportunity to show you when your travels bring you back to Orlando.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Nice place
review: This hotel recently underwent renovations.  The common areas have been nicely done and are inviting. The rooms are comfortable and clean.  My only observation was that given the new renovations, I would have thought that new things would be included in the rooms.  The hairdryer and iron for clothes looked like they have seen better days...otherwise decent hotel.  The location is great as it is on international drive close to restaurants and the Parks.  Would stay here again.

title: Excellent location, clean, friendly staff
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay.  It is great to hear that you would stay here again but I was disappointed to see the 3 star rating.  I truly apologize for the condition of the hairdryer and iron during your visit.  We did not do a blanket change out of these items during the renovation as we work to keep them all in great working condition year round.  These items are replaced as needed and we clearly failed to identify the need in that particular suite.  I would love to know which room you stayed in so we can ensure that these items have been changed out since your stay.  If you have a moment, I can be reached via email at william.friedrich@Hilton.com or via phone at (407) 581-4301.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Fantastic Location for the Night Life
review: I have stayed here twice now, both times on a golf trip to Orlando. Newly renovated and a suites style make it perfect for the get togethers in the room and lots of dinner and night life options within walking distance. For the money, you cannot beat it!!

title: Pointe Orlando
review: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your experience.  We are truly excited about our renovations and glad to see you enjoyed the suite.  We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back for your next golf trip.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Great Rooms & Breakfast
review: Hotel staff was exceptional.  Great breakfast, including custom omelettes. Rather small King suite. Bed was hard.  Sofa was hard.  Was undergoing some modifications.  Location is great for clubs and restaurants!   I'll be back!

title: Very nice property, highly recommended
review: Thank you for the great review of the Embassy Suites by Hilton Orlando International Drive Convention Center.  I was delighted to read that you had a great visit and plan to return.  I will be sure to share comments with the team and we look forward to serving you again.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Great location near lots of attractions!
review: This hotel has it all for the family and is close to Disney. Looks like it is along the Las Vegas strip with all the restaurants and entertainment close by all within walking distance. Would stay here again-- IF the indoor pool is open.

title: Great place to stay, clean and updated rooms
review: The hotel is going through a renovation, but we knew that when we booked. The inside was almost completed, and the eating area was exceptionally nice. they even had an omelette station. The entire atrium area was done and very updated nice tile with new modern tables and chairs. Don't be afraid, you will definitely enjoy this place.

title: NICE
review: Was disappointed with Breakfast. It is the reason we usually stay at Embassy Suites. The eggs were watery, bacon under cooked, diet coke was flat and the staff had a hard time keeping the serving trays filled. Pillows were flat. Other Embassy Suites in Orlando had much better pillows.

title: Always the right choice, Embassy Suites
review: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.  I would love the opportunity to speak with you regarding the visit so I can personally look into the pillows in that specific room.  The dates of your stay would be helpful as well to know what happened with the breakfast and what we may have been able to do differently.  It is feedback such as yours that helps ensure we stay on top of our game and provide the best possible experience to our guests.  My direct line is (407) 581-4301 and my email address is William.Friedrich@Hilton.com.  I look forward to hearing from you.  Bill Friedrich General Manager

title: Excellent Stay
